story:
Let's start with some good news:
did you know that 90% strokes could be prevented by an early detection of cardiac anomalies?

That's why we developed Cardiia, a mobile application detecting arrhythmias along with other cardiac diseases from just a simple smarphone, with no need for external sensors or devices. 
Cardiia, in fact, measures the user heartbeats and PPG (blood volume) wave with unprecedented high precision, both from finger and face (contactless).

For people who care about their health and the health of their beloved ones, we offer the opportunity to perform a screening of dangerous health conditions quickly, regularly and in the comfort of one's own home.

 

Did you know?

Diseases involving the heart cause the largest percentage of deaths worldwide.

Cardiia allows screening of cardiac pathologies in the comfort of your home.

The Cardiia app works on Android and iOS smartphones. To the best of our knowledge, Cardiia is the only mobile app able to detect precisely a wide range of cardiac diseases. 

Cardiia breaks the habit of procrastination with a simple 60 seconds check.

At Cardiia, we believe that prevention is the best available weapon in the battle against cardiac diseases.

Cardiia allows you to test your health any time you want.

Cardiia brings diagnosis at your fingertips, being able to measure the heartbeat and the shape of the blood pressure wave with extremely high precision to detect atrial fibrillation using artificial intelligence. 

First in Capri!

Cardiia was selected for the Italian Entrepreneurs Association startup competition in Capri and won the first prize among other 170 applicants.

The grant of €10,000 will help us develop new features for the app and deliver them directly to our backers community.

First in Florence!

The Cardiia team won the Digital Health Forum Startup Competition in Florence, Italy!

We will start field testing on 1,000 patients at a university hospital in Rome and on other 500 patients at a university hospital in Neaples. During this five months trials the goal will be to gather data, improve the AI training, and test the new functionality of signal capturing. This new functionality is based on facial reading of the heartbeat, without direct contact.

Maker of Merit at the Maker Faire 2017

Cardiia received the prestigious "Maker of Merit" blue ribbon for its project, and hundreds of people tried the demo version inside the Medical Droid stand at the Maker Faire 2017 - European Edition in Rome.

In the next few years you may join the 1 BILLION people who are at risk of developing atrial fibrillation.

To give an idea of the potential impact of cardiac diagnosis and prevention on every smartphone, we take a look at the global spread of one significant cardiac disease: atrial fibrillation. 

Atrial fibrillation is a condition, usually asymptomatic, that can result in ischemic stroke or heart attack if left untreated. Its worldwide incidence is rising and it’s starting to affect people in their fifties also, with 33 millions diagnosed in the world. 

In many rural areas remote prevention is the only choice, since the distance from the nearest hospital limits periodic health checks.

Atrial fibrillation is a disease that strikes 1 out of 4 adults more than 50 years old.

Many cardiovascular diseases can be successfully cured, but it’s crucial that patients are diagnosed at the earliest stage, when symptoms can be still rare.

Cardiia uses video analysis techniques to measure heartbeats and the blood pressure wave shape with extremely high precision. By touching the smartphone's camera with your fingertip or by pointing the camera at your face, it will read the blood flow.

 

The video analysis turns the smartphone into a precise photoplethysmography device. This device is capable of reading heartbeats from a finger touching the camera when the flashlight is on.  

Machine Learning compares the signal with the internal archive of cardiac rhythms and detects in a robust and precise manner the underlying anomalies performing a diagnosis. 

 

The user is warned of the possible pathology and a cardiology visit is recommended. If the patient is already being monitored/supervised, their doctor can be sent a message too!

 

Supported Devices 

Cardiia is compatible with all recent Android and iOS devices. 

For iOS, the following devices support Cardiia: 

  • iPhone 6s 
  • iPhone 6s Plus 
  • iPhone 7 
  • iPhone 7 Plus 
  • iPhone SE 

For Android, any device running Android 5.0 Lollipop or newer should be fully supported by Cardiia.

Cardiia correctly identified atrial fibrillation and flutter 98% of the time, with 2% false positives and 0% false negatives.

In a test performed on 600 ECG signals from the MIT Arrhythmia Archive the app correctly identified atrial fibrillation and flutter 98% of the times: 2% false positives and 0% false negatives. 

Then, in a test performed on 200 patients in a private clinic the app correctly identified atrial fibrillation and flutter 98% of the times, again with 2% false positives and 0% false negatives. Having 0% false negatives is a fact of special importance, in fact, it's crucial to detect properly all affected people without any anomaly going undetected. 

Right now similar tests are underway in the identification of other arrhythmias featuring a recognizable heartbeat signature, as well as diseases linked to pressure and vascular elasticity as hypertension and atherosclerosis.

Since the artificial intelligence keeps learning worldwide from hospital field tests, the update button allows the user to search for updates and download them to improve the app performance!

We want to share the app with the Indiegogo Community, and we need the Community's help to make it grow, and fulfill the objective of detecting the largest possible set of cardiac anomalies. 

Atrial fibrillation hit my family one year ago, and since then I have been working on Cardiia, because I realized, from my own experience, how cardiac diseases can easily go undetected, and in absence of symptoms it’s common to procrastinate the visit due to laziness, lack of time or fear.  

What about other Apps? 

Compared to the common heart rate apps, or to home medical devices, Cardiia is the only solution that is both affordable, easy to use and accurate.

We analyzed ten of the common "Heart Rate" apps available on Google and Apple Store, but comparing their results with the readings of an electronic sphygmomanometer we realized that all of them are extremely inaccurate, and their readings cannot be used to diagnose cardiac diseases. 

The necessary precision is available only when home medical devices are used, but with a dramatic increase in costs and complexity of use. Cardiia, on the contrary, is the only solution that is both affordable, easy to use and accurate, thanks to its video analysis algorithms that increase dramatically the precision of camera readings.

 

Our team is made up by both IT specialists and academic researchers. 

My name is Fabio Rebecchi, I am Cardiia's founder and I have a background in Physics, Medicinal Chemistry and IT. 

Learn More HERE - Linkedin | Fabio Rebecchi

Our management is made up of senior entrepreneurs, with international experience in software project management and startups. 

The technical team is a mix of expert software developers and of academic researchers from US, Italy, Poland, Albania and Croatia, with the right combination of mobile development (Android, IOS) and applied mathematics skills.

According to the roadmap, we will deliver the app to the Indiegogo Community before the 1st of January 2018. 

The project started on the 16th of July, 2016. The first tests on real patients were carried out in January 2017. We are now fine tuning the algorithms and performing further tests in order to add as many diagnostic functionalities as possible. The app will be available, as an early access, to all pledgers before than the 1st of January 2018.

If our campaign is very successful we will be able to invest more funds in our research to develop extra features enabling Cardiia to detect the following diseases:

  • Brachycardia
  • Tachycardia
  • Premature Contractions
  • Hypertension
  • Atherosclerosis 

All these extra features will be available to users as soon as they are ready, without any extra cost. We offer packages for Medical Doctors too that offer the opportunity to manage multiple licenses and monitor the data of the patients using the app on a dedicated web application.

Future Plans 

Our latest researches show that the same mathematical tools used for detection of cardiac diseases could be used in conjunction to other smartphone sensors, as the microphone or the motion sensor, to diagnose respiratory pathologies and the onset of Parkinson's disease. So after adding to the app all the possible diagnostic capabilities in the field of cardiac diseases we will start researching about non cardiac diseases. 

Thank you! 

Thank you so much for supporting this project. I started out working on this as something I wanted for my dad and for my family in general, but soon I became aware of how it's going to be a useful tool for everyone who needs cardiac prevention. Your support makes it possible. Backing us you get both the Cardiia app and become a contributor to an exceptionally promising project in the field of digital health. 

 Thank you!

"Above all else, guard your heart, for everything you do flows from it." (Proverbs 4:23)

story:
Short Summary

Why did we create Project Million? 

- The chance of a child today growing up into a health adult is less than 20%. It is because of this statistic that we decided to create a children's health course that we hope will impact 1 Million kids. We decided to take this statistic head on and change the current outcome of children's health. We feel that there is nothing else out there that would have a greater impact on a person and a community than bettering the health of our future generation.

My name is Matthew Landen and my team and I have developed what we feel is the most inclusive children's health program out there today. We have a system in place that keeps kids active, educates them on health in a way that they can act immediately on what they learn, and we provide their families with access to healthy foods. 

I specialize in the psychology of health as it relates to a child so the entire program is designed in a way that will get the kids excited and keep them excited throughout the entire program and for the rest of their life!

Following the program we will be posting statistics of the children's success at ProjectMillion.com and facebook.com/projectmillion. ABC 15 will likely do a follow up in May as well to show the benefits that the children have gained.

For those who sponsor a child: We will also be sending you updates directly so you can see the benefits that your contribution helped with. We will also have the children write you a thank-you letter in appreciation for sponsoring them. 

Why we need you!

To put a child through the program it cost just over $20. With 185 children participating the total cost of the program is $3,800. This $20 only goes to materials and an accelerometer (pedometer) for every child. No money goes to a person's salary.

We originally had a corporate sponsor lined up for the entire program but they had to back out of the program at the last minute due to a current contract they had with another pedometer company. 

We decided that we were going to go ahead with the program anyways and make it happen no matter what what the cost to us would be. My team and I have been working overtime outside of the program to help cover the cost.

It is because of this that we would appreciate you sponsoring a child. It will free up time for us to focus on the program. If additional funds are raised then it will also allow for us to provide additional classroom activities and even a field trip to a grocery store so that the children can have hands on experience with food and applying what they learn. 

The Impact

Some of the benefits that we are hoping to prove are:

  • Better grades
  • Less illness
  • Healthier children
  • Happier children
  • Decrease in disruption
  • Decrease in bullying
We will also be following up with these children years down the road to show that they have continued with the healthy habits they will learn over the next three months. We will prove that children are able to change the way they eat and live once given the opportunity to do so. Our first goal is to have a generation of children who have a 50% chance of growing up into a healthy adult. If we reach only this number, then it would mean we have positively impacted over 16 million kids. And to think, this is the smallest expectation we have for this program!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't sponsor a child, even donating a couple of dollars would make a great impact on our ability to better support the children. 

You may also follow us at facebook.com/projectmillion or projectmillion.com and follow along with the program as time goes on. We will be posting updates from in the school and updates from success that children are having.

With your help we have the potential to change the way we educate children on health forever!

I couldn't be more grateful for your support :)

Matthew Landen and the entire Project Million team!

story:
What good is alternative energy if no one can afford it?

If you are like us, you have asked that question a lot!

I do not like paying the power company, and being at their mercy however/ whenever something happens to our power. I hate sitting in the dark scrambling to find a flash light, candles, lighters, and worrying about whether the food will go bad in the refrigerator, eating canned foods, and breads and listening to my wife and kids "complaining" about how this sucks. 

I suspect most of you do not enjoy power outages. It can be days before power is back and when it finally comes on you rejoice, and you gladly fork over money to pay for this large infrastructure, until... the next time the power goes out, and you cycle through this process again. 

I hate you and I being one of these 36 million people

These figures are staggering especially when you are the one sitting in the dark. This is a current running advertisement from Home Depot. Bearing in mind this unit they are advertising still uses consumables, and are dangerous. And you better hurry cause the first 50 people get a free warranty!

If the power goes out in the middle of a blizzard, and you have no way to heat your house, then you are all shivering in a corner under some blankets, praying for the power to come back on, wishing your heaters worked. 


We do not want anyone to suffer again. 

Hi my name is Kris Giles. I am the Owner and CEO of SunGroup Energy, We are in the business of power production. I realized early on that people in the 21st centurywant to be energy independent for a variety of different reasons, whether it is Environmental Impact, saving money, or just pure independence. We crave sustainable energy.

Here is a video that goes into most of this story that you will read down below. 

Watch it to get a better understanding of our project. 



We at SunGroup Energy have been working on E²-kWh prototypes for over 5 years. We are currently on our 5th generation platform. We have cranked up about 1 new version every year, with the scrap funds we were able to scrape together. Now we are 100% confident in our final design to be able to offer it to all of you.

We have in the past built two prototype power units to run a home or business.   These units need no consumables in energy production: such as sun, wind, water, gasoline, propane, natural gas or oil.   They used a reclaiming process and operated off 1 gallon of hydraulic fluid.   Both units cut the power bills by 30% at both test sites. Our new Units can supply an unlimited amount of power. 

Take a look at the full video of our first generation of this unit. (note we don’t use half of these components now), I was sharing this video with my partner Matthew Chiapetta. Let's watch it together!


Oh man, I am almost ashamed to see this video again. But hey you have to start somewhere. This was my first prototype to stop paying the power company, and be independent from the grid so my family didn't have to suffer with no air conditioning or TV. Sadly since I never intended on offering this unit to others, I didn't shoot video of the other prototypes. But we do have some footage of the current prototype on down the page. 

Once I finally got it right, I wanted to share with you (and the world) this technology, so that you do not have to go through the headache of doing this yourself. 

The current generation being introduced uses no fluids.  Is also 99% maintenance free.   We have found a way to harness vs (variable speed), and by regulating torque, along with rpm's, we can rectify and condition produced power to 120v or 240v at 60 hz. The unit can be used on grid or off grid.   Based on our proposed cost divided by output for a 8 year period, 1 kwh will cost you 1/2 a cent.   That is .12 cents a day for clean, reliable energy. No way of producing energy is even within $10,000 of our unit, and they still need consumables or climate influence. 

You might say, well why not use what is out there currently, and my answer is, I looked into that seriously, because its a hell of a lot easier to use what is out there, than to design your own...but the technology that is available to consumers now, is to expensive or just will not work for my home. 

Here is why Solar Energy will not be working in my home. (This was also in main video at top). 


Now for why wind is not a good source of production in general. 


Now you might ask well what about hydropower, we have been doing that for a long time. Well there are certain conditions that hydropower needs. Lets take a look. 


Now you say "Ok you got me I don't have a river by my house with a large hydro unit that costs a ton of money...but I do have a generator! What about that?" Well I do have some thoughts about generators, and as a parent of three kids, this idea worries me. Here is why.


So that is the reason most of these methods are not really feasible. 

Plus they are really expensive, and to me the costs outweigh the benefits. 


How does this invention work? 

Now enters E²-kWh with its proprietary combination of components. We at SunGroup Energy have addressed all your problems and concerns; by designing and building power units that uses no combustible fuels, scald your hands, or are loud. You don’t need sun or wind. They will not burn or catch fire. You don’t need ridiculously tall towers, or tons of space with rivers flowing through your property. So what makes us unique?

Our digitally operated controllers using an on Demand approach leverages rpm’s and torque through variable speed. By utilizing built in timers we give you the versatility to customize required power output for individual home needs. So with thepush of a button you can make more or less power whenever you desire.

For example, If you need 1kWh per hour it will be built and priced for that need, if you need 10kWh per hour then it will be built and priced for your need. The point is whatever your power needs we can make it happen.

By using our proprietary blend of Hybrid components including but not limited to, diodes, rectifiers, charge controllers, inverters, internal and external disconnects, system meters, along with dump and overcurrent protectors. Components that are ul listed are under certification 1741. We are giving you versatility, cost effective, danger free, reliable, on or off the grid power. Systems include proper balance of systems equipment, and will meet electrical safety criteria. 


What does it look like?


This is the Prototype that proves all my theories work. The unit is producing 1812 watts per 60 minutes being fed right into my home. This unit is consuming 300 of the watts its making, to sustain itself. giving an actual net profit wattage of 1512. 

As you can see, with this unit here we can achieve real power with no consumables. This prototype is an example of general mechanics, but this does not reflect what the final build will look like. Keep in mind I have been building and changing these for over 5 years in spare time, with spare money. From hydraulics to a parallel bearing model, our new kWh, 5th generation combines the very best of methods and technology. The final model will be a lot cleaner, newer, and customizable. We will keep you updated with the changes in look as we go along. 

Imagine what we can achieve together with the proper equipment! 

Here are some component pictures, to get an idea of the technological idea and design of the 5th generation production unit.

This an example of the variable speed and pushbutton control


RPM and Torque Precision Gearbox


Power Inverter


Battery Pack


This is a simple Tony Stark linear drawing of our main generation process. So as you can see with the readily available components, and this design, we will turn "Mark I" into mark "Mark V" with your help.


WE NEED YOUR HELP!

In order for us to bring this unique unit to life and into your home we have to have your help. 

In 2013, there is a lot of talk about clean energy in this country from companies that spend over 300 billion dollars to develop products that still produce harmful emissions, endanger our environment, wildlife and still use consumables. I do not enjoy watching all the "commercials" about clean energy on TV, and knowing what I know, it makes me even more ambitious. I want to get this unit into your homes as soon as possible. It is our endeavour to completely eliminate our dependence on fossil fuels, and truly clean up our environment for our future generations.

Our initial pledge amount of $250,000, will enable us to utilize resources and modify Engineering, they will enable us to buy and set up needed machines for production assembly. We need to secure a larger space during our setup period. This will enable us the ability to manufacture E²kWh on a large scale, and we will have the resources and space to buy and produce components needed to manufacture the units on a production scale. We will be hiring additional personnel, including but not limited to factory workers, packers, shippers, etc. 


Finally as proud Americans, we promise to only manufacture the units in America, and use American workers.


STRETCH GOAL!

If we surpass our needed pledge amount, we will have the ability to do further research and development into different energy alternatives to popular items we use every day, including your boats and cars. We will be able to secure an even larger space, and hire more personnel. We are striving to manufacture all components at our facilities, currently that is not possible because other suppliers have stuff we can use, and it is really expensive to buy the machines, and presses to make the components. We want to make our own custom components across the board, and you can help make that happen.

Since we are one of you, we want every average person in the world to be able to afford our products. We are estimating our products to cost dramatically less than any alternative options available today. Your contributions above and beyond our minimum pledge will enable us make this possible. We cannot do this without your help.


REWARDS! What is in this for You?

We have a variety of rewards for you when you pledge to support us. We have wristbands, stickers, t-shirts, phone cases, a poster, and other incentives.


You can call yourself an E² kWh Supporter based upon what level you decide to back us on, you can henceforth be known as a (for example) a TerraWatt level backer. It is fun, we took the time to find a fun way to name them, so be proud of your level.


Here are the Back on T-shirt design for Most Supporters. These will also be the Sticker Design. 

We are offering a few limited edition T-shirts for the Megawatt level backers

Here is my favourite one, the first Limited Edition Zombie Apocalypse Ready Design.

And for the people who are like us and prepare for worst case scenarios, and power outages, we have the second Limited Edition TEOTWAWKI (The End Of The World As We Know It) Design.




Depending on what you get for the T-Shirt we will give you the option of one of the three designs for the Iphone/Galaxy Phone Cases.

Also we are giving away discounts on the product once we are ready for retail selling. 

At the highest Tier we are guaranteeing you a fully functional unit, that you can install at your site. 



Your Impact on the World

With this unique one of a kind project we will be helping people no longer be at the mercy of the power companies, no longer will we sit and go why don't we have any power? And most importantly these units will not break a bank! I have been running my Pool Company business for over 10 years, and the number one question I get asked a lot is how can this save me on my power bill? So I know first hand what people are seeking, how to deliver the most cost effective equipment into their homes, and now soon I will be able to offer a whole new solution to not even worry about asking that question. 

Aren't you excited? 


Other Ways YOU can help!

  • Even if you cannot contribute even the smallest amount, please pass this on to your friends and collegues, let them decide if they want to be part of the revolution. They will probably be glad you did. :)
  • Feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools!

We are really excited about this project, and I cannot wait till you are part of the energy revolution.

Your Energy Independence Countdown Has Begun!

Kris Giles

SunGroup Energy
story_txt:
What good is alternative energy if no one can afford it?If you are like us,
you have asked that question a lot!
I do not like paying
the power company, and being at their mercy however/ whenever something
happens to our power. I hate sitting in the dark scrambling to
find a flash light, candles, lighters, and worrying about whether the food will
go bad in the refrigerator, eating canned foods, and breads and listening to
my wife and kids "complaining" about how this
sucks. 
I suspect most of you
do not enjoy power outages. It can be days before power is back and when it
finally comes on you rejoice, and you gladly fork over money to pay for this
large infrastructure, until... the next time the power goes out,
and you cycle through this process again. I hate you and I being one of these 36 million peopleThese figures are staggering especially when you are the one sitting in the dark. This is a current running advertisement from Home Depot. Bearing in mind this unit they are advertising still uses consumables, and are dangerous. And you better hurry cause the first 50 people get a free warranty!
If the power goes out
in the middle of a blizzard, and you have no way to heat your house, then you
are all shivering in a corner under some blankets, praying for
the power to come back on, wishing your heaters worked. 
We do not want anyone
to suffer again. 
Hi my name is Kris
Giles. I am the Owner and CEO of SunGroup Energy, We are in the business of
power production. I realized early on that people in the 21st centurywant
to be energy independent for a variety of different reasons, whether it is
Environmental Impact, saving money, or just pure independence. We crave
sustainable energy.Here is a video that goes into most of this story that you will read down below. Watch it to get a better understanding of our project. 
We at SunGroup Energy
have been working on E²-kWh prototypes for over 5 years. We are currently on
our 5th generation platform. We have cranked up about 1 new version every
year, with the scrap funds we were able to scrape together. Now we are
100% confident in our final design to be able to offer it to all of you.
We have in the past built two
prototype power units to run a home or business.   These units
need no consumables in energy production: such as sun, wind,
water, gasoline, propane, natural gas or oil.   They used a reclaiming
process and operated off 1 gallon of hydraulic fluid.   Both units cut
the power bills by 30% at both test sites. Our new Units can supply an unlimited amount of power. 
Take a look at the
full video of our first generation of this unit. (note we don’t use half of
these components now), I was sharing this video with my partner Matthew
Chiapetta. Let's watch it together!Oh man, I am almost
ashamed to see this video again. But hey you have to start somewhere. This was
my first prototype to stop paying the power company, and be independent from
the grid so my family didn't have to suffer with no air conditioning or TV.
Sadly since I never intended on offering this unit to others, I didn't shoot
video of the other prototypes. But we do have some footage of the current
prototype on down the page. 
Once I finally got it
right, I wanted to share with you (and the world) this
technology, so that you do not have to go through the headache of doing
this yourself. 
The current
generation being introduced uses no fluids.  Is also 99% maintenance
free.   We have found a way to harness vs (variable speed), and by
regulating torque, along with rpm's, we can rectify and condition produced
power to 120v or 240v at 60 hz. The unit can be used on grid or off
grid.   Based on our proposed cost divided by output for a 8 year period,
1 kwh will cost you 1/2 a cent.   That is .12 cents a day for
clean, reliable energy. No way of producing energy is even within $10,000 of
our unit, and they still need consumables or climate influence. 
You might say, well
why not use what is out there currently, and my answer is, I looked into that
seriously, because its a hell of a lot easier to use what is out there, than to
design your own...but the technology that is available to consumers
now, is to expensive or just will not work for my home. 
Here is why Solar
Energy will not be working in my home. (This was also in main video at
top). Now
for why wind is not a good source of production in general. Now you might ask well
what about hydropower, we have been doing that for a long time. Well there are
certain conditions that hydropower needs. Lets take a look. Now you say "Ok
you got me I don't have a river by my house with a large hydro unit that costs
a ton of money...but I do have a generator! What about that?" Well I do
have some thoughts about generators, and as a parent of three kids, this idea
worries me. Here is why.So that is the reason
most of these methods are not really feasible. 
Plus they are really
expensive, and to me the costs outweigh the benefits. How does this invention work? 
Now enters E²-kWh with its proprietary combination of
components. We at SunGroup Energy have addressed all your problems and
concerns; by designing and building power units that uses no combustible
fuels, scald your hands, or are loud. You don’t need sun or wind. They will
not burn or catch fire. You don’t need ridiculously tall towers, or tons of
space with rivers flowing through your property. So what makes us
unique?
Our digitally
operated controllers using an on Demand approach leverages rpm’s and
torque through variable speed. By utilizing built in timers we give you the
versatility to customize required power output for individual home needs. So
with thepush of a button you can make more or less power whenever you desire.
For example, If you
need 1kWh per hour it will be built and priced for that need, if you need 10kWh
per hour then it will be built and priced for your need. The point is whatever
your power needs we can make it happen.
By using our
proprietary blend of Hybrid components including but not limited to, diodes,
rectifiers, charge controllers, inverters, internal and external disconnects,
system meters, along with dump and overcurrent protectors. Components that are
ul listed are under certification 1741. We are giving you versatility,
cost effective, danger free, reliable, on or off the grid power. Systems
include proper balance of systems equipment, and will meet electrical safety
criteria. What does it look like?

This is the Prototype
that proves all my theories work. The unit is producing 1812 watts per 60 minutes being fed
right into my home. This unit is consuming 300 of the watts its making,
to sustain itself. giving an actual net profit wattage
of 1512. 
As you can see, with
this unit here we can achieve real power with no consumables. This prototype is
an example of general mechanics, but this does not reflect what the final build
will look like. Keep in mind I have been building and changing these for over 5
years in spare time, with spare money. From hydraulics to a parallel bearing
model, our new kWh, 5th generation combines the very best of methods and
technology. The final model will be a lot cleaner, newer, and customizable. We will keep you updated with the changes in look as we go along. 
Imagine what we can
achieve together with
the proper equipment! 
Here are some
component pictures, to get an idea of the technological idea and design of the
5th generation production unit.This an example of the variable speed and pushbutton controlRPM and Torque Precision GearboxPower InverterBattery Pack
This is a simple Tony
Stark linear drawing of our main generation process. So as you can see with the
readily available components, and this design, we will turn "Mark I"
into mark "Mark V" with your help.WE NEED YOUR HELP!
In order for us to
bring this unique unit to life and into your home we have to have your
help. In 2013, there is a lot of talk about clean energy in this country from companies that spend over 300 billion dollars to develop products that still produce harmful emissions, endanger our environment, wildlife and still use consumables. I do not enjoy watching all the "commercials" about clean energy on TV, and knowing what I know, it makes me even more ambitious. I want to get this unit into your homes as soon as possible. It is our endeavour to completely eliminate our dependence on fossil fuels, and truly clean up our environment for our future generations.
Our initial pledge
amount of $250,000, will enable us to
utilize resources and modify Engineering, they will enable us to buy and set up
needed machines for production assembly. We need to secure a larger space
during our setup period. This will enable us the ability to manufacture E²kWh on a large scale,
and we will have the resources and space to buy and produce components
needed to manufacture the units on a production scale. We will
be hiring additional personnel, including but not limited to factory
workers, packers, shippers, etc. 
Finally as proud
Americans, we promise to only manufacture the units in America, and use
American workers.
STRETCH GOAL!
If we surpass our needed
pledge amount, we will have the ability to do further research and
development into different energy alternatives to popular items we use every
day, including your boats and cars. We will be able to secure an even
larger space, and hire more personnel. We are striving to manufacture
all components at our facilities, currently that is not possible because other
suppliers have stuff we can use, and it is really expensive to buy the
machines, and presses to make the components. We want to make our own
custom components across the board, and you can help make that happen.
Since we are one of you, we want
every average person in the world to be able to afford our products. We
are estimating our products to cost dramatically less than any alternative
options available today. Your contributions above and beyond
our minimum pledge will enable us make this possible. We cannot
do this without your help.
REWARDS! What is in this for You?
We have a variety of rewards for
you when you pledge to support us. We have wristbands,
stickers, t-shirts, phone cases, a poster, and other incentives.You can call yourself an E²
kWh Supporter based upon what level you decide to back us on, you can
henceforth be known as a (for example) a TerraWatt level backer. It is fun, we
took the time to find a fun way to name them, so be proud of your level.Here are the Back on T-shirt design for Most Supporters. These will also be the Sticker Design. We are offering a few limited edition T-shirts for the Megawatt level backersHere is my favourite one, the first Limited Edition Zombie Apocalypse Ready Design.And for the people who are like us and prepare for worst case scenarios, and power outages, we have the second Limited Edition TEOTWAWKI (The End Of The World As We Know It) Design.Depending on what you get for the T-Shirt we will give you the option of one of the three designs for the Iphone/Galaxy Phone Cases.Also we are giving away discounts on the product once we are ready for retail selling. At the highest Tier we are guaranteeing you a fully functional unit, that you can install at your site. Your Impact on the WorldWith this unique one of a kind project we will be helping people no longer be at the mercy of the power companies, no longer will we sit and go why don't we have any power? And most importantly these units will not break a bank! I have been running my Pool Company business for over 10 years, and the number one question I get asked a lot is how can this save me on my power bill? So I know first hand what people are seeking, how to deliver the most cost effective equipment into their homes, and now soon I will be able to offer a whole new solution to not even worry about asking that question. Aren't you excited? Other Ways YOU can help!Even if you cannot contribute even the smallest amount, please pass this on to your friends and collegues, let them decide if they want to be part of the revolution. They will probably be glad you did. :)Feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools!We are really excited about this project, and I cannot wait till you are part of the energy revolution.
Your Energy Independence Countdown
Has Begun!
Kris Giles
SunGroup Energy

story:
Short Summary

Hi. My name is Nitsan, and I am an FTM transgender man. I'm 18 years old, and have identified as male since I was 13 (even before then I struggled with my assigned gender). My favorite TV show is Parks and Recreation, I love baking cupcakes, and I am a  theatre major at the University of Maryland. All of this is negated by my deep, painful struggle with my body. It is a female body, and I am a man trapped in it. That's where this fundraiser comes in. I need top surgery to feel human again (I even have therapist support for this). However, my mother's insurance will not cover it, and my father is unemployed. He has not yet been able to find a job, and we are all struggling. This is something I truly need, and I implore you to please, give as much as you can! Even just a dollar helps. 


I plan to get the surgery at a doctor's office in Virginia. Every cent of this money will go to that surgery, including consultation costs, anesthesia, the surgery itself, and all the other costs associated with surgery. I don't know that I can offer "perks", but I can draw you something cute, or bake you cupcakes (I am VERY good at baking cupcakes), or create a cupcake recipe based on your personality, or whatever! I need this.


    If you're wondering what you can get out of this, I don't know what to tell you. What I can say is you will be helping someone in need, and opening his future to a world of endless possibilities.

      Even if you can't donate, please share with your friends!

      Thank you so much.

story:
Committed to advancing breast cancer research and developing new treatment options for women diagnosed with breast cancer, Baylor Health Care System is developing novel immunotherapies to treat tumors by using patients’ own immune systems to fight the disease.

A pilot clinical trial at Baylor is currently enrolling patients that will test the efficacy of a therapeutic vaccine on triple negative breast cancer (TNBC), an aggressive form of the disease. The study is designed to enroll 20 patients diagnosed with TNBC and will provide each participant with a personalized vaccine created from their own immune cells.

Do You Get It?  

The goal is to determine whether the vaccines, in combination with standard therapies, will improve patients’ responsiveness to treatment and result in longer disease-free survival time frames. Baylor’s previous successes with a similar approach to treating melanoma suggest that there is hope.

I Think You Get It. 
How can you help?  Ten bucks.  The ripple effect of $10 is amazing.  You give.  Your mother gives.  Your sister gives.  Before we know it, we've all given $10 and we've raised $25,000...the average cost for a patient to enroll in a phase one clinical trial.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it. You get it?

story:
It has been 4 years since we started our crowdfunding campaign. Now there are hundred of thousands of children with our beloved Lulla as their companion, helping them sleep better and feel more comforted. Thank you to everyone that helped us bring life to this concept and being a part of our journey.

To celebrate this chapter we will be offering the Lulla doll for the original crowdfunding price. The early bird special in fact! The only difference… you do not have to wait. You can enjoy a better sleep, for a better price, now. 

Check out our ONLINE STORE on www.lulladoll.com 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Lulla doll imitates closeness with its soft natural touch and by playing a real-life recording of the breathing and heartbeat of a mother at rest. Lulla's aim is to help babies stabilize their own breathing and heartbeat, resulting in longer and better quality sleep as well as added security. 

 

 

 

 

Lulla's unique patent pending design was inspired by research on kangaroo care, the effects of heartbeat and breathing sounds, and the effects that smell, sight and touch have on babies and small children.

 

Hear- When the chest is pressed, Lulla plays a real-life recording of the breathing and heartbeat of a mother at rest. Her name is Gudrun, she is a dear friend, a mother of four and a Kundalini yoga teacher.

Look- Babies prefer to look at something that resembles a human face. The colors of the doll were chosen for the purpose of making the doll gender and race neutral.

Touch- The outer layer is made from soft natural cotton. The filling is made from ultra fine microfiber that is hypoallergenic.

Smell- The fabric of the doll can absorb smell from parents if they first keep it close to their skin before giving it to their child for extra feeling of security.

Clean and safe- The doll is machine washable in warm water making it safer for small babies with underdeveloped immune and respiratory systems.

Read more about the research behind the Lulla doll concept on our blog

 

 

 

 

 

Featured in:

 

 

Why Lulla?

There can be many reasons and situations when it is simply not possible for parents to keep their little ones close. Some babies take frequent naps, go to sleep early in the evening and it´s not safe for some people to co-sleep with their babies. There are also more serious reasons like illness and hospitalization of parents and babies, and last but not least, sometimes we just need a little break and a good nights sleep.

The Lulla doll imitates closeness with its soft touch and soothing sounds, so when parents have to be away for whatever reason, their babies can still experience the positive benefits of closeness.

 

 

 

What do parents say?

"Our little boy never had problems falling asleep but had trouble sleeping alone. He woke up frequently during the night and his naps during the day were short. The Lulla Doll has helped him a lot, he slept for longer at a time which made it easier for the whole family to rest. For that mom and dad are truly grateful.“

- father of 7 month old Ólafur, Iceland

 

 

"Our experience of the Lulla Doll was very positive. Our daughter was born prematurely and she has slept with the doll by her side more or less the first months of her life. It gave her, and us, a feeling of safety and comfort“

- mother of 5 month old Bryndís, Iceland

 

 

"My children have had a hard time falling asleep on their own. Lulla helps them fall asleep and also stay asleep, giving their tired mother a long wanted break.“

- mother of 3 year old Ísgerður and 6 month old Eyþór, Iceland

"I cannot rate Lulla enough. My one year old was waking every 40 mins even with co-sleeping and I was at my wits end and crippled with exhaustion. I purchased Lulla as a last resort thinking that we had absolutely no hope. On the first night in her cot she woke twice and the second and third night we had a baby that slept through the night. I feel like a human again thank you so much for bringing this into my life."

– Nikki, Australia

 

"I took a chance and bought the Lulla doll. I had heard such amazing reviews and though I had nothing to lose! My 17 month old sons constant waking was sending us mad! We have had Lulla for two weeks and he has slept though almost every night, settling himself when he wakes. It´s been amazing!"

 – Amber, Australia

"Just to say thank you so much for your great invention. Not only does my son love it, but it has the added benefit that when the Lulla doll is on, my husband does not snore! I´ve tested it a few times an as soon as I switch the doll on he stops snoring. It´s a miracle! We all sleep better, so thank you two times. "

– Jessica, Denmark

 

 

Awards & Grants

The doll has been in development and testing for 3 years. It has received awards for both innovation and design. We have also been blessed with numerous grants.

 

Q & A - about the Lulla Doll

How is the Lulla doll different from other soothing plush sound machines?

Both the purpose and the design of the Lulla doll differs from other seemingly similar products. The purpose of most other sleep related toys is to help babies fall asleep with the help of white noise, sometimes resembling womb sounds. The Lulla doll, on the other hand, is designed to help babies stay asleep for longer periods at a time, and help babies stabilize and feel safe. The doll is imitating closeness to another person, more than trying to replicate the womb experience. The doll aims to do this with its unique real life sound that plays for 8 hours. Other products only stay on for 15-45 minutes (or are movement activated), the sound file is not this large and the sounds are usually not real-life.

What is the recommended age for the Lulla doll?

The Lulla doll is suitable from birth. We recommend it for age 0-24 months when closeness is vitally important to a child´s early development and sleeping routine.

Would you recommend it for toddlers?

We know that many parents let their toddlers use the doll as well and they loved it. Toddlers can face many sleep related challenges like newborns. However, just of a different kind. Like switching to a bigger bed, sleeping in their own room, sleeping outside of the home overnight, and going to daycare. In these cases the Lulla doll can help to make them feel calmer and safer.

 

 

 

 

Is the doll safe for newborns?

The Lulla doll has been thoroughly safety tested to be suitable for newborns. The whole design is with safety in mind. The doll is very light, made from natural materials, has no loose items nor toxic chemicals. However, it is not recommended to have loose items in a crib with a sleeping newborn. We strongly recommend that from birth to 12 months the doll is kept away from their face and not loose in the crib during sleep. The doll has Velcro fasteners so you can attach the doll to most cribs, strollers and other carriers.

How long can I leave my child unattended with the doll?

The doll is not a babysitter and we do not recommend that you leave your child unattended for extended periods of time. Human touch, attention and affection should always be number one, the doll is thought of as a second best when needed.

Why is it not sound activated?

Many sleep- toys are sound activated with the purpose of helping babies fall back asleep if they wake up during the night. We, on the other hand, want to help babies keep sleeping and not to wake up as frequently. The aim is also to help them keep their heartbeat and breathing more stable during sleep. This is achieved by having the sound on continuously.

Is the Lulla doll machine washable?

Yes, it can be washed at 40 degrees celsius. The soundbox has to be removed prior to washing which is easily done as it is placed in a velcro pocket on the back of the doll.

How long do the batteries last?

The Lulla doll comes with batteries that last up to 80-120 hours of playtime. We recommend that they be replaced with rechargeable batteries for better usage. That is also more eco-friendly, which we are all for!

Q & A- about pre orders

When will the dolls be delivered?

We are in our second round of production as sales far exceeded our expectations after our successful crowdfunding campaign. This production is due to be delivered in June of 2016.

 

Do I have to have Paypal to buy?

No, you can also pay with credit card.

 

Do you ship to anywhere?

Yes, global shipping is available! Price for shipping various after location.

What do parents say?

"Our little boy never had problems falling asleep but had trouble sleeping alone. He woke up frequently during the night and his naps during the day were short. The Lulla Doll has helped him a lot, he slept for longer at a time which made it easier for the whole family to rest. For that mom and dad are truly grateful.“ 
- father of 7 month old Ólafur, Iceland
 
 
"Our experience of the Lulla Doll was very positive. Our daughter was born prematurely and she has slept with the doll by her side more or less the first months of her life. It gave her, and us, a feeling of safety and comfort“ 
- mother of 5 month old Bryndís, Iceland
 
 
"My children have had a hard time falling asleep on their own. Lulla helps them fall asleep and also stay asleep, giving their tired mother a long wanted break.“ 
- mother of 3 year old Ísgerður and 6 month old Eyþór, Iceland
"I cannot rate Lulla enough. My one year old was waking every 40 mins even with co-sleeping and I was at my wits end and crippled with exhaustion. I purchased Lulla as a last resort thinking that we had absolutely no hope. On the first night in her cot she woke twice and the second and third night we had a baby that slept through the night. I feel like a human again thank you so much for bringing this into my life."
– Nikki, Australia
 
"I took a chance and bought the Lulla doll. I had heard such amazing reviews and though I had nothing to lose! My 17 month old sons constant waking was sending us mad! We have had Lulla for two weeks and he has slept though almost every night, settling himself when he wakes. It´s been amazing!"
 – Amber, Australia
"Just to say thank you so much for your great invention. Not only does my son love it, but it has the added benefit that when the Lulla doll is on, my husband does not snore! I´ve tested it a few times an as soon as I switch the doll on he stops snoring. It´s a miracle! We all sleep better, so thank you two times. "
– Jessica, Denmark

 

 
Awards & Grants
The doll has been in development and testing for 3 years. It has received awards for both innovation and design. We have also been blessed with numerous grants.

 
Q & A - about the Lulla Doll

How is the Lulla doll different from other soothing plush sound machines?Both the purpose and the design of the Lulla doll differs from other seemingly similar products. The purpose of most other sleep related toys is to help babies fall asleep with the help of white noise, sometimes resembling womb sounds. The Lulla doll, on the other hand, is designed to help babies stay asleep for longer periods at a time, and help babies stabilize and feel safe. The doll is imitating closeness to another person, more than trying to replicate the womb experience. The doll aims to do this with its unique real life sound that plays for 8 hours. Other products only stay on for 15-45 minutes (or are movement activated), the sound file is not this large and the sounds are usually not real-life.What is the recommended age for the Lulla doll?The Lulla doll is suitable from birth. We recommend it for age 0-24 months when closeness is vitally important to a child´s early development and sleeping routine.Would you recommend it for toddlers?We know that many parents let their toddlers use the doll as well and they loved it. Toddlers can face many sleep related challenges like newborns. However, just of a different kind. Like switching to a bigger bed, sleeping in their own room, sleeping outside of the home overnight, and going to daycare. In these cases the Lulla doll can help to make them feel calmer and safer.    Is the doll safe for newborns?The Lulla doll has been thoroughly safety tested to be suitable for newborns. The whole design is with safety in mind. The doll is very light, made from natural materials, has no loose items nor toxic chemicals. However, it is not recommended to have loose items in a crib with a sleeping newborn. We strongly recommend that from birth to 12 months the doll is kept away from their face and not loose in the crib during sleep. The doll has Velcro fasteners so you can attach the doll to most cribs, strollers and other carriers.How long can I leave my child unattended with the doll?The doll is not a babysitter and we do not recommend that you leave your child unattended for extended periods of time. Human touch, attention and affection should always be number one, the doll is thought of as a second best when needed.Why is it not sound activated?Many sleep- toys are sound activated with the purpose of helping babies fall back asleep if they wake up during the night. We, on the other hand, want to help babies keep sleeping and not to wake up as frequently. The aim is also to help them keep their heartbeat and breathing more stable during sleep. This is achieved by having the sound on continuously.Is the Lulla doll machine washable?Yes, it can be washed at 40 degrees celsius. The soundbox has to be removed prior to washing which is easily done as it is placed in a velcro pocket on the back of the doll.How long do the batteries last?The Lulla doll comes with batteries that last up to 80-120 hours of playtime. We recommend that they be replaced with rechargeable batteries for better usage. That is also more eco-friendly, which we are all for!Q & A- about pre ordersWhen will the dolls be delivered?We are in our second round of production as sales far exceeded our expectations after our successful crowdfunding campaign. This production is due to be delivered in June of 2016. Do I have to have Paypal to buy?No, you can also pay with credit card. Do you ship to anywhere?Yes, global shipping is available! Price for shipping various after location.

story:
What I am doing

Hi my name is Raymond Loo and I am an organic farmer on Prince Edward Island

My family and I am asking for your support to help me increase our herd so that I can offer Pasture Raised Meat to more Islanders. Here is a link with more about this and me.

With the larger herd, we can offer a CSA Plan of Meat Boxes to you. The Details are on the right

Here is an example of the Beef Box.

 

The chickens will be available in August. The Pork in September and the Beef in November. We are looking into freezer space as well for those that have limited space. 

This is all about a new connection to the community so we also invite those of you who take the $100 Beef Boxes to join us this fall at a Bar B Q at our farm.

The $1,000 Dinner

You have a celebration coming up in September/October? A birthday? A wedding rehearsal? A Business team to celebrate? A family reunion? A political staff to thank?

We can help you have an amazing evening and you can support local food on PEI.

The $1,000 perk (there are 2 of them) is a 3 course dinner with Roast Beef from me as the main course. The dinner will be cooked by Adam Loo (My son and chef at the Brickhouse). You will have a real English Butler (Rob Paterson) and a full wait and support staff.

All you have to do is to enjoy yourself and supply the drink. We will take care of the rest.

Does this sound good to you or to someone you care for? 

Why I am doing this 

Your support means a lot to me - but I think it also means a lot to all of us - there is more than me involved here

I think that your support will help us make a big change for the better for food quality and for farmers on PEI and maybe everywhere. For every journey starts with one step 

You will help make meat much more healthy - Pasture raised meat is the healthiest meat that you can buy.

If this community business model works, then more people can raise animals this way and more of us can have access to this healthier choice.

You will help restore dignity and health to our animals. You will help them eat what is natural for them and live in an environment that fits their nature.  

By doing this - we honour the animal and the land we depend on. You help restore the family farm and all that family farming brings to society

By helping me, you give confidence to the many young families that are thinking of reinventing the family farm. 

You help farmers get access to community finance again. By helping us you set the example of how we can "Barn Build" again - where we all support each other - where customers and business come together.

Thank you for your support - I look forward to seeing you at the market and online

story:
My background

I am a Mechanical Design Engineer with over 15 years of extensive manufacturing and product development experience. Also, my experience consist of conceptual design, machine design, packaging, injection molding, and Project Management.

Why this campaign is important to me

My passion was derived from a deep connection for my parents who are very dear to me. During the product inception, my parents were at a point in their life where they no longer could bath themselves properly. After realizing how important it was for them to be able to bath themselves without any assistance, I immediately knew I had to design and develop a product to meet their needs. In the process, not knowing at the time, that thousands of individuals with similar and other issues, would benefit from me developing this product. The reality of loosing such a basic ability, of being able to care for their personal hygiene was devastating to my parents, who had been independent all of their life. They finally allowed me to give them baths, but was still very uncomfortable with my doing so. Well, my parents died before they got a chance to see or use this patented product that I developed. My parent’s death made me more determine to finishing the development and manufacturing of the product for others with similar issues. You and I working together can help thousands or millions of people around the world in giving them a sense of independence in bathing themselves, which unfortunately my parents never got that opportunity. The elderly, person with limited range of motion, obesity and diabetes are real concerns and I am happy to know that I am playing a major role in helping to make many lives better. It gives me great pleasure to think that the product I have developed could be instrumental in saving someone from having a foot amputation or maybe saving a life. Because the facts are, after two amputations the average person does not live more than five years.

What contributors will help me achieve

I desire to raise funds to purchase inventory and market the product to make it available for everyone having limited range of motion and other health related issues. Your contribution will enable us to reach a wide audience by marketing this product on DRTV, social media, hospitals, doctors, nursing homes, etc. Currently we have little inventory and need funds to purchase parts and market the product. The funds will strictly be used for this purpose only. Your contribution will help us make this product available to millions of people. I am sure you know of someone who has a need for this product. Most people who have limited range of motion, have difficulties reaching to clean their lower extremities. Persons who are diabetic, need to inspect their feet every day for sores or ulcers.  Also, the product will help facilitate people with multiple sclerosis who have problems standing on one foot to wash underneath the other foot. This product can also help individuals who have hip, knee and back problems as well as obese individuals. Our product will benefit returning Veterans who have war time injuries to their back or lower extremities. Some veterans are also diabetic.

                                      Returning Veterans

                              
 

America’s paralyzed veterans have sacrificed so much to protect our country and preserve our freedoms. A donation to Veterans will help our veterans overcome their setbacks and live rich, productive lives. Your support will help us provide rehabilitation and health services, job training, family support, and funding for research working toward better treatments for spinal cord injury and ultimately, a cure. However you choose to support Veterans, your help will make a real difference in our heroes’ lives. Thank you for it.

                                         Diabetes  

Will you help me to prevent this from occuring? you can by simply supporting my cause. After two amputations the average person does not live more than 5 years.

                                          

Foot ulcers are sores on the feet that can involve just the skin’s surface or can develop into more serious wounds, possibly leading to the loss of a limb. People with chronic conditions, such as diabetes, are particularly susceptible to foot ulcers. In fact, about 15 percent (over 4 million nation wide) of all people with diabetes will develop a foot ulcer at some point in their lives. Practicing good foot care can put the brakes on foot ulcers before they start.

Looking carefully at your feet each day, including between the toes is extremely inportant. If you cannot do this yourself, you should get someone else to do it for you:

  • Looking at your feet is particularly important if you have reduced sensation in your feet, as you may not notice anything wrong at first until you look.
  • having a mirror to monitor your feet each day is extremly inportant for (cut, bruise, blister, redness or bleeding)
  • Use an aparatus for moisturising oil or applying cream for dry skin to prevent cracking.
  • Look out for athlete's foot (a common minor skin infection). It causes flaky skin and cracks between the toes, which can become a sore and than infected. If you get athlete's foot, it should be treated with an antifungal cream.                                   

                                                        Obesity


                                           

The Centers for Disease Control recently released its Vital Signs report on adult obesity, based on a telephone survey of 400,000 people, and the numbers were undeniably alarming. According to the report, about 2.4 million more adults were obese in 2009 than in 2007. In fact, more than 72 million U.S. adults—or 26.7 percent—are now obese. This is an epidemic in America among adults and children. Of the many statistics about childhood obesity, one in particular highlights the urgency of the problem: One of every three children in America is now considered overweight or obese, and childhood obesity has more than tripled in the past 30 years. As this number continue to climb there are going to be some health issues associated, like type 2 diabetes. Being able to monitor and cleanse areas of your body is going to be an issue with some overweight or obese person. Managing good hygiene is going to be a real concern for some who can’t reach their lower extremities because of being overweight or obese.

What and Why we need the funds for this campaign

I want to raise $165K dollars that will help with marketing needed for DRTV, Internet marketing and purchasing inventory. Your contribution will change so many lives throughout the world. Therefore we would encourage you to contribute in some way. The funds donated for this worthy cause will make a major impact by providing individuals with a better quality of life. It is my passion and full commitment in getting this product into the hands of thousands of individuals that can benefit from its usage. I have been focused on this project for a few years and I am totally committed, because of the needs that so many people have.  We have built a relationship with the VA hospitals and other non profit organizations in helping those individuals with health issues. This product will help the elderly, diabetics, obese indiviuals, veterans, person with multiple sclerosis and so many other people. The benefits from the use of this product is enormous!

What your contribution does for Veterans

($25 contribution) 5 Samples of Premier Skin Care Cream

Each product will be donated to a Paralyzed Veteran or organization, to help with the management of their hygiene and health care. We will attach your name to the product so that the Veteran will know who is sponsoring the product.

($75 contribution) 1 Shower Buddie donated to a Veteran

Each product will be donated to a Paralyzed Veteran or organization, to help with the management of their hygiene and health care. We will attach your name to the product so that the Veteran will know who is sponsoring the product.

($150 contribution) 2 Shower Buddies donated to Veterans

Each product will be donated to a Paralyzed Veteran or organization, to help with the management of their hygiene and health care. We will attach your name to the product so that the Veteran will know who is sponsoring the product.

($200 contribution) 3 Shower Buddies donated to Veterans

Each product will be donated to a Paralyzed Veteran or organization, to help with the management of their hygiene and health care. We will attach your name to the product so that the Veteran will know who is sponsoring the product.

($300 contribution) 4 Shower Buddies donated to Veterans

Each product will be donated to a Paralyzed Veteran or organization, to help with the management of their hygiene and health care. We will attach your name to the product so that the Veteran will know who is sponsoring the product.

($400 contribution) 5 Shower Buddies donated to Veterans

Each product will be donated to a Paralyzed Veteran or organization, to help with the management of their hygiene and health care. We will attach your name to the product so that the Veteran will know who is sponsoring the product.

($500 contribution) 6 Shower Buddies donated to Veterans

Each product will be donated to a Paralyzed Veteran or organization, to help with the management of their hygiene and health care. We will attach your name to the product so that the Veteran will know who is sponsoring the product.

Whatever funds are raised will go toward marketing and inventory regardless if I don’t raise all the funds are not we will still send the products to Paralyzed Veterans or related organizations.

The Impact

This project is valuable to people around the world for several reasons. The product not only will help individuals with limited range of motion but also, back , knee and hip problems, diabetics, multiple sclerosis, spinal cord injuries and people who are obese. Persons who are diabetic are at risk of having foot amputations if they don’t take care their feet. Statistics show that normally after two or more amputations a person dose not live more than five years. Therefore, the product can be used in helping to prevent this from occuring. National statistics reports that 65% of the country is overweight and 31% of those persons are morbidly obese. In addition, there are over 28 million people in the U.S. who are diabetic and millions more with arthritis and other conditions. People in those categories form a massive market totaling over 180 million. This problem is not limited to the USA but worldwide. Our product simply will make it easier for those with the above conditions, who simply can’t reach those hard to reach areas, to take care of their personal hygiene without any assistance. This product will foster a sense of independence, pride and confidence.

This is the first patented health care product of its kind

This product is the only health related product that I have developed. To date, I have successfully gotten the product into local Walgreens stores, local hospitals,Veteran's Hospital and Paralyzed Veterans of America news letter a none for profit organization. This is why funding is needed to give the product more exposure.

My Dedication

I have been working to get this product out to the general public and finally its finished. We have identified groups like Paralyzed Veterans of America as being one of the organizations that we would like to make this product available too. In my research I realized that many of our Veterans are diabetic, living alone and need medical care of their feet . I am fully committed to making this happen as I see the need and have personally witnessed the joy on the faces of people that have purchased the product. Several people have thanked me for developing this product as it has met their needs and simplified their lives dramatically. I know by marketing the product via info commercial will open up the awareness of the product to millions of people. Until people start to take full responsibility for their health and eating habits, the problem will only worsen.

$$$$ Other Ways That You May Help and be compensated $$$$

Here is an opportunity for everyone to participate in getting the word out about the product. The incentive for those individuals that do not have money to contribute, you may know someone who has a need for our product. If you refer someone and they purchase the product online; we are giving you 5% of the MSRP. Just simply provide us with the Code 1970 and their name. The only other requirement we ask is for you to open a pay pal account. After your referral make a purchase, your payment will be deposited into your pay pal account. There are millions of people who have a need for this product. Your earning ability is up to you. It is possible for you to earn thousands of dollars by simply referring our product for people to purchase.

I know by marketing the product via info commercial will open up the awareness of the product to millions of people. Until people start to take full responsibility for their health and eating habits, the problem will only worsen.


$$$$ Other Ways That You May Help and be compensated $$$$
Here is an opportunity for everyone to participate in getting the word out about the product. The incentive for those individuals that do not have money to contribute, you may know someone who has a need for our product. If you refer someone and they purchase the product online; we are giving you 5% of the MSRP. Just simply provide us with the Code 1970 and their name. The only other requirement we ask is for you to open a pay pal account. After your referral make a purchase, your payment will be deposited into your pay pal account. There are millions of people who have a need for this product. Your earning ability is up to you. It is possible for you to earn thousands of dollars by simply referring our product for people to purchase.

story:
Terry Ducharme Chemotherapy Marathon Fundraiser

Dear Family and friends:

My name is Mark Dalla-Vicenza and I am writing on behalf of the Terry Ducharme Chemotherapy Marathon Fundraiser. I am asking for your support at a special event that I will be participating in October 13, 2013. I will be running in the Bank of America Chicago Marathon to raise funds for Terry's chemotherapy treatments.

Terry is a personal friend and business colleague I have known for a number of years. Just over a year ago, she was a vibrant, high-spirited single mother devoted to her disabled daughter and dedicated to her job working for a coffee warehousing and distribution business known as the Jordan Company. Then she received a diagnosis of Common Bile Duct that metastasized to Liver Cancer. This shattered her life. Terry was forced to leave her job after 10 years of service because of the side effects of chemotherapy and the need to stay positive and focused on her treatment. She later learned that her employer was forced to close its doors for financial reasons, leaving her without her long-term disability pension.

It is hard to fathom the misfortune Terry now faces. Already terminally ill, raising her disabled daughter and making mortgage payments on a disability pension, Terry has now lost her most important source of income. The standard course of treatment would cause her to lose her hair, appetite and energy. I want to raise $20,000 so she can receive a less invasive therapy so she can carry out the remainder of her life with more dignity and a better quality of life.

The Chicago Marathon is the pinnacle of achievement for elite athletes and everyday runners alike. Athletes from 50 states and more than 100 countries will set out to realize their dreams by reaching the finish line in Grant Park after running 26.2 miles. When I cross the line, I will have completed my second marathon. I finished the Vancouver Marathon in 2005.

In addition to the athletic component of this event, many competitors use it as an opportunity to raise funds for charitable causes close to their hearts. I can think of no more worthy cause than helping a friend in need and I hope you will join me. Please go to www.indiegogo.com/projects/terry-ducharme-chemotherapy-marathon-fundraiser to make a donation.

We have all been through times in our lives when we need the comfort and support of others. I hope I can count on you for help providing needed support for this most deserving person.

Together we can make a real difference to Terry and her family.

Sincerely,

Mark Dalla-Vicenza

story: I am 50 years old I have 2 children , I was diagnosed with colon cancer in 2010 at the same time my twin sister was also diagnosed with the same colon cancer , her battle ended June 18th 2012 and I am now a twinless twin, I have no medical insurance but I have worked all of my life , I want to keep fighting I have just had my fourth surgery and I want to beat this but the bills must be paid , My goal is to win the battle and help others like me please any amount helps.

story:
Joe Felton and Jonathan Peloquin have been seriously injured in a car accident on the night of May 8th. They are currently at UMass Memorial Medical Center in Worcester. Jon is dealing win many injuries, but I have recently heard that he has woken up. Joe has suffered brain swelling and they are still assessing the damage that it has caused. They are surrounded by their loved ones and their friends and family across the country are sending healing vibes, love and prayers their way. This fundraiser will be to help their families deal with the medical expenses during this stressful time. Their healing will be a long process, and they need our help! Donate anything you can, and if you can't, please donate your healing thoughts and positive energy. 

We love you Joe and Jon! Stay strong!!!
