story:
About the Tour

In January 2014, Fresh Comics turns three years old! Introduced in 2011, it quickly became the app of choice for comic book fans worldwide to follow their favorite creators and series for each week's Wednesday releases. Since then, we've expanded the app to include a built-in shop locator, events and sales happening nearby, and a full listing of comic conventions around the world. You can find it on your favorite app store by searching for "Fresh Comics".

Did we mention that we did all of this without charging a single penny?

After years of serving the comic book community, we're looking for some help to take the app on the road. We're looking to spread the word about Fresh Comics and tell readers, retailers, and convention runners about Fresh Comics and find ways to make it a more complete and useful compendium of everything happening in the comics community.

While we've implemented all obvious electronic approaches to reach out, a 2012 trip to C2E2 demonstrated that there's simply no substitute for getting out there and meeting people in person. With that in mind, we want to take Fresh Comics on the road to the following shows this year:

  1. Chi-Fi 2014 (Chicago, March 27-30) (Details)
  2. C2E2 (Chicago, April 25-27)
  3. Wizard World (Rosemont, August 21-24)
These three shows reach a large audience and are ones that we can attend without needing lodging, increasing the bang for your buck. The more we raise beyond the initial goal will allow us to add more shows to the schedule and spread the word even further. 

How Your Support Helps Us

Attending conventions is not cheap. Even ignoring the logistical costs of transportation and lodging, the fees for table and booths add up quickly. For example, attending a show like C2E2 can easily exceed $1000 once you factor in the base fee, amenities like electricity, lunch for helpers and more. Thus, the bulk of your support will go toward offsetting those expenses.

In addition to the direct convention costs, we're also looking to put together a decent road kit for shows down the road. This kit includes:

  • Attractive & colorful signage that help us stand out in busy aisles.
  • Fun swag and other free items that bring fans to the table.
  • Postcards and other pre-convention promotional materials that let people know where to find us at the show.
Like everything else, things like postcards and swag are cheaper the more you buy, so each additional dollar donated will have a larger impact than the one that came before it. At the end of this campaign, we want to have a solid setup that we can deploy to any convention and get the word out in a fun, colorful, and effective manner. 

How Your Support Helps You

The more you support Fresh Comics, the more time and resources we can pour into the app. While we have the weekly releases and shop locators in pretty good shape, we have a whole roadmap of new things for the app, including:

  • More issue previews from more publishers. Take a look into that issue before you buy it.
  • Integrating with your local comic shop and online retailers to help you pick up that issue you missed last month.
  • Support for more platforms, such as tablets and desktop computers. Find out what you want, anywhere you may be.
  • Collection management support. Catalog your collection so that you fill the holes without accidentally picking up the same issue twice.
Publishers, retailers, and show runners pay more attention to an app with a million fans than one with a thousand, so the more support we can drum up at these conventions directly translates into a better Fresh Comics experience as we become someone who can bring more to the table.

At this point, you're probably wondering, "But what about the perks? That's why I'm here!" Never fear, we have those covered as well:

  • For the super fans who support us in the range of $10 to $100 donations, we'll set you up with a full package of the swag we'll be giving out to fans at the show. This includes any postcards, stickers, or Favicards featuring the artwork of Brian Thomas and Kris Anderson (these were a big hit at 2012's C2E2).
  • For a limited number of mega fans that support us with more than $100, we'll save a seat for you at the table and give you one of our passes that comes with the table or booth purchase. You can help us pitch Fresh Comics to folks passing by or simply hang out and use our table as your local secret lair. (Conventions are much more fun, when you have a place you can rest and regroup right there on the floor.)
For everyone else, you'll always have Fresh Comics on your favorite mobile device with the latest updates every week.

Other Ways You Can Help

If the holiday season (or your favorite publisher) has emptied your pockets, you can still help us out by spreading the word about this campaign and Fresh Comics. At the end of the day, we're looking to boost the size of the app's audience so if you can get 10 friends using it, that's probably as good (if not better) than 10 Favicards handed out at the show. So, if you can't make a contribution, you'll still be our hero by helping get the word out in your local community.

(C2E2 Photo Credit: -EMR-, http://bit.ly/1fCxU58)
story_txt:
About the TourIn January 2014, Fresh Comics turns three years old! Introduced in 2011, it quickly became the app of choice for comic book fans worldwide to follow their favorite creators and series for each week's Wednesday releases. Since then, we've expanded the app to include a built-in shop locator, events and sales happening nearby, and a full listing of comic conventions around the world. You can find it on your favorite app store by searching for "Fresh Comics".Did we mention that we did all of this without charging a single penny?After years of serving the comic book community, we're looking for some help to take the app on the road. We're looking to spread the word about Fresh Comics and tell readers, retailers, and convention runners about Fresh Comics and find ways to make it a more complete and useful compendium of everything happening in the comics community.While we've implemented all obvious electronic approaches to reach out, a 2012 trip to C2E2 demonstrated that there's simply no substitute for getting out there and meeting people in person. With that in mind, we want to take Fresh Comics on the road to the following shows this year:

Chi-Fi 2014 (Chicago, March 27-30) (Details)

C2E2 (Chicago, April 25-27)
Wizard World (Rosemont, August 21-24)
These three shows reach a large audience and are ones that we can attend without needing lodging, increasing the bang for your buck. The more we raise beyond the initial goal will allow us to add more shows to the schedule and spread the word even further. How Your Support Helps UsAttending conventions is not cheap. Even ignoring the logistical costs of transportation and lodging, the fees for table and booths add up quickly. For example, attending a show like C2E2 can easily exceed $1000 once you factor in the base fee, amenities like electricity, lunch for helpers and more. Thus, the bulk of your support will go toward offsetting those expenses.In addition to the direct convention costs, we're also looking to put together a decent road kit for shows down the road. This kit includes:
Attractive & colorful signage that help us stand out in busy aisles.
Fun swag and other free items that bring fans to the table.

Postcards and other pre-convention promotional materials that let people know where to find us at the show.

Like everything else, things like postcards and swag are cheaper the more you buy, so each additional dollar donated will have a larger impact than the one that came before it. At the end of this campaign, we want to have a solid setup that we can deploy to any convention and get the word out in a fun, colorful, and effective manner. How Your Support Helps YouThe more you support Fresh Comics, the more time and resources we can pour into the app. While we have the weekly releases and shop locators in pretty good shape, we have a whole roadmap of new things for the app, including:
More issue previews from more publishers. Take a look into that issue before you buy it.
Integrating with your local comic shop and online retailers to help you pick up that issue you missed last month.
Support for more platforms, such as tablets and desktop computers. Find out what you want, anywhere you may be.
Collection management support. Catalog your collection so that you fill the holes without accidentally picking up the same issue twice.
Publishers, retailers, and show runners pay more attention to an app with a million fans than one with a thousand, so the more support we can drum up at these conventions directly translates into a better Fresh Comics experience as we become someone who can bring more to the table.At this point, you're probably wondering, "But what about the perks? That's why I'm here!" Never fear, we have those covered as well:
For the super fans who support us in the range of $10 to $100 donations, we'll set you up with a full package of the swag we'll be giving out to fans at the show. This includes any postcards, stickers, or Favicards featuring the artwork of Brian Thomas and Kris Anderson (these were a big hit at 2012's C2E2).
For a limited number of mega fans that support us with more than $100, we'll save a seat for you at the table and give you one of our passes that comes with the table or booth purchase. You can help us pitch Fresh Comics to folks passing by or simply hang out and use our table as your local secret lair. (Conventions are much more fun, when you have a place you can rest and regroup right there on the floor.)
For everyone else, you'll always have Fresh Comics on your favorite mobile device with the latest updates every week.Other Ways You Can HelpIf the holiday season (or your favorite publisher) has emptied your pockets, you can still help us out by spreading the word about this campaign and Fresh Comics. At the end of the day, we're looking to boost the size of the app's audience so if you can get 10 friends using it, that's probably as good (if not better) than 10 Favicards handed out at the show. So, if you can't make a contribution, you'll still be our hero by helping get the word out in your local community.(C2E2 Photo Credit: -EMR-, http://bit.ly/1fCxU58)

story:
Customised ancient Breathing Practices for specific conditions.
It's the first app of its kind in the world.

"The breath is the intelligence
of the body"

T.K.V. Desikachar


Breath Taking is based on a collective 40 years of leading breath professionals including renowned biologists, yoga therapists and doctors.


It’s this experience, combined with the fact that the digital health market is one of the fastest growing industries (80% every year) that led us to develop
Breath Taking: a series of apps which will address conditions like: 

  • Blood Pressure
  • Sleep Issues
  • Fear of Flying and wait for it....
  • Erectile Dysfunction (Yes, there's a breath for that).



Click on the play button above. It's only a short sample to give you a taste. 

You can also try the tracks in their full length here (they are live for 2 weeks only)

The Blood Pressure Breath

The first, and most essential app we've created is designed to target your parasympathetic nervous system and induce calming effects.
To measure this, we've also included tools to record your vitals (BP, pulse, and state of mind).
We've called it Breath Taking for Blood Pressure (BT4 Blood Pressure)  and it will be test (beta) launched in Dec 2015.
We know how calm we feel after a relaxing practice like breathing.
Science has done the research.
But when we graph your results, you can actually SEE how relaxed you FEEL and thereby become your own research experiment. 


You'll be able to share this information with your practitioner or friend; set yourself reminders, choose your own background music, length of practice, and breath length. The app will be rich in content yet simple to use.

"Slow and regular breathing was found to be efficacious in reducing high BP during 2 months of self-treatment by patients at home"
Ehud Grossman, Journal of Human Hypertension

You, as a donor, will have a direct impact on someone’s health.
That's a pretty fabulous contribution, don't you think?




Our Strategy

Because we're interested in the creative process, we decided to build this from scratch and learn many of the systems it requires to successfully design, market and inspire.

Once this BT4 Blood Pressure breath has been released, we'll focus on subsequent apps:
  • BT4 Sleep Issues
  • BT4 Fear of Flying
  • BT4 Erectile Dysfunction
  • BT Library

Here are some more situations our BT Library will address:
  • Pitching an idea
  • Performance anxiety (on the stage, as an athlete, or in the boardroom)
  • Interviews
  • Exams
  • Addictions
  • High Anxiety
  • Grief/ Trauma
  • Pre-natal preparations
  • The First Date
  • Paramedic’s breath for victims at-the-scene
  • Panic Attacks
  • Traffic jams
  • Drowsy driving
  • The Dentist chair
  • A Difficult Conversation
  • Relationship challenges at home or at work
  • Anticipating an Upcoming Event that we’re not looking forward to (like surgery)
  • Dealing with an Upset Child
  • A Noisy Neighbor

From our extensive research, we believe that these apps will be the first of their kind in the world in terms of delivering customised breaths for common situations.





Our Compelling Story

Over a decade ago, Baxter and Isabelle met in Mallorca and were invited to inspect a rare piece of jungle in South-East Asia that nobody had seen since the French in 1945. The trip forged a strong friendship and mutual respect where they slept in caves, swam in the Mekong, and ended up on a fig farm in Australia (special plug here for Willabrand figs).

Isabelle returned to Spain where she developed her talents in filmmaking and editing, baby making and raising.

It was a journey which also led Baxter to the Yoga mat. Within a year, she traveled to India, studied in an ashram and become an instructor. Since then, there has rarely been a day that Yoga hasn't featured in Baxter's life.

A desire to apply Yoga in a more beneficial way lead Baxter to study a post graduate with Yoga Therapy Australia under some of the most experienced teachers in the world from the KYM lineage.

Wanting to create an on-line presence to deliver the benefits of Yoga more efficiently without compromising the principles of Therapeutic Yoga, she realised that breath practices hold the key - for three reasons:

  • They can be customised to the user via a simple assessment.
  • They create no harm or injury.
  • They are simple and efficient, no matter how complex the issue.




14 years later, Baxter and Isabelle reunited in LA and, given their qualifications, skills, and creative compatibility, they decided to work on this Breath Taking project together.

And because things come full circle, Baxter is now the proud Godmother of Sienna, Isabelle's 6 month old daughter.

The rest of the team came together under synchronistic circumstances, like a chance conversation in a Yoga classes, or a bike ride along a desert trail.

We feel fortunate to have drawn such a talented team together. It's because we believe in what we do.


"Why can’t I just use my own breath to calm me down?"

It’s very difficult for anybody to maintain a conscious breathing pattern for longer than one minute (try it for yourself and see how it long it takes you to forget about your breath). Generic practices work, but are nowhere near as efficient as ones specifically designed for specific conditions. Only people who have been trained in Viniyoga are qualified to deliver such practices.


"Too simple to be true?"

Almost. But the key is in the simplicity. The more simple it is, the more effective.

Overwhelming research (by the institutions below) shows how mindful practices such as these create the ‘relaxation response’ which have a positive, pervasive effect on your physiological systems.




"Evidence suggests that these practices result in physiological effects such as increased parasympathetic drive, calming of stress response systems, neuroendocrine release of hormones, and modulation of thalamic generators."
Brown RP, Gerbarg PL

How Will Your Donation Be Spent?

$15,000 is not much for a project like this.

Quotes we received from app makers were in the ballpark of $100k-$125k but because we like to be a part of the creative process, we've done most of the work  ourselves to get it to this stage of pre-release.

Calculations show we've contributed US$73,500 in sweat equity plus $7000 in cash. That's $80k over two years.

Here's where we need cash to unlock future steps:

  • $0 toward salaries in this BT4 Blood Pressure app (we're all working on sweat equity)
  • $3600 (first year) legal and accounting
  • $800 to set up an LLC in the US.
  • $5000 for a digital marketing agency to manage to app's release (they usually charge around $50k)
  • 5% of total donations go to Indiegogo in fees + 3-5% in Paypal fees (we encourage you to donate with your credit card)
  • Approx 75% of the Himalayan trek perk goes to ground expenses incurred
  • Ongoing work to develop future apps like BT4 Sleep will begin as soon as this BT4 Blood Pressure is launched which will require initial costs of $5000.

As you can see, $15,000 doesn't go that far, and we're hoping to exceed this goal. If that's is the case, we have plenty of stretch goals to update you on as the campaign evolves.


More money equals more opportunities for us to market and distribute the
BT4 Blood Pressure, which we'll invest into both attending and exhibiting at these conferences in the US and Australia:

Flexible Funding vs Fixed Funding

We chose Indigogo’s ‘Keep-it-all’ model over ‘All-or nothing’, because this train will leave the station regardless of funds raised - how far it runs will literally depend on how much we raise.


In addition, choosing the 'All or Nothing' model means we give you the option of donating via Paypal OR credit card (the other 'Fixed Funding' method allows Paypal ONLY, and we encourage you to avoid the 3-5% fee and donate with your credit card, if possible.




The Team

Baxter (co-founder and creator) has developed a healthy following of thousands as a Yoga Instructor and Therapist for over a decade. You may have taken a class with her one summer in Sorrento where she runs Yoga in the Park every day, or at another location across southern Australia where she has trained many teachers in a style developed especially for the outdoors.
Researching how to apply Yoga to technology, Baxter trained with Appster in San Francisco, and was a part of Samsung’s developer’s conference where this concept was first endorsed by the company’s Vice President.

Creating an app is more than just technology however, it’s a business requiring skills in leadership, marketing, creativity, design, and vision (timing is most important). After two successful start-ups already, Baxter’s combined background of business (AB) and Yoga (PGDYT) makes for an interesting mix in digital health.

Isabelle Fournet is a brilliant, passionate European who is proud of her Viking blood.  She moved from Spain to LA to work with more challenging and diverse projects. Her talent is for visual imagery as an editor, graphic designer, and short documentary filmmaker.
Isabelle has worked with international ad agencies creating award-winning tv commercials, and is a great advocate of environmental projects donating her time and skill to many documentaries.
She is currently working with Mosaic Of Change and Obscura to create a visual event for UNESCO's 70th anniversary and COP21 conferences in Paris, 2015.
In addition to being an invaluable contributor with her wealth of creative experience, Isabelle is also a solid co-founder in this partnership.

Dilpreet Singh our coding engineer is an Honours student at Monash University in Melbourne, Australia. Not only is he a shining star in his professor's eyes, he has gone above and beyond any expectations we could've ever wished for from a coder. His calm nature, ability to process instructions, interest in lifestyle apps and ability to contribute way outside his job description have made him an invaluable asset to the team.

Our wonderful musical composer out of Sardinia, Stefano Guzzetti, is a busy man. He's composed soundtracks both for film and documentaries,  designed music and sound for video games, and his recent track "Haiku" just reached 5.2 million followers.
His experience in Zen meditation combined with his masterful instrumental and sound engineering skills have produced some beautifully eloquent tracks for our app.

Big thanks to Dr John Betts, university lecturer in mathematics and data analytics, for the generous time he has spent offering direction, advice and guidance to this project. For his contribution, he'll receive a season's pass to Yoga in the Park in Sorrento this year!

Special mention to Liam Blake and Duncan Bridgeman who have offered their valuable time, skill and input in the music department. Very talented guys whose efforts we appreciate.

Our heartfelt appreciation to two highly esteemed and deeply respected leaders in their field of Yoga Therapy for their contributions and advice:
Dr N. Chandrasekaran and Saraswathi Vasudevan

Also to Eileen Pedersen, Erin Donnelly, and Ian Fraser for their timely contributions to keep us on track, provide insights, and general ongoing support.

And finally to everyone out there who has offered to help share and support this campaign. It's our first announcement to the world, and knowing you are on-board means the universe to us!!!

story:
A Matter of Life and Breath

 

Bob Anderson has been married to his best friend, Kari, for 32-years.  They have three children and two grand daughters.

 

Three years ago, Bob was in good health.  He just started a new job with the Nevada Division of Insurance and was in the prime of life at age 54.

 

Within a short period of time and without any warning signs, Bob developed a chronic dry cough.  He became short of breath after minimal exertion and felt fatigued in the middle of the afternoon.  Antibiotics did not help and new symptoms in the form of swollen joints, hair loss and skin rashes added to the dry cough and fatigue.  Bob was hospitalized in April of 2010 and was diagnosed with idiopathic (ILD) interstitial lung disease. 

 

A series of treatments were prescribed over the next two-years, but the lung tissue became permanently scarred.  By January 2011, Bob’s lungs were only functioning at 30 percent and he had no choice except to become a long term disabled state retiree. Now, with many medical tests completed, Bob has been listed as a lung transplant candidate with the (UCSF) University of California Medical Center in San Francisco.

 

Over these three-years, Bob has exhausted all savings.  He needs financial assistance to cover insurance deductibles, co-pays, out-of-pocket cost, travel expenses and short term housing in San Francisco to ensure his lung transplant and recovery can be performed.

 

Please help Bob meet his financial obligations associated with the lung transplant. Total cost and expenses not covered by insurance are estimated to exceed $ 9,000 per year.

story:
In remembrance of June

As we all grieve, one thing is for sure, June's life was not lived in vain. Please contribute what you can to help us give him proper, dignified burial. 


No donation is too great or too small, anything you can give will help us to give him the going home ceremony he deserves.  


Other Ways of Giving 

If you would like to give a cash donation, please email at dzhamlett@yahoo.com and we can make arrangements. 


Our Sincerest Thank You

There may be those who are not in a situation that will allow them to give monetary assistance, we understand and just ask that you continue to pray for us and sent June your prayers and kind thoughts that he may now live in peace. We thank you for all of your love and support. 


His loss may be over our heads, but it is beneath Jesus feet. God is in control. June would want us all to grow stronger in our faith and remember his smile. LIVE IN PEACE.

story:
"Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around."
- Leo F. Buscaglia

The first thing that jumps out when you first see Jeanne is her radiating smile. 
A smile that has been a constant throughout all the hurdles she has overcome in her life. 
Jeanne worked tirelessly multiple jobs as a single mom to raise and support her two kids, all while coping with family members suffering from cancer.  Tragically she lost her mother, aunt, sister and brother to this deadly disease, but her smile kept her and the people she loves around her going strong.

Although not done with ease, Jeanne eventually prevailed and started over.  In August 2008, her hard work paid off; she rebuilt her life in North Carolina and she fulfilled her lifelong dream of owning a Home Decor Store, known as Mee Shells, that expressed her artistic talents. 
In May 2011, just when the business started thriving, Jeanne was diagnosed with HER-2 (Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2), an aggressive form of breast cancer.  Fortunately for her it was found at Stage 1, however it can easily jump to Stage 4. 
After a double mastectomy and several treatments of chemotherapy, the life she fought to rebuild is under attack once again due to mounting debt caused by her absence throughout this trial.

I am Jeanne's friend Valerie.  After enduring the loss of my mother, Jeanne stepped in and picked me up off the floor when I fell, like she has done for countless people throughout her life.  Now is our chance to return her selflessness.

Jeanne is on the verge of losing her life's work.  Your support will help pay for the bills that accumulated during her treatments, and get her back on track to keep her home and business alive.  100% of your donations will go to Jeanne's cause.


In return, you will receive a limited edition hand made one of a kind piece from Mee Shells Home Decor made by her artisan daughter, Michelle Costello. 

So go ahead, click on the contribute tab and get your exclusive decorative piece, all while helping Jeanne keep her dream alive and her smile shining...


Every bit of help counts.  Check us out on Facebook.

If you cannot contribute at this time please spread, spread, spread the word! 


We thank you!

* Fine print:
All items will ship withing 4-6 weeks of the end of the campaign.
Shipping is included on all contributions.

Did we mention we thank you?
:D


"A smile is a curve that sets everything straight"  - Phyllis Diller

Please reach out with a smile and your support to help Jeanne through the biggest fight of her life...
story_txt:
"Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around." - Leo F. BuscagliaThe first thing that jumps out when you first see Jeanne is her radiating smile.  A smile that has been a constant throughout all the hurdles she has overcome in her life.  Jeanne worked tirelessly multiple jobs as a single mom to raise and support her two kids, all while coping with family members suffering from cancer.  Tragically she lost her mother, aunt, sister and brother to this deadly disease, but her smile kept her and the people she loves around her going strong.Although not done with ease, Jeanne eventually prevailed and started over.  In August 2008, her hard work paid off; she rebuilt her life in North Carolina and she fulfilled her lifelong dream of owning a Home Decor Store, known as Mee Shells, that expressed her artistic talents.  In May 2011, just when the business started thriving, Jeanne was diagnosed with HER-2 (Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2), an aggressive form of breast cancer.  Fortunately for her it was found at Stage 1, however it can easily jump to Stage 4.  After a double mastectomy and several treatments of chemotherapy, the life she fought to rebuild is under attack once again due to mounting debt caused by her absence throughout this trial.I am Jeanne's friend Valerie.  After enduring the loss of my mother, Jeanne stepped in and picked me up off the floor when I fell, like she has done for countless people throughout her life.  Now is our chance to return her selflessness.

story:
Our Story

One of our dearest friends, Carl & Whitney DeJohn have been faced with caring for their amazing two year old son (Carl Joseph DeJohn III) whom has a congenital heart defect (Hypoplastic Left Heart Syndrome).  CJ was born August 19, 2009 while they were living in Colorado Springs, but these circumstances caused them to move their lives back to Cleveland this past year.


CJ just had his third heart surgery September 2, 2011, just days after his second birthday.  While the heart surgery was a success, CJ suffered a stroke and subsequent seizures during his recovery, and is now in intensive therapy to regain movement of the left side of his body and re-learn many of the motor skills he has lost.


Our group of friends has watched from the sidelines for far too long, as Carl and Whitney have been absolute rocks, rising to meet every earth shattering challenge that approaches CJ.  As medical bills pile up dating back to CJ’s birth, and Whitney being the primary care-giver for CJ and unable to work, we are coming together to raise money to alleviate the pressure on these amazing parents.


We felt compelled as friends to do something. Carl and Whitney have been nothing less than stoic throughout this experience, cherish every moment with CJ, and would never ask for anything.  CJ is the happiest and sweetest little guy who touches everyone’s hearts that come in contact with him.


In CJ's Parents Words...

Starting our life together in Colorado Springs, we were excited to welcome what we thought was a perfectly healthy baby boy. All the doctors, tests, and ultrasounds throughout the pregnancy told us that everything looked normal. We had no idea the kind of devastating and life altering changes that were coming. During labor and delivery there was still no indication of any problems.  The umbilical cord was wrapped around his neck so they took him to the NICU for “just a few tests”.  Next thing we knew he was being flown to Denver Children’s Hospital and told that our newborn baby, who we hadn’t even held yet, had a potentially fatal heart defect called Hypoplastic Left Heart Syndrome (HLHS). We had 2 options, a heart transplant or a series of 3 surgeries over the first few years of his life.

It was decided the best option for CJ was a series of surgeries called the Norwood Procedure. This meant he would be on the operating table for his 1st open heart surgery at just 5 days old. He made it out of surgery and stayed in the hospital for 5 weeks with both of us at his bedside, not going to work, not living in our home, and not sure if he would make it to the next surgery or the next day. Between the 1st and the 2nd surgery he developed a bad infection under the incision on his chest. After multiple trips back and forth to the hospital and concerns of infection and blood disease, the surgeon took CJ once again to the operating room to remove one of the stainless steel wires holding his chest closed. This lead into his 2nd open heart surgery at 5 months old, the Glenn Procedure, which was successful, with zero complications or infections. He recovered so nicely from that surgery we were very hopeful for our future.


During this time we discovered that the 7000ft elevation in Colorado would eventually cause problems with CJ’s development.  Up until this point he had been tethered to an oxygen tank, but just like any kid he began tearing the hoses from his face. That’s when we decided to leave the life we built in Colorado and move to Ohio where he would ultimately have a better quality of life at a lower elevation. We left family, friends, jobs, and our home, which we lost in a short-sale, to move in with relatives for 6 months until we could afford to live on our own. That was one of the hardest things we’ve ever done, but we knew it was all for CJ.


Before we knew it, it was time for CJ’s 3rd  and hopefully final open heart surgery, the Fontan Procedure. We had been told that after this surgery kids with HLHS really take off physically and developmentally, they have more energy and are more medically stable. We were so excited to move on with our lives without another major surgery looming over our 2 year old.


We were not prepared for what happened next: while recovering from this past open heart surgery, CJ had a stroke which manifested into multiple seizures. We’ve never felt so helpless, watching your baby seize is something no parent should have to see. As a result of the stroke caused by the surgery CJ was temporarily paralyzed on his left side. We were devastated.  We had brought in a running, jumping, high-fiving 2 year old with the expectation that he would be stronger and healthier. Now we were celebrating him squeezing our finger.  This is so hard to believe this is happening to us.   Nobody wants to be the “less than 1% chance complication”.


Even though we were completely blindsided by these rare complications, we are very hopeful for a full recovery. We’re at Cleveland Clinic Children’s Rehab Hospital five times a week doing intense therapy and we are already seeing progress. CJ is re-learning how to walk and is regaining movement in his left arm and hand. In the future he will have more neurological testing and a life of ongoing cardiac care.


What We Need 

While CJ is well on his way to making a full recovery, having a child with such serious medical issues is a heavy burden to bear - physically, emotionally, and financially. By raising our goal of $5,000 we hope to help ease some of the financial strain while CJ is undergoing intense therapy.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Of course, not everyone is in a position to give financially. If you would like to help in another way, please promote this campaign to others via Facebook or by sharing this link with your email contacts. Also, if you or anyone you know has ever been through treatment for Hypoplastic Left Heart Syndrome, we'd be grateful to learn of your experience and if you have any advice or recommendations. 


With Deep Gratitude, 

The "Celebrating CJ" Team

story:
Our Story

I want to thank those who contributed to this cause. The funds raised helped to move items into a storage facility and hire a reliable inspector to access and coordinate clean up efforts. 

My Mom has been virtually homeless for the past 4 months, not being able to stay inside her home due to allergies and bad air/mold etc. But now can move back into her home in just a few weeks. 

Thank you GOD. 

Much Love and appreciation to all.

story:
Shae is your very own virtual health assistant that uses interactive voice and text conversation to communicate a personalized health plan with you in real time via your phone, tablet, laptop, desktop, smartwatch, or any connected device.

Shae lets you know exactly what and when to eat & drink to be healthy, formulating advice 100% specific to your body, lifestyle and preferences - not one person in the world receives the same information.

Welcome to Shae: Health Without Thinking™ - finally you don't need to know anything about health, or even remember your health, to be healthy.

Imagine having a whole encyclopedia just about you - your health history, your genetic circumstances, your optimal lifestyle. 100% specific to you. And imagine this encyclopedia had been built by the most incredible minds in science and medicine from all around the world. It even knew how any specific food would interact with your body to support, or challenge, its biochemistry, physiology, and genetics - the things that determine its health and wellbeing. 


And now imagine that there’s an assistant that can read that encyclopedia super fast and answer any food or lifestyle question you ever have, in real-time. And even better, this assistant can intuitively read ahead, and notify you in advance of what to eat and how to live to keep your body at it’s optimal health all the time, without you even asking it.

Shae was created by an international team of leading medical doctors, scientists and researchers who have been working on an evidence-based solution to prevent chronic pain and disease on a global scale for more than 10 years.



Shae has been making waves in the media since 2014. What’s all the buzz about? Read on to find out why we created Shae, what Shae does, how Shae works, and more.


Shae is so much more than your average $4.99 health app – here’s why...



Shae is not just your health assistant. Shae is your life assistant, providing you with information, motivation, and skills to accomplish all that you want. 

Shae’s job is to know the detailed health status of your body at any given moment in time, and to decide what you need to eat or drink to obtain, or maintain, your optimal health.

Shae knows the imbalances or deficiencies in vitamins and minerals you may have that can affect the function of your vital organs, tissues or genes which can contribute towards disease or illness.

Shae knows what you need to be healthy and happy, will communicate this with you in advance in a fun and interactive manner, talk with your wearables, and will guide you to achieve the health you’ve always wanted without you having to even think about it.

Shae makes being healthy so simple. Here’s how.

With Shae, Janice knows just when and what to have for dinner to feel her best.

With Shae, Joey’s no longer rushing to find last-minute food options that suit him.He’s prepared well in advance to keep his energy and productivity up.

Having a hard time deciding what to order? With Shae, Orlando goes out to eat with his friends, and feels great sharing laughs and eating a delicious meal that’s perfectly healthy for him.

With Shae, Rebecca and Robert know whether - and why - to go for that extra slice of cheese.

With Shae, health is accessible and achievable for Janice, Rebecca, Robert, Joey, Orlando, and every one of us.

That’s right. Shae can pretty much do everything but eat your food for you. Thanks, Shae.


With Shae integrated with your favorite technologies, your health recommendations change with every step and every beat to suit your most current health status.

Shae is for you if you want to:


Shae is NOT for those who want to:


So if you are over 18 years old and want to be healthier and happier than you’ve ever been before, Shae’s algorithms and functionality are compatible with iPhone, Android, Windows, and YOU.

Shae was released to the public in June 2014 as ph360.me, the world's very first smart health technology with the ability to personalize your nutrition and health according to your epigenetics - the environment and lifestyle choices that influence your genes. In layman’s terms, this means the most accurate and detailed health information currently available, specific to your unique body.

This incredible pioneering technology takes scientific measures of your body, health, lifestyle and ancestry and utilizes advanced medical science and next-gen body profiling to crunch more than 500 scientific formulas and ratios and over 10,000 data points, considering filters in endocrinology, anthropometry, phenotypology and neuroscience to remove the need for any blood or genetic tests.

Described by Consumers Digest as “just like having a team of doctors and health professionals in your pocket”, Shae technology has been helping thousands of people in more than 17 countries to improve their stress, sleep, weight loss, energy, fitness and digestion while reversing signs of obesity, diabetes and heart disease, among other chronic conditions.

After 2 years of time-tested, life-changing results backed by our world-class medical team, we are ready to complete the technology that can deliver this personal health information directly to you on any connected device, in real-time, via your very own virtual health assistant. Welcome to Shae: Siri For Your Health™.

We are the unhealthiest we have ever been in the history of humanity with over ½ of the world's population currently overweight, suffering from pain or disease, or lacking energy and performance from their body. Why? Because no one knows exactly what they should eat, how they should think, when they should move, who they should hang out with, or where they should spend their time. Shae does. 

With Shae, we now have the science, medicine and technology to identify, understand, and solve these problems for each unique person so we can transform our own health, the health of our loved ones, and the health of everyone on the planet.



Please join us to support our campaign and help bring Shae to life. We want to help you and your loved ones transition to a place of health and avoid the epidemic of chronic disease that confronts us every day. We now have the science and technology to make this a reality, but we need your help.


A healthy world is a happy world. A productive world. A meaningful world.

For ourselves, our children, and our children’s children. We all thank you in advance!

We are a team of leading doctors, scientists and researchers that have worked for more than a decade in the pioneering field of personalized health. We have been helping thousands of people all over the world just like you to heal themselves from the preventable and often reversible symptoms that dominate our world today. Most importantly, we are a team of people who want to see a change in the health of millions of people in the world so we can all be happy and healthy together. Please join us.

The risks are the world won’t get a chance to receive this and so many people will continue to suffer, not knowing they simply have the choice to be healthy.

The science of epigenetics has been around for about 75 years, and we are now ready as a population to embrace this much needed information. This is your chance to participate in the real-time application of epigenetics, that up until this point in time has not been readily available. We are excited about this!

Our current tech platform is exploding with usage and our biggest challenge is to make sure our infrastructure is able to keep up with this explosion. We are continually expanding servers and adapting to latest technologies for efficient and secure development. And we are continually incorporating the huge breakthroughs in genetics and life science fields today to allow impact on individual lives immediately.


Will Shae be available on different mobile devices?

Yes! Shae will be available across as many devices (phone, tablet, smartwatch) & operating systems (Apple, Android, Windows) as possible so we can reach as many people as possible to impact the health of the world in a big way.

Is Shae on the App Store now?

No, Shae is in development and that’s what this crowdfunding is for, however ph360 (the engine behind Shae) is available online as a web app now!

Will Shae be available around the world and will it work with local services?

Yes. The more support we can get, the quicker we will be able to connect Shae with your local areas and services.

What is our goal?

Our goal is to provide access to accurate, actionable and personalized health and wellness information and advice for every individual on the planet so that we can all be healthy and happy.

With predictive and preventative software, the combination of wisdom from ancient and modern medicines and advancements in biotechnology, we now know this is not only possible but also very achievable.

How will we achieve this?

Health transformation requires that we all have accurate, personalized information necessary to improve our health. This we are already able to do and are providing to people every day with ph360.

The real key to transforming world health, however, is in behavior change. When we can integrate healthy behavior seamlessly into everyday life, then we see wide-scale improvements in health and wellness and concurrent reductions in illness and disease states across the board.

This behavior change comes from a shift in the current health paradigm to one in which preventative measures become second nature, engaging, easy, convenient and best of all, results oriented.

What do we need to be able to achieve this?

We need people like you to SHARE the message of personalized health with friends, family, networks, media – anyone who will listen and resonate with this mission.

We need the RESOURCES to expand and quicken our development. We feel a sense of urgency that the world needs this shift now, and it needs to come from a place of pure intention. At the moment, the expansion that is required for this to happen is just out of reach and we need the resources – People. Money. Time. Support. – to bring this revolution to the whole world.

What is the first step?

The first step is to provide you with Shae. Your in-pocket resource to guide you through choices in daily life that will get you to optimal physical and mental health and help you stay there. Shae provides the information you need in a way that seamlessly integrates into your daily life – changing behavior in a fun, intriguing, simple yet engaging way.

Why are we doing a crowdfunding campaign?

We are crowdfunding via Indiegogo because Shae is about each and every one of us having the ability to control the future of our own health. It is time for humanity to step up – one step at a time – together. We want to keep Shae and your health all about YOU.

When will I receive access to ph360?

If you pledged during the campaign, as soon as this 60-day period ends and Indiegogo releases payment for pledges, you will receive your access details to ph360 via email so you can enjoy and benefit from free access to ph360 until Shae is released! If you pledged during the "InDemand" period, you will receive ph360 once the "InDemand" period is complete.

What is the difference between ph360 and Shae?

ph360 is the engine behind Shae. It is an online app that is currently being used by thousands of people around the world to improve their health and happiness. ph360 gives you personalized advice for your health and wellness based on who you are today! You can use it on your computer, tablet or smartphone. ph360 currently gives you the blueprint to be healthy but doesn't follow you through every day and update as your circumstances change (location, environment, stress levels, energy output, etc). Shae does.

Shae uses ph360 to create a virtual health assistant for you. Shae is mobile and designed to remove the hard work from health, giving you the personalized advice you need when you need it, and removing the effort for you where it can. For example, Shae will update your breakfast menu if you work out harder than you thought you would in the morning so you have plenty of energy for the rest of the day, or Shae might order a personalized meal to arrive at your door right when it's the perfect time for your body to eat.

For press inquiries, please contact media@ph360.me

For any other general inquiries, contact us at support@ph360.me

We are the unhealthiest we have ever been in the history of humanity with over ½ of the world's population currently overweight, suffering from pain or disease, or lacking energy and performance from their body. Why? Because no one knows exactly what they should eat, how they should think, when they should move, who they should hang out with, or where they should spend their time. Shae does. 

With Shae, we now have the science, medicine and technology to identify, understand, and solve these problems for each unique person so we can transform our own health, the health of our loved ones, and the health of everyone on the planet.



Please join us to support our campaign and help bring Shae to life. We want to help you and your loved ones transition to a place of health and avoid the epidemic of chronic disease that confronts us every day. We now have the science and technology to make this a reality, but we need your help.




A healthy world is a happy world. A productive world. A meaningful world.
For ourselves, our children, and our children’s children. We all thank you in advance!



We are a team of leading doctors, scientists and researchers that have worked for more than a decade in the pioneering field of personalized health. We have been helping thousands of people all over the world just like you to heal themselves from the preventable and often reversible symptoms that dominate our world today. Most importantly, we are a team of people who want to see a change in the health of millions of people in the world so we can all be happy and healthy together. Please join us.

The risks are the world won’t get a chance to receive this and so many people will continue to suffer, not knowing they simply have the choice to be healthy.
The science of epigenetics has been around for about 75 years, and we are now ready as a population to embrace this much needed information. This is your chance to participate in the real-time application of epigenetics, that up until this point in time has not been readily available. We are excited about this!
Our current tech platform is exploding with usage and our biggest challenge is to make sure our infrastructure is able to keep up with this explosion. We are continually expanding servers and adapting to latest technologies for efficient and secure development. And we are continually incorporating the huge breakthroughs in genetics and life science fields today to allow impact on individual lives immediately.




Will Shae be available on different mobile devices?


Yes! Shae will be available across as many devices (phone, tablet, smartwatch) & operating systems (Apple, Android, Windows) as possible so we can reach as many people as possible to impact the health of the world in a big way.
Is Shae on the App Store now?

No, Shae is in development and that’s what this crowdfunding is for, however ph360 (the engine behind Shae) is available online as a web app now!
Will Shae be available around the world and will it work with local services?

Yes. The more support we can get, the quicker we will be able to connect Shae with your local areas and services.
What is our goal?

Our goal is to provide access to accurate, actionable and personalized health and wellness information and advice for every individual on the planet so that we can all be healthy and happy.
With predictive and preventative software, the combination of wisdom from ancient and modern medicines and advancements in biotechnology, we now know this is not only possible but also very achievable.
How will we achieve this?

Health transformation requires that we all have accurate, personalized information necessary to improve our health. This we are already able to do and are providing to people every day with ph360.
The real key to transforming world health, however, is in behavior change. When we can integrate healthy behavior seamlessly into everyday life, then we see wide-scale improvements in health and wellness and concurrent reductions in illness and disease states across the board.
This behavior change comes from a shift in the current health paradigm to one in which preventative measures become second nature, engaging, easy, convenient and best of all, results oriented.
What do we need to be able to achieve this?

We need people like you to SHARE the message of personalized health with friends, family, networks, media – anyone who will listen and resonate with this mission.
We need the RESOURCES to expand and quicken our development. We feel a sense of urgency that the world needs this shift now, and it needs to come from a place of pure intention. At the moment, the expansion that is required for this to happen is just out of reach and we need the resources – People. Money. Time. Support. – to bring this revolution to the whole world.
What is the first step?

The first step is to provide you with Shae. Your in-pocket resource to guide you through choices in daily life that will get you to optimal physical and mental health and help you stay there. Shae provides the information you need in a way that seamlessly integrates into your daily life – changing behavior in a fun, intriguing, simple yet engaging way.
Why are we doing a crowdfunding campaign?

We are crowdfunding via Indiegogo because Shae is about each and every one of us having the ability to control the future of our own health. It is time for humanity to step up – one step at a time – together. We want to keep Shae and your health all about YOU.
When will I receive access to ph360?
If you pledged during the campaign, as soon as this 60-day period ends and Indiegogo releases payment for pledges, you will receive your access details to ph360 via email so you can enjoy and benefit from free access to ph360 until Shae is released! If you pledged during the "InDemand" period, you will receive ph360 once the "InDemand" period is complete.What is the difference between ph360 and Shae?
ph360 is the engine behind Shae. It is an online app that is currently being used by thousands of people around the world to improve their health and happiness. ph360 gives you personalized advice for your health and wellness based on who you are today! You can use it on your computer, tablet or smartphone. ph360 currently gives you the blueprint to be healthy but doesn't follow you through every day and update as your circumstances change (location, environment, stress levels, energy output, etc). Shae does.
Shae uses ph360 to create a virtual health assistant for you. Shae is mobile and designed to remove the hard work from health, giving you the personalized advice you need when you need it, and removing the effort for you where it can. For example, Shae will update your breakfast menu if you work out harder than you thought you would in the morning so you have plenty of energy for the rest of the day, or Shae might order a personalized meal to arrive at your door right when it's the perfect time for your body to eat.

For press inquiries, please contact media@ph360.me
For any other general inquiries, contact us at support@ph360.me

story:
My Pony, Bohdjan (BoBo), and I were one of few selected to participate in Lendon Gray's 2016 Winter Intensive Training program (WIT) in Wellington, Florida. Lendon is a 2-time Olympian, president of Dressage 4 Kids and an advocate of youth in dressage. The WIT Program starts January 2016 and continues for 3 months.  My 10 hour days will be filled with rider fitness, theory, riding lessons, lectures and field trips... and of course the care of BoBo. The program is scheduled for 6 days a week with one day off. My day off will be spent working for my supportive trainer JJ Tate.  

The WIT Program is designed for young riders who strive to be the best they can be and show determination, drive and passion for the sport of dressage. Riding daily under the tutelage of Lendon Gray will take my riding to a whole new level. Lendon has a way of pushing you to be the best you can be. I eagerly look forward to this challenge. I plan to ride and train dressage horses as a professional and hope to represent the United States in international competition.

I am 15 years old and began riding when I was 7. My riding focus changed to dressage in my 10th year after watching Edward Gal and Moorlands Totilis freestyle in the 2010 World Equestrian Games. I have been riding BoBo since June of 2015. 

BoBo is a 16 year old Dutch Riding Pony with the personality the size of a large warmblood. We are leasing him from Dressage 4 Kids and it is my goal to compete in the FEI Pony Classes in Wellington and quality for the Festival of Champions in 2016. BoBo and I successfully competed at the National Pony Cup in Kentucky and Dressage at Devon. We are developing a wonderful bond of trust and respect. BoBo is one of the sweetest and smartest ponies I have ever ridden. Once you gain BoBo's trust, he throws his heart into his work.    

Total training in Wellington will cost a minimal of $15,950 which includes my training, board for BoBo, a rental, vet and farrier expenses and transportation.  It is our goal to raise $8,250 through Indiegogo to cover our training and board for BoBo.  I am covering the remainder of the fees from my summer savings of offering lessons and camps to local children and from scholarships. Your contribution is very helpful to me.  

For those of you who helped me attend the 2015 WIT Program in Wellington Florida last year; thank you!  I grew and matured as a rider and person thanks to your support. The positive  group of young riders and professionals that surrounded me daily have developed into lasting friendships.  I look forward to returning. The following link is a glimpse of my 3 months in the 2015 WIT program.  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wfO1mIybCk8

Please make a donation through Indiegogo and if you feel inspired please share my story with friends and family. Please follow along on our Journey at www.hannahironsdressage.blogspot.com.  

Thank you for all your support. For every donation, BoBo sends you hugs and kisses! He is the most lovable pony! 

~Hannah and BoBo

story:
WHY MASHUP™ ?

We know what you are thinking, another workout video that you can do at home. It's way more than that. 

 

We are looking to take our fitness program to the digital world to make our program more accessible to a number of coaches and potential participants. While we currently have a DVD series available for purchase online, we are looking to grow our brand with three specific digital projects. With this campaign we would be able to fund these key projects: filming videos for our fitness app, a coach’s online portal and building an online coach’s certification program.

With these projects, we will be able to take MASHUP™ to the next level and help others truly achieve overall optimal wellness.

MASHUP™ is not just a workout, but a scientific formula to live a balanced lifestyle.

THE SCIENCE BEHIND MASHUP™ 

MASHUP™ is a variable-intensity interval training (VIIT) program that allows participants to attain true HIIT intervals combined with Mind/Body (yoga/Pilates) and Agility & Strength at 3 different fitness levels. Every workout challenges the entire body in numerous ways you are performing every type of movement. The  Mind/Body helps to prevent injury and provide core strength while the Agility and Strength help to strengthen muscles and increase your metabolism up to 48 hours post workout as your body rebuilds and repairs. The high-intensity intervals have been shown to stimulate production of human growth hormone (HGH) from 450% - 721% during the first 24 hours after your workout. HGH not only promotes fat loss but also provides anti-aging effects, contributing to vigor and optimal wellness. If you want to change your body you need MASHUP™'s formula to get you there!

MASHUP™ has no choreographed movements, but instead unites all three modalities for all fitness levels in every workout. It can be experienced in 15, 30, or 45-minute workouts, while utilizing the body's five major muscle groups. These unique science-generated formats allow instructors to utilize various movements to customize each class making each experience fresh, dynamic, and challenging for participants.

 

MASHUP™ is an acronym for all the components of this game-changing fitness model. 

 

Knowledge and support in all areas health and fitness. It's not about a failed New Year’s Resolution or yo-yo dieting, but about reaching and maintaining your level of optimal health and fitness that matters. It’s a way of life, and it’s one that we want to support and educate our participants on. Our coaches are specially trained and certified to incorporate health and fitness tips into each workout in order to educate participants on different aspects of healthy living. The founders of MASHUP™ rely heavily on the newest health scientific data to support coaches in their knowledge base. 

We also utilize our blog and social media to offer simple and effective suggestions, backed by the latest science, to help busy people make the most of every health and fitness effort.

You can work out at your own fitness level.   MASHUP™ is challenging, fun, safe and effective for all fitness levels and ages. We provide options for three different fitness levels for every exercise in all of our workouts so you can safely progress with MASHUP™ as you get in the best shape of your life! Yogis, novices, boot campers, seniors, and endurance athletes  will find something they love about MASHUP™ while benefitting from the other elements!

Get your life back. Let's be honest, hours spent in the gym are not for everyone. MASHUP™ understands that just because you don’t have an hour everyday to spend exercising, doesn't mean you're not capable of reaching your health and fitness goals. MASHUP™’s dynamic format, fuses all fitness modalities into one of the most effective workouts that takes 45 minutes or less. We believe in encouraging and challenging you every minute you are in the middle of a MASHUP™, regardless of your health status or fitness level.

 

LET'S GET STARTED

After beginning our journey in January 2013, we have been able to grow with a small group of coaches in the Florida, Oklahoma, and Texas areas. The growth potential with limited resources has made it an uphill battle. This is why we are coming to you. With your help we would be able to expand our digital projects that would be critical to our MASHUP™ success and reach.

MASHUP™ Streaming App on Booya Fitness.Together with our development team and coaches, we are introducing new technology to further our reach and build a website portal to support our MASHUP™ coaches and community. As we continue to grow our business, we want to be able to reach as many people at home as possible as well. Not only will this further our reach, but it will support our family-friendly approach that gives you optimal time with your family and less time going to and from the gym. Together with Booya Fitness, we are working on completing this project that allows short, effective MASHUP™ workouts to be streamed through any mobile device. Take MASHUP™ with you, wherever you go!

 

Coaches Online Certification. Want to become a MASHUP™ Coach? With the help of this campaign we will be able to create a custom online coach certification course that allows you to become certified from the comfort of your own home. Save on travel expenses and time away from your family, this course can be completed on your own time and your own terms. The more coaches that we have, the wider our reach! Join our team and start changing lives.

 

WHAT COACHES WILL GET WITH AN ONLINE CERTIFICATION

 

(MASHUP™ is an advanced certification focused on safety and efficacy which requires a basic core knowledge, health/medical review & fitness assessment, fitness training, and professional responsibilities involved with training individuals and groups.)

     

    MASHUP™ Website Coaches Corner. In order to enable a strong program, we need strong coaches. We currently have a handful of coaches in Florida, Oklahoma, and Texas. As we grow, we need the ability to train more coaches and utilize a streamlined format that offers our coaches the resources they need. Ensuring strong coaches and these resources will allow more MASHUP™ classes to be available in more cities, states and gyms around the country!

    Functionalities of the website will include:

    • Coach’s login portal 
    • Updates to the MASHUP™ program 
    • Certification updates and availability 
    • Access to discounted apparel 
    • Marketing materials available for personal use

    COACHES

    We currently have instructors located in Florida, Oklahoma and Texas at various fitness facilities. As we continue to certify new coaches, we are able to offer MASHUP™ classes in more facilities across the US. 

     

    TESTIMONIALS

     

    TIMELINE

     

    PERKS

     

    THE FOUNDERS

     

    Risks and Challenges

    Together with our development and coaches, we are introducing a technology to build out our website to support our MASHUP™ coaches and community.

    Build-out Schedule: We are currently working with a small budget to build out our website to manage MASHUP™ coach information and certification offerings. We are making every effort to raise more money to finish this project to be able to bring more MASHUP™ coaches to gyms so you can start your transformation. We must acknowledge, however, that as with any project there could be unforeseen risks to the schedule due to website build delays or certification courses having to be postponed.

    Availability: Currently we only have a small amount of certified MASHUP™ coaches in Florida, Oklahoma, and Texas. The good news is through our participation at fitness expos such SCW MANIAS in 2015-2016 we will gain mass market exposure to some of the nation’s top group fitness instructors. In our research we've learned that consumer demand is the most effective way to get MASHUP™ coaches teaching at your gym. Therefore, tell your favorite Zumba, Body Pump, Yoga, Spin, Bootcamp instructors to get certified!
