story:
Affordable food is hard to come by in the outskirts of Santiago, Chile. There are few supermarkets and the produce at small stores can often be up to 40% more expensive than in larger outlets.

En los barrios vulnerables de Santiago de Chile, no es fácil tener acceso a los productos de primera necesidad. Hay pocos supermercados y los productos en los almacenes de barrio, a menudo pueden ser hasta un 40 % más caros que en los establecimientos de mayor tamaño.

To address this issue, we at Algramo, buy essential products such as rice, beans, lentils and sugar in bulk from suppliers and distribute them directly to local grocery stores, through our unique mechanical dispensers. This results in a considerably cheaper product for consumers.To address this issue, we at Algramo, buy essential products such as rice, beans, lentils and sugar in bulk from suppliers and distribute them directly to local grocery stores, through our unique mechanical dispensers. This results in a considerably cheaper product for consumers.

Para solucionar este problema, en Algramo compramos a granel, productos de primera necesidad como el arroz, frijoles, lentejas y azúcar  directamente de los proveedores y los distribuimos a los almacenes de barrio, a través de nuestras máquinas dispensadoras únicas en el mundo. Como resultado, los  productos son considerablemente más baratos para los consumidores.

                                      

We don’t just fill the machines though; we also install them for free and split the profits evenly with the shopkeepers. At present, we offer our products in over 300 stores around Santiago and will soon be expanding to Colombia. 

Sin embargo, no nos limitamos sólo a llenar las máquinas; también las instalamos gratis y las ganancias se dividen de manera uniforme con los almaceneros. Actualmente ofrecemos nuestros productos en más de 300 tiendas en todo Santiago y pronto comenzaremos a  pilotear en  Colombia.


Much of the population in Latin America live on less than $4.00 USD per day. This means many low-income families are unable to buy staple foods in any great volume. This results in them having to buy small amounts, while paying much more than they would for larger quantities.

Gran parte de la población de América Latina vive con menos de $ 4.00 USD por día. Esto significa que muchas familias de bajos ingresos no pueden comprar productos básicos en cantidades más grandes. Por este motivo, deben  comprar en pequeñas cantidades,  pagando mucho más de lo que sería en formatos más grandes.

         

By allowing people to buy in bulk and eliminating the cost of distribution and packaging, our vending machines help to reduce the cost of household purchases by up to 40% for more than 36,000 people per month. These savings not only allow families to buy products that they couldn’t afford before, but offer better education to their children and provide access to proper health care.

Al permitir a las personas comprar a granel y eliminando el costo de distribución y envasado, nuestras máquinas expendedoras ayudan a reducir hasta en un 40% el costo de las compras de éstos productos, a más de 36.000 personas mensualmente.  Este ahorro, no sólo permite a las familias comprar productos que no podían permitirse antes, sino que también ofrecer una mejor educación a sus hijos y facilitar el acceso a la atención médica adecuada.

Our dispensers help shopkeepers to compete with big retail corporations in a smart and efficient way, and by using reusable packaging our impact on the environment is reduced.

Nuestros dispensadores ayudan a los almaceneros a competir con las grandes empresas, de una manera inteligente y eficiente, y mediante el uso de envases reutilizables, reducimos nuestro impacto en el medio ambiente.

As we’re currently filling an ignored food gap the first thing we need is to raise awareness of this “poverty tax” and to generate understanding of the necessity of our work. 

Actualmente estamos atacando un problema alimentario que ha sido ignorado; lo primero que necesitamos es crear conciencia sobre este "impuesto a la pobreza " y generar conocimiento sobre la importancia de nuestro trabajo. Una mayor publicidad,  significaría un mayor apoyo y noción de las personas sobre esta revolucionaria forma de compra.

Greater public exposure would mean stronger support and result in more people learning about our revolutionary product. We also need financial resources to scale up and extend our distribution network. A larger network would allow us to offer help to other areas and countries, vastly increasing our impact and potentially reducing the cost of living for millions. Above all though, we plan to invest in improving the technology of our vending machines, making them more energy efficient, as well as developing innovative new dispensers for products like cooking oil, household goods or even pet food.

También necesitamos recursos financieros para ampliar nuestra red de distribución. Una red más amplia nos permitiría ofrecer una mayor cobertura a otras zonas del país y a más países de Latinoamérica, lo que aumentaría  enormemente nuestro impacto y reduciría  potencialmente el costo de vida para millones de personas. Por sobre todo, tenemos además, la intención de invertir  para mejorar la tecnología de nuestras máquinas expendedoras, haciéndolas más eficiente en el consumo de energía, así como el desarrollo de nuevos dispensadores para diferentes productos como el aceite,  líquidos de limpieza para el hogar o incluso de alimento para mascotas.

Our CEO Jose Manuel Moller will represent us at The Venture finals. It was while living on the outskirts of Santiago that Jose experienced the realities of life in a poor community and developed the idea of Algramo. He had previously studied Business Administration and gained a Master’s Degree in Design from the renowned Catholic University of Chile. Jose partnered with Salvador Achondo, an industrial designer with a Master’s Degree in Innovation, to develop the vending machines. 

José Manuel Moller, nuestro CEO, nos representará en la final de The Venture . Fue mientras estudiaba Ingeniería Comercial en la Universidad Católica de Chile, que se trasladó a vivir en un barrio vulnerable de Santiago de Chile, en donde José Manuel experimentó la realidad de la vida en una comunidad con bajos recursos y desarrolló la idea de Algramo. José Manuel se asoció con Salvador Achondo,  un diseñador industrial con una Maestría en Innovación, para desarrollar las máquinas expendedoras.

Our wider team is the perfect combination of talent and skill. Made up of ten people passionate about helping families, their experience is used across our engineering, sales and logistics departments.

Nuestro equipo es la combinación perfecta de talento y habilidad. Compuesto por diez personas apasionadas por ayudar a las familias. Nuestra experiencia se utiliza para estudios de ingeniería, ventas y también para perfeccionar el departamento de logística.
story_txt:
Affordable food is hard to come by in the outskirts of Santiago, Chile. There are few supermarkets and the produce at small stores can often be up to 40% more expensive than in larger outlets.
En los barrios vulnerables de Santiago de Chile, no es fácil tener acceso a los productos de primera necesidad. Hay pocos supermercados y los productos en los almacenes de barrio, a menudo pueden ser hasta un 40 % más caros que en los establecimientos de mayor tamaño.
To address this issue, we at Algramo, buy essential products such as rice, beans, lentils and sugar in bulk from suppliers and distribute them directly to local grocery stores, through our unique mechanical dispensers. This results in a considerably cheaper product for consumers.To address this issue, we at Algramo, buy essential products such as rice, beans, lentils and sugar in bulk from suppliers and distribute them directly to local grocery stores, through our unique mechanical dispensers. This results in a considerably cheaper product for consumers.Para solucionar este problema, en Algramo compramos a granel, productos de primera necesidad como el arroz, frijoles, lentejas y azúcar  directamente de los proveedores y los distribuimos a los almacenes de barrio, a través de nuestras máquinas dispensadoras únicas en el mundo. Como resultado, los  productos son considerablemente más baratos para los consumidores.                                      We don’t just fill the machines though; we also install them for free and split the profits evenly with the shopkeepers. At present, we offer our products in over 300 stores around Santiago and will soon be expanding to Colombia. Sin embargo, no nos limitamos sólo a llenar las máquinas; también las instalamos gratis y las ganancias se dividen de manera uniforme con los almaceneros. Actualmente ofrecemos nuestros productos en más de 300 tiendas en todo Santiago y pronto comenzaremos a  pilotear en  Colombia.Much of the population in Latin America live on less than $4.00 USD per day. This means many low-income families are unable to buy staple foods in any great volume. This results in them having to buy small amounts, while paying much more than they would for larger quantities.Gran parte de la población de América Latina vive con menos de $ 4.00 USD por día. Esto significa que muchas familias de bajos ingresos no pueden comprar productos básicos en cantidades más grandes. Por este motivo, deben  comprar en pequeñas cantidades,  pagando mucho más de lo que sería en formatos más grandes.         By allowing people to buy in bulk and eliminating the cost of distribution and packaging, our vending machines help to reduce the cost of household purchases by up to 40% for more than 36,000 people per month. These savings not only allow families to buy products that they couldn’t afford before, but offer better education to their children and provide access to proper health care.Al permitir a las personas comprar a granel y eliminando el costo de distribución y envasado, nuestras máquinas expendedoras ayudan a reducir hasta en un 40% el costo de las compras de éstos productos, a más de 36.000 personas mensualmente.  Este ahorro, no sólo permite a las familias comprar productos que no podían permitirse antes, sino que también ofrecer una mejor educación a sus hijos y facilitar el acceso a la atención médica adecuada.Our dispensers help shopkeepers to compete with big retail corporations in a smart and efficient way, and by using reusable packaging our impact on the environment is reduced.Nuestros dispensadores ayudan a los almaceneros a competir con las grandes empresas, de una manera inteligente y eficiente, y mediante el uso de envases reutilizables, reducimos nuestro impacto en el medio ambiente.As we’re currently filling an ignored food gap the first thing we need is to raise awareness of this “poverty tax” and to generate understanding of the necessity of our work. 
Actualmente estamos atacando un problema alimentario que ha sido ignorado; lo primero que necesitamos es crear conciencia sobre este "impuesto a la pobreza " y generar conocimiento sobre la importancia de nuestro trabajo. Una mayor publicidad,  significaría un mayor apoyo y noción de las personas sobre esta revolucionaria forma de compra.

Greater public exposure would mean stronger support and result in more people learning about our revolutionary product. We also need financial resources to scale up and extend our distribution network. A larger network would allow us to offer help to other areas and countries, vastly increasing our impact and potentially reducing the cost of living for millions. Above all though, we plan to invest in improving the technology of our vending machines, making them more energy efficient, as well as developing innovative new dispensers for products like cooking oil, household goods or even pet food.
También necesitamos recursos financieros para ampliar nuestra red de distribución. Una red más amplia nos permitiría ofrecer una mayor cobertura a otras zonas del país y a más países de Latinoamérica, lo que aumentaría  enormemente nuestro impacto y reduciría  potencialmente el costo de vida para millones de personas. Por sobre todo, tenemos además, la intención de invertir  para mejorar la tecnología de nuestras máquinas expendedoras, haciéndolas más eficiente en el consumo de energía, así como el desarrollo de nuevos dispensadores para diferentes productos como el aceite,  líquidos de limpieza para el hogar o incluso de alimento para mascotas.





Our CEO Jose Manuel Moller will represent us at The Venture finals. It was while living on the outskirts of Santiago that Jose experienced the realities of life in a poor community and developed the idea of Algramo. He had previously studied Business Administration and gained a Master’s Degree in Design from the renowned Catholic University of Chile. Jose partnered with Salvador Achondo, an industrial designer with a Master’s Degree in Innovation, to develop the vending machines. 
José Manuel Moller, nuestro CEO, nos representará en la final de The Venture . Fue mientras estudiaba Ingeniería Comercial en la Universidad Católica de Chile, que se trasladó a vivir en un barrio vulnerable de Santiago de Chile, en donde José Manuel experimentó la realidad de la vida en una comunidad con bajos recursos y desarrolló la idea de Algramo. José Manuel se asoció con Salvador Achondo,  un diseñador industrial con una Maestría en Innovación, para desarrollar las máquinas expendedoras.




Our wider team is the perfect combination of talent and skill. Made up of ten people passionate about helping families, their experience is used across our engineering, sales and logistics departments.
Nuestro equipo es la combinación perfecta de talento y habilidad. Compuesto por diez personas apasionadas por ayudar a las familias. Nuestra experiencia se utiliza para estudios de ingeniería, ventas y también para perfeccionar el departamento de logística.

story:
NEW DONATION PERK OPTION - OAK TANK TOP , SHOW YOUR SUPPORT FOR OAK HEALTH SUPPLY AND OUR FLAGSHIP PRODUCT, KENKO, WITH THIS 100% PRE-SHRUNK COTTON TANK TOP.

Kenko is an herbal daily supplement that came to life after my unsuccessful search for honest and reliable access to the medicines of the Eastern cultures.

It started in February of 2014. A coworker commented on my sluggish entrance to the break room. After describing two days of scheduling mishaps, expensive doctor visits, and multiple failed attempts to pick up my prescription, my coworker looked me over and said, Well, you still don't look very good."

"The doctor told me it will take a couple days for the meds to kick in," I replied.

"You know, you should drink some ginseng tea with a couple drops of oil of oregano."

I was better by that afternoon.

Since that day, I have been a firm believer that the herbal medicines of Eastern cultures survived the tests of time for a reason. As a biomedical engineer, I used my access to medical literature to researching every study and article on herbal medicine I could get my hands on. Eventually, I even became a member of the American Herbalists Guild and the American Nutrition Association.

Along the way, I have sifted through misinformation, uncovered phony miracle drugs and made countless modifications to both my personal supplement regimen and my treatments for everyday ailments. About a year into this research, I stumbled across this article in the New York Times which everyone should read. It contains the following quote:

"The authorities said they had run tests on popular store brands of herbal supplements at the retailers — Walmart, Walgreens, Target and GNC — which showed that roughly four out of five of the products contained none of the herbs listed on their labels. In many cases, the authorities said, the supplements contained little more than cheap fillers like rice and house plants, or substances that could be hazardous to people with food allergies.

At GNC, for example, the agency found that five out of six samples from the company’s signature “Herbal Plus” brand of supplements “were either unrecognizable or a substance other than what they claimed to be.” In pills labeled ginkgo biloba, the agency found only rice, asparagus and spruce, an ornamental plant commonly used for Christmas decorations."

As an active, health conscious person, I need to know what I am putting in my body. I demand high quality supplements made from the best ingredients. I quickly realized that the only way to get them affordably was to make them myself. I further refined my daily regiment to contain only what I believed absolutely essential ingredients. I have since found an amazing manufacturer who tests and certifies each ingredient they use, built a website, and launched Oak Wellness Supply's flagship product, Kenko.


Kenko is daily wellness supplement made from three herbs. Its ingredients were selected to promote a healthy mind, body, and spirit.

Mind. Ginkgo Biloba is a tree species native to China that is believed to improve brain function, sharpen memory and contribute to overall mental clarity.

Body. Green Tea is taken from the Asian shrub Camelia Sinesis, it is believed to support a healthy metabolism, it is also rich in antioxidants and contains caffeine for a small energy boost.

Spirit. Golden Root is a perennial flower found across Asia and has documented use in medical encyclopedias over 2000 years old. It can be utilized to improve mood, battle stress and improve sexual performance.

Kenko is GMO free, certified organic and gluten free, it is manufactured in an FDA registered, Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP) certified facility and it contains no unnecessary fillers.

Donating to this Indiegogo will help fund the first large scale production order for Kenko. The rewards for the project are; a downloadable remedy sheet that contains all natural solutions to every day ailments, a bottle from the first production batch, and a discounted combination of the two. 

We are excited for the opportunity to offer the first ever herbal daily supplement in the Western market and we hope that you will include Kenko in your own wellness regiment.

-Steve Ek, Founder of Oak Health Supply

story:
My name is Dan Fermi and I'll be traveling to Nicaragua in March to volunteer in rural medical clinics! I'm currently a post-bacc pre-medical student at Georgetown University, and will be making the trip during our spring break. I'm hoping to begin medical school in the Fall of 2016. I will be volunteering through VIDA, a nonprofit organization that supports groups of medical, dental, and veterinary volunteers. VIDA's medical program specifically serves rural communities in Central America, providing public health screenings and education, free medical attention, and free medications.

Rural communities in Nicaragua have a high incidence of communicable diseases such as respiratory and bacterial infections. This is partly due to living conditions that make basic hygiene difficult. Many also suffer from treatable diseases such as hepatitis A and typhoid fever. There are only 0.37 physicians per 1,000 persons, and the government can only afford to spend $335 per person on health care (World Health Organization). I'm hoping to gain medical experience and improve the lives of the people we encounter, who would otherwise have a difficult time getting access to healthcare in such remote areas.

Your generous donation will contribute to the various supplies, equipment and medications used at the clinics, as well as the cost of transportation and housing. For more information on VIDA's medical program, please see this short video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hoLqztW7ZEw

Thank you!

story:
Scarborough and Back

Currently in training and excited about the challenge ahead, our tream of riders will be setting off from Leeds on the 27th July and heading off towards the Scarborough coast. The first day of the event will consist of a 78 mile journey from our home city, followed by a bum aching return journey, totalling 156 miles.

We will be partipiating in a fund raising cycle ride in honour of Bradley McDonald. At the end of 2014 we received some tragic news that the 13 year old nephew of a close friend and former colleague was seriously ill, but undergoing treatment for a terminal brain tumour. We want to do our bit for the family and raise some money to help cover some of the costs they will incur during this sad time.

story:
Short Summary

While there are many electric toothbrushes on the market already, they almost uniformly come with three major disadvantages:

  1. They’re inconvenient to carry.
  2. The toothbrush heads are expensive.
  3.  They’re not sterile.

The Allegro Sonic Electric Toothbrush is engineered in response to all three of these disadvantages. This portable electric toothbrush, equipped with a more economical toothbrush head, simply makes more sense than the electric toothbrushes that are on the market right now. Well made and intelligently designed, the Allegro Sonic Electric Toothbrush is available in two versions, one featuring a cup with inductive charging, UV sterilization, and drying functions, and the other featuring our more basic, economical kit.

The “Cup” version of the Allegro Sonic Electric Toothbrush is just as portable as the standard version, taking up a minimum of space in your luggage.

What We Need & What You Get

Right now, we have come to you,Indiegogo, for help raising $59. These funds will cover the costs of manufacturing, marketing, and distributing the first run of the Allegro Sonic Electric Toothbrush. As a thank-you, we are offering our kits at a steep discount on the MSRP, and the more kits you buy (Why not stock up or get one or two as gifts?), the bigger the discount is!

 

The Impact

We all know how important dental hygiene is, and the facts remain that the electric toothbrushes that are being sold are sub-par in more ways than one. The Allegro Sonic Electric Toothbrush is a solution that we can all get behind, as powerful as it is convenient. This is the electric toothbrush done the right way.

 

You just need an electric toothbrush with sterilizer cup!

 

3 customizable intensity settings for comfortable, thorough cleaning.
The Clean mode provides an exceptional everyday clean in just two minutes.
 
 

31,000 brushstrokes per minute remove up to 100% more stains than manual brushing!

 

Built-in UV Sanitizer Hole to keep your brush head clean between brushings.

 

Standard Micro-USB Port

 
Built-in 800mAh Lithium Ion battery guarantee 30 days battery life.
The wireless charging cup/base can fully charge it within 16 hours.
 
Quadpacer times 30-second intervals to indicate when you complete brushing in each quadrant of your mouth. It pairs with the Smartimer, which lets you know when you’ve brushed for the two minutes.
 

Germany Hahl-Pedex Bristle：More slender & soft curved design fits your tooth better！

 
 
 

 Allegro Sonic Toothbrush Standard Kit:   

Sonic Electric Toothbrush Handle* 1

Wireless Charging Base * 1

Hahl-Pedex Bristle Brush Head *1

 Allegro Sonic Toothbrush Cup Kit:

Sonic Electric Toothbrush Handle* 1

Portable Multifunctional Cup * 1

Hahl-Pedex Bristle Brush Head * 1

 

Add-ons

3-pack Replacement Brush Heads

How can I add Replacement Brush Heads to my perk?

Please place a new order to add-ons , and with no additional shipping fees!

 

About Allegro  

Our R & D team is located in Shenzhen, China. Shenzhen is the world's electronics manufacturing center which attracts thousands of brilliant people. It’s the hometown of HUAWEI, DJI etc. There are advanced production technology and mature factories in Shenzhen. Our team has a designer, product engineer, a product manager and a cooperative manufacturer. During the 2 years of work, we established trust and understanding of each other. We will absolutely make full use of Shenzhen’s advantage and provide well-made and economical products!

Allegro Team

3D Print Model

Industrial Design sketch

Electronic Engineer

Circuit Design Sketch

UV Sterilization Prototype

Selection of Brush Bristles

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing our campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and post the campaign link on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of what we are doing, the more we can get the Allegro Sonic Electric Toothbrush onto store shelves worldwide. This is an electric toothbrush with the potential to upend the entire industry, but we need your support in order to move forward with it!

All contributions, monetary and otherwise, are sincerely appreciated. We thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing.

story:
This year, our Torah school class is participating in a philanthropy project in which we are raising funds for several worthwhile charities. Throughout the year we have been learning about philanthropy and the Jewish values associated with it. The main principle we are focusing on is the Jewish value of tzedakah. Though literally translated as righteousness or justice, tzedakahis used in Judaism as the concept of a religious obligation to do what is right. Our group feels that supporting charities is one of the ways we can make the world a better place, which is part of what Judaism is centered on.

 

Although we have not yet decided on which organizations will receive our donations, we are focusing our giving around five areas of which we have been learning about all year: homelessness and poverty; water accessibility; healthcare accessibility; slavery and human trafficking; and LGBT issues. As a class we have visited several local organizations that address these issues and were blown away with what they do. The organizations we visited will be potential recipients of this allocation process. I would like to ask for your support by making a donation to our group so that we allocate a substantial gift at the end of the year.

story:
Please join me in raising money for Sandy Relief Effort.  100% of the money goes to disaster relief.

Looking to motivate the people I'm connected with in support of relief efforts to the Sandy Disaster victims.  Indiegogo has set aside all their fees so every dollar goes straight to the Red Cross. 

The Impact

  • Many people have lost their homes and need shelter
  • Many need food
  • Many need clothes

One of the best ways to help is to send money to experts.  People there that can see what is needed and then get it to them.  The Red Cross a great  organization to handle this.

I hope you will help me raise my goal of $10, 000 in relief aid. (my real hope is that we will blow this goal away).  The only way we can reach this goal is if you take the iniative to forward this to your connections and ask them to help also.

Please send this to your family, friends and connections.  Let’s make this a holiday season to remember.
story_txt:
Please join me in raising money for Sandy Relief Effort.  100% of the money goes to disaster relief.
Looking to motivate the people I'm connected with in support of relief efforts to the Sandy Disaster victims.  Indiegogo has set aside all their fees so every dollar goes straight to the Red Cross. 
The Impact

Many people have lost their homes and need shelter
Many need food
Many need clothes
One of the best ways to help is to send money to experts.  People there that can see what is needed and then get it to them.  The Red Cross a great  organization to handle this.
I hope you will help me raise my goal of $10, 000 in relief aid. (my real hope is that we will blow this goal away).  The only way we can reach this goal is if you take the iniative to forward this to your connections and ask them to help also.

story:
My name is Nyasha Tirivayi and I live in the Netherlands. More than two weeks ago I received a medical appeal from a colleague in Kenya about Baby Chloe who needed immediate life saving heart surgery. As a mother of 2 , the youngest being 11 months old, I was indeed touched by Baby Chloe's condition. She had a severe case of  ventricular septal defect i.e. there were no chambers in her heart. This condition results in the mixing of oxygenated blood and deoxygenated blood in the heart. We set up this campaign to help her get life saving surgery before she reached six months in January. Sadly Chloe passed away on Christmas morning.  Apparently she succumbed to the complications of her condition, as she had low oxygen saturation and was convulsing repeatedly. 


Nancy, myself and Nyasha have been thinking about the way forward. We decided that its best to remit all donations to children's heart charities so we can help other  babies and children like Chloe. To this end we have identified Open Hearts for Kids in the Netherlands (http://www.openheartsforkids.nl/index2.php) and Take Heart Association project in Kenya (http://www.thapkenya.org/) as the charities we can send our donations do.

We are sad Chloe is no longer is with us. Yet, we take heart in that there are people like you in this world who care! 

You can help by contributing and getting word out about children with congenital heart disease . 


Sincerely

Nyasha Tirivayi, Cheng Boon Ong and Nancy Nafula

story:
Beat Cancer with a Bat

For the past few years, the Kentucky Country Day Softball team has hosted a tournament to raise funds for the National Foundation for Cancer Research. According to their website, the NFCR's mission is to "support cancer research and public education relating to prevention, earlier diagnosis, better treatments and ultimately, a cure for cancer."

This year, your donations will get you not only the warm fuzzy feeling of doing good, but also special perks handmade by the team!

According to their website, the NFCR's mission is to "support cancer research and public education relating to prevention, earlier diagnosis, better treatments and ultimately, a cure for cancer."
This year, your donations will get you not only the warm fuzzy feeling of doing good, but also special perks handmade by the team!

story:
We hear a lot about sex work and sex trafficking in the news today, handwringing headlines and federal legislation that funnels money into further surveillance, but doesn't allot any funding to safer sex materials, food programs, or shelter for houseless or lgbt youth and adults.  Police prosper, but actual sex workers, including the most vulnerable and marginalised population of street workers, remain criminalised, invisible, and silenced.  

It's time for that to change.

This fundraiser is the beginning of a new non-profit. It aims to raise money for printing and publicity costs for a community magazine, as well as hygiene materials for weekly outreach to street workers: mouthwash, quality condoms and lube, deodorant, energy bars, and a set amount of gift cards to encourage return participation. [The art show, flier featured in the image, will be over before the end of this campaign, but is also partially a benefit for STROLL.]

story:
Movement with purpose- A children’s Cerebral Palsy and Spina Bifida program


Who we are:

First Steps Wellness Centre (FSWC), a non-profit organization, is one of Canada’s leading facilities for spinal cord injury and neuromuscular recovery.

How it all started:

First Steps Wellness Centre (FSWC) was approached by a family asking if we provide any services that could be used for their child who has cerebral palsy. The family explained that they have been in search of a program that will help correct their child’s movement patterns, improve function, and enhance quality of life. Unfortunately we did not have a program specific to these elements.  We started talking about it and realized, " why couldn’t we implement such a program?"  The elements wanted by the family, aligns perfectly with the views and goals FSWC already has in place.  And so began our search for an established and successful program designed specifically to improve functional movement and quality of life for children with neuromuscular or congenital disorders such as Cerebral Palsy or Spina Bifida.

Our research led us to a highly successful program called the TheraSuit Method®. Developed by two physiotherapists, this program is a unique and cutting edge service that is being used all around the world to improve a child’s functional movement. This creative approach is exactly the kind of program that can change a child’s life.

Stats

In a recent TheraSuit® study, the following astonishing results were reported:

  • 92% of participants experienced functional improvements
  • 90% learned to independently roll
  • 75% learned to sit without assistance
  • 30% learned to walk with an assistive device
  • 21% gained the ability to walk independently

This method of training improves:

  • co-ordination
  • strength
  • range of motion
  • balance
  • movement control
  • independence

Traditional therapy assists people to adapt to life with a disability. FSWC along with  the TheraSuit Method®, aims to increase the function level of the child to improve  quality of life.  The TheraSuit® has been able to help children with conditions such as Cerebral Palsy and Spina Bifida learn or re-learn a movement in as little as 3 weeks as compared to traditional therapy where learning to do this same movement could take up to a year! There is no other program of this kind that is reporting such astounding results and that’s what really caught our eye.

We want to help children have a chance at reaching their full potential and improve their quality of life.  There is not a service offered in Saskatchewan that provides a program for children that targets improvement in movement patterning and function. We feel the TheraSuit Method® can provide just that!

We are raising money to bring the TheraSuit Method® to Saskatchewan! We need your help to get our therapists trained in this exciting new technique so that together we can change a child’s life and to do this we need $25,000.

Let’s all come together and provide a service that can really change a child’s life.

Perks:

Perks for Crowdfunding Campaign for the START Program – Movement with Purpose

$1 - Toss us a vote for a dollar - FSWC appreciates your support.

$10 -  Child movie pass (3-13yrs old) - Regardless of your mobility, FSWC wants to treat you to a fun activity.

$12 -  FSWC logoed toque  -Stay warm out there 

$20 -  FSWC t-shirt - Improving over-all health, independence, and qualify of life are all part of FSWC mission - show your support and help to create the START program for children in need.

$35 -  Limited edition zip up - Available in Green, Grey, Purple, Maroon, Orange. LIMITED IN STOCK. get yours now

-Help spread the word!  “Recognize Potential, Not Limits”

Quantities Available (please list preference in notes on checkout):

  • Green- 2 small, 1 medium, 1 large
  • Orange- 2 small, 2 large, 1 X large
  • Purple- 2 small, 1 X large
  • Grey- 1 medium
  • Maroon- 1 small, 1 large, 1 X large

$50 -  FSWC front zip hoodie - FSWC achieves its success by hiring highly trained staff, utilizes specialized equipment, and are always looking for ways to advancing our training methods.  

-Support FSWC in bringing the Therasuit Method to Saskatchewan!

$80 -  1-hour training session - develop an exercise program with one of our highly trained staff to meet your needs.

$100 - Eddie Bauer Softshell Jacket -  We believe that each individual has the potential to regain lost function. 

Clothing created by:

story:
Nucleus is an innovative system that uses a patented liquid impact technology to generate kinetic energy to stimulate your muscles in the most natural and powerful way. 

HOW IS NUCLEUS DIFFERENT?

Unlike traditional weightlifting, each Nucleus movement elicits a consistent full-body resistance which will help any user develop the most stable foundation.  Nucleus is uniquely suited for both elite athletes and casual users interested in developing a strong body safely and in the right way. 

Look what people said about Nucleus In LA FitExpo 2020

 

WHY IS NUCLEUS SO GREAT FOR ATHLETES?

The Nucleus Method is based on combining explosive movements with liquid impact to recreate optimal athletic movement patterns.  Nucleus activates the core and surrounding stabilizing muscles in the most natural and effective way.  The result is increased performance and unprecedented functional control. 

WHAT IF I ALREADY TRAIN HARD WITH WEIGHTS?

Nucleus is the perfect complement to your bodybuilding routine due to the resulting hypertrophy stimulated during Nucleus Training.

In our tests with professional bodybuilders we found that Nucleus is the perfect "finisher" exercise for your training routine as it is a perfect tool to exhaust the muscles fibers.

Long sessions of cardio may cause muscular catabolism leading to loss of muscle tissue.  The Nucleus 12-minute routine combines cardio with kinetic resistance to amplify your gains.

WHY IS NUCLEUS SO GREAT FOR EVERYONE?

Nucleus has been carefully designed to adapt to your physical condition.  It is lightweight, portable, and extremely durable.  Each Nucleus exercise focuses on core stability and balance which allows anyone to perform a full body workout safely and confidently at any level without the risks and complexity imposed by traditional weightlifting.  If you are planning on embarking on a weight training routine, Nucleus is the perfect training partner!

WHAT ARE THE KEY BENEFITS OF NUCLEUS CENTRAL CORE PRO?

Training with Nucleus will help anyone develop unprecedented speed, strength, flexibility, endurance and balance. Unlike traditional core isolation exercises, repetitions with the Nucleus are full body exercises.  The Nucleus Method is all you need to lose weight, get lean, and develop a solid foundation for your healthiest body. 

 

With Nucleus the kinetic energy forces the fluid away from you, and while you work against this momentum - your muscles are hyper-engaged giving you an amazing workout in record time.

It is very easy to use and incredibly fun!   Do you have 12 minutes? 

The faster you move, the harder it gets!  Move Nucleus slowly, and the resistance will be light. Move it 3x faster, and the resistance will be 3x harder! That’s why everyone can use it, from beginners to pro athletes. 

When you twist, thrust, and move, you’ll feel the liquid blend inside push in the opposite direction, making 5 pounds feel like so much more. 

Our team of experts in fitness and health have the knowledge, skill, and expertise to show the world why Nucleus is so special, we just need your help!

Designed and Manufactured in the USA. 

We are committed to all of you. Your trust is very important to us. We are producing Nucleus Central Core in Los Angeles, where we are based.  This way we can oversee the production and quality control and ensure that each Nucleus device sold helps you reach your fitness goals and beyond...

 

As seen on...

 

 

We wanted to know how effective Nucleus was, so we ran two 30 day challenges (16 workouts of 12 minutes) with individuals of different ages and physical condition.  All of them not only lost weight but gained strength and mobility as well as increased balance, posture and stability.

Here are some of the 30 day transformations:

You can see in our Instagram profile @nucleuscorepro (In Highlight "Challenge") the videos of their workouts. 

We will offer you a library of on-demand videos with Top Trainers from Los Angeles and also workout routines to train with Nucleus anytime & anywhere from any device. You can take Nucleus wherever you travel and our trainer will be there with you to guide and teach you how to use it. 

 

Nucleus is not a weight.  It can not be compared with any weight in the market. This compact powerhouse will give you a full-body workout you can take with you wherever you go.

 

Your contribution will help us complete our production and advertise Nucleus to the world. 

Our unique device helps people to get into shape faster without impacting their joints. Regardless of a person’s fitness condition, age, or ability, Nucleus will increase the number of calories burned per minute, boost metabolism, engage between approximately 80% of the muscles of your body at the same time, and burn more fat in just a 12 minute session. 

 

Our device can be used by everyone - from complete beginners to fitness professionals and athletes, and anyone else who wants to transform their body!

 

                   

Watch tour workout videos on any device and follow our free routines to use Nucleus anytime & anywhere


 

Unlike any other equipments or free weights, You can store Nucleus anywhere.

Dimensions: 15 inch x 12 inch x 4 inch

 

 Nucleus will help you stay in shape during traveling. Put it in your bag or your luggage. Only weights 5 lbs.

 

 

If you can’t contribute at this time, that’s okay! We appreciate you being here, and we just ask you to support our mission by sharing this campaign on social media. You can help get the word out and make some noise using the Indiegogo share tools or by shouting us out @nucleuscorepro on Instagram & Facebook. 

Used by Athletes + Professional Trainers

"It is one of the most intense workouts I have ever experienced, and it allows me to see and attack cardio in a completely new way."

-

Isaac Dotson

Division 1 Football Player

 

 

Our factory is located here in Los Angeles, California! 

We are building and preparing Nucleus units as we speak so we'll be ready to ship.

 

Because We want to send Nucleus to all our supports with this early bird deal, We are crossing our limits in production time to make this happen. We will absorb most part of the shipping cost to all the countries because your support is very important for us but We can not absorb the customs fees from every country. Those fees doesn't belong to the cost of our product is just part of the taxes of the country where you are ordering from. Thank you for your understanding!

What’s in the box (Nucleus + Travel Bag)


(Click to download)

 

Challenges

Our biggest challenge has been educating the public on what Nucleus is and why it’s different because there is nothing else like it in the market! 

 

Hey, my name is Diego! 

I’m a professional fitness trainer of 10 years with a bachelor in Physical Education and a Master’s Degree in Nutrition. I created Nucleus out of pure passion for helping people achieve their goals in fitness and health faster and more efficiently. 

I’ve been training people using High Intensity Interval Training my whole career with fantastic results, but I wanted to take the proven and efficient method up a notch. 

So after 2 years of research, testing, and development, I have created a device that will help anyone from beginners to fitness professionals to increase the number of calories burned per minute, boost metabolism, engage more muscles, and burn more fat in just a 12 minute session. 

I am looking for YOUR support to help us complete our production and advertise Nucleus to the world so everyone can experience a faster, better HIIT workout anywhere and anytime!

story:
In the year that RIDE has been open, we have served our community in many ways such as:

  • Daily free RIDEs for at-risk youth from Kinwell Academy and Indiana Academy.
  • RIDEs for the Grant County Rescue Mission where you RIDE for free by bringing in a non-perishable item for their food bank.
  • Local school sports teams from Marion High School and Mississinewa High School rode for free for team-building and encouragement.
  • A child abuse awareness and prevention RIDE where 100% of the proceeds went to a Grant County Child Abuse Prevention organization.
  • Anti-bully RIDE where 100% of the proceeds went to Big Rob Non-Profit Organization for their anti-bully program.
  • Provided 30 kids with shirts and water bottles to make their RIDE more comfortable.
  • Partnered with local schools to offer RIDEs to teachers and staff at a discounted rate to help with stress management. 

For this school year:

  • Additional schools want to participate at RIDE with their life skills programs.
  • A local non-profit that works with special needs junior and seniors wants to partner with RIDE for exercise and life skills activities.
  • More sports teams wants to utilize RIDE for cross training when weather is not conducive to outdoor training.
  • A non-profit organization that helps abused and homeless women has reached out to partner with RIDE.
  • A Y12SR addiction relapse prevention leader has partnered with RIDE to teach two Saturdays a month. These classes will be offered free of charge.
  • We have also partnered with a 3rd Degree Blackbelt and certified instructor to teach self-defense. These classes will be free to attend.

This is just the start of our vision to reach out to the community. We had previously planned to become a non-profit, but intermingling profit and non-profit is a challenge we were not ready to take on. So we are keeping the faith that God will provide and calling on all angels that want to see a change and revival in our community. Each one reach one. 

In addition to RIDE, we want to open a plant-based cafe and juice bar to provide juices, smoothies, salads, and quick on-the-go healthy food. We truly believe that part of healing involves your nutrition.

We hope we can come together as a community and accomplish the goals set for the year ahead. With a little contribution from many we believe the sky is the limit for positive change in our community.  
 

What We Need & What You Get

We need your support to help fund the outreach programs and bring a healthy food cafe to our community. In addition to the satisfaction you will get from contributing to the greater good, you will also receive tangible rewards, as noted in the perks section. 

  • We estimate it will take >$50k to support the RIDE outreach programs plus remodel the building and get all the restaurant equipment. In the event, we don't reach our entire goal, we will use the funds to first support the most needed programs such as at-risk youth, addiction recovery, self-defense, etc.  
  • Our perks range from a shout out on social media to coupons for juice and smoothies to a big banner on our building which is located on Main Street of a very busy highway. 

The Impact

Your contribution will make a positive difference in the life of the most vulnerable among us:

  • At-risk youth learning valuable life-skills that will help them get a job and start a career (or business) after high school/college, such as gardening, exercise instruction, customer service, and restaurant management,
  • A place for abused women to find support, a positive outlet, and hope for a brighter future.
  • Help those with health and allergy issues have a whole food plant-based alternative when dining out and on the go. 

Risks & Challenges

Instead of focusing on what if for some unforeseen God given reason this thriving business was to close down and you didn't get your name on the founders wall, or didn't get to finish out your year membership, or lost out on some free juices, let's instead talk about the REAL risk factors:

  • What if you don't contribute and one of our youth could have experienced a culture of health and wellness and positive environment full of encouragement and motivation that they didn't even know existed.
  • What if even one person struggling with addictions could be mentored and helped. 
  • What if women feeling hopeless and despair could have been given an outlet and shown that she is surrounded by a community that is willing to show her love, positivity, and pray with her.
  • What if one person can be helped to get off their medications because of proper nutrition and fitness.
  • What if one person can reverse years of self-doubt and self-sabotage by surrounding themselves with health conscious people that have been exactly where they are at.

Are there risks to investing? Absolutely! There is always a risk, but ask yourself what is the risk of not investing? 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute at this time, we understand, but you can still help:

  • Spread the word. Let's make some noise about this community-minded, mission-driven business and the crowdfunding campaign to serve more people in Grant County Indiana and the surrounding area, plus travelers looking for healthy vegan food. 
  • Be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools! You can also share the URL rabbitfood.cafe which links to this campaign. 
  • Pray for a successful campaign!
story_txt:
In the year that RIDE has been open, we have served our community in many ways such as:

Daily free RIDEs for at-risk youth from Kinwell Academy and Indiana Academy.
RIDEs for the Grant County Rescue Mission where you RIDE for free by bringing in a non-perishable item for their food bank.
Local school sports teams from Marion High School and Mississinewa High School rode for free for team-building and encouragement.
A child abuse awareness and prevention RIDE where 100% of the proceeds went to a Grant County Child Abuse Prevention organization.
Anti-bully RIDE where 100% of the proceeds went to Big Rob Non-Profit Organization for their anti-bully program.
Provided 30 kids with shirts and water bottles to make their RIDE more comfortable.
Partnered with local schools to offer RIDEs to teachers and staff at a discounted rate to help with stress management. 

For this school year:

Additional schools want to participate at RIDE with their life skills programs.
A local non-profit that works with special needs junior and seniors wants to partner with RIDE for exercise and life skills activities.
More sports teams wants to utilize RIDE for cross training when weather is not conducive to outdoor training.
A non-profit organization that helps abused and homeless women has reached out to partner with RIDE.
A Y12SR addiction relapse prevention leader has partnered with RIDE to teach two Saturdays a month. These classes will be offered free of charge.
We have also partnered with a 3rd Degree Blackbelt and certified instructor to teach self-defense. These classes will be free to attend.

This is just the start of our vision to reach out to the community. We had previously planned to become a non-profit, but intermingling profit and non-profit is a challenge we were not ready to take on. So we are keeping the faith that God will provide and calling on all angels that want to see a change and revival in our community. Each one reach one. 
In addition to RIDE, we want to open a plant-based cafe and juice bar to provide juices, smoothies, salads, and quick on-the-go healthy food. We truly believe that part of healing involves your nutrition.

What if women feeling hopeless and despair could have been given an outlet and shown that she is surrounded by a community that is willing to show her love, positivity, and pray with her.

Are there risks to investing? Absolutely! There is always a risk, but ask yourself what is the risk of not investing? 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you cannot contribute at this time, we understand, but you can still help:

Pray for a successful campaign!

story:
English, Deutsch, Español below

Credit card AND PayPal works. Thanks!

Ab sofort funktionieren Kreditkarte und PayPal. Danke!

Quick Summary (English)

Very important information about your health is hidden in your DNA. We can decode your DNA to provide information about your potential health status. Using predictive gene diagnostics, we can identify which genetic diseases you are at risk of developing. Furthermore, in pharmacogenomics we can analyze your DNA to determine which medications will be most effective for you, and at what dose. We can also analyze genetic predispositions to food intolerance and other genetic health factors. Our special offer is Whole-Genome-Sequencing, including genes of as yet unknown function. New research results relating to genes, health and disease can be immediately translated and applied to your genetic profile without further lab testing.

Background and Aims

We are different due to our genetic profile or DNA sequence – some of us are tall and some short, some have blue eyes and others brown eyes. Similarly, our response to medications may also be different depending on our DNA. In some people a standard drug dose may be ineffective, while in others it may have a toxic effect. Instead of being reliant on standard medication regimes, our technology allows for providing specific therapies (personalized medicine) tailored to individual needs. Our aim is to increase your quality of life.

Your benefit

You can obtain the correct dose of medication adjusted to your body. Don’t try ineffective drugs and don’t take the risk of toxicity by medication. Is there an increased risk of developing specific diseases in your family? Our technology allows for providing you with a personal risk profile. With this knowledge you have the option of taking preventive steps or making more informed choices about your treatment.

Our barrier

Our barrier is to finance a laboratory with state-of-the-art technology, which is able to produce reliable, high-precision and reproducible results, which can be analyzed by our highly qualified scientists.

Support

To provide this valuable service we need your financial support. Please share this campaign with your friends and relatives via Facebook, Twitter, YouTube and other social media. As an expression of gratitude for your support we will offer you genetic analyses at an exclusive reduced Indiegogo price. We will analyze your samples in 2015. If we are unable to start our company, your donation will be fully refunded. 

Perks

Every single donation counts, it doesn’t matter how low or high. It shows us your interest in our genetic health service. We need your support to start this company. You will receive your genetic analysis from the special price of 250 Euro (starting at 450 Euro). You can select different gene analyses, diseases and drugs of interest to you, and after analyzing your DNA, we can provide you with important health information, which is tailored to your DNA profile. Please ask us for medication and genetic diseases which are not listed here, because we may also analyze them.

Where and for whom is ‘Dr. Seibt Genomics’ service available?

Worldwide in all countries, for everyone. It doesn’t matter if you are ill or healthy, young or old.

How does it work?

Order your Perk here on Indiegogo (only available until 18th of October 2014) or log in to our website www.dr-seibt-genomics.com (website under construction, but available from January 2015), select our service and you will get the “Dr. Seibt Genomics Kit” with a sample tube. Send us your saliva sample in this tube. We will then analyze your DNA and send you your results. We also offer consultation by our specialized doctors (online or in person).

Data security

Data security is of paramount importance to us and vital to our ongoing business. We guarantee that only you will have access to your data and it will not be disclosed to any third party.

The ‘Dr. Seibt Genomics’ Team

CEO: Dr. Benjamin Seibt (PhD)

Benjamin Seibt studied pharmacy in Bonn (Germany) and completed his PhD in pharmaceutical/medicinal chemistry. During his PhD he worked in Barcelona (Spain) and the Max-Planck-Institute in Göttingen (Germany). He is an honorary member of the board of directors of the Chamber of Pharmacists in Nordrhein (Germany). On completion of his PhD he travelled around the world with his tent and met many local people on all continents. In 2013/2014 he worked as a postdoctoral research fellow at the University of Melbourne and St. Vincent’s Hospital Melbourne, Australia. Benjamin Seibt received the Bayer-PhD award and in 2014 the 'Young Investigator Award' in Canberra (Australia) from the 'Transplantation Society of Australia and New Zealand'. Together with Dr. Anke Schiedel and Dr. Bettina Mecking he founded the company ‘Dr. Seibt Genomics’ in 2014.

Executive board: Dr. Anke Schiedel (PhD) Private lecturer

Anke Schiedel studied biology and completed her PhD in biology in Münster. She worked in New York as a postdoctoral research fellow and established her own group in Bonn (Germany). Anke Schiedel acquired her venia legendi in medicinal chemistry in 2013 in Bonn.

Co-founder: Dr. Bettina Mecking (Doctor of Law)

Bettina Mecking studied law and also completed her PhD in law. She is a legal advisor and has specialized in medical law. Bettina Mecking is also a representative and general manager of the Chamber of Pharmacists in Nordrhein (Germany).

Pharmacists: Dr. Meryem Köse (PhD) and Dorothee Müssemeier (MSc)

We kindly thank our pharmacists Dr. Meryem Köse and Dorothee Müssemeier, who support Dr. Seibt Genomics and participated in our crowd funding video.




Kurzbeschreibung –

Dr. Seibt Genomics (Deutsch)

Viele sehr wichtige Informationen über Ihre Gesundheit liegen in Ihrer DNA verborgen. Wir entschlüsseln dieses Wissen für Sie. Mit der prädiktiven Gendiagnostik klären wir Sie darüber auf, welche genetischen Krankheiten Sie erwarten oder verschonen. Anhand Ihrer DNA können wir Ihnen vorhersagen, welche Arzneimittel bei Ihnen wirken und welche nicht. Außerdem passen wir mittels Pharmakogenomik die Dosis individuell auf Ihre DNA an. Zusätzlich untersuchen wir genetisch bedingte Lebensmittel(un)verträglichkeiten und genetische Gesundheitsfaktoren. Eine Besonderheit ist die gesamte Genomanalyse inklusive Auswertung, bei der alle Gene untersucht werden, auch diejenigen, deren Bedeutung heute noch nicht erforscht ist. Bei neuen Forschungsergebnissen ist ein einfacher und schneller Abgleich, ohne erneute Analyse, möglich.

Hintergrund und Ziele

Menschen sind unterschiedlich - manche sind groß oder klein, haben blaue oder braune Augen. Wie ein Arzneimittel wirkt ist genauso unterschiedlich. Eine Standarddosis hat bei manchen Menschen keine Wirkung und bei anderen bereits eine toxische. Verlassen Sie die übliche Massentherapie und gehen Sie zusammen mit Dr. Seibt Genomics zur maßgeschneiderten Individualtherapie über. Unser Ziel ist die Verbesserung der Lebensqualität eines jeden Menschen.

Ihr Vorteil

Probieren Sie keine unwirksamen Arzneimittel aus und liefern Sie sich nicht mehr der Gefahr der Überdosierung aus. Sind in Ihrer Familie vermehrt bestimmte Krankheiten aufgetreten? Erfahren Sie mit Dr. Seibt Genomics Ihr individuelles genetisches Krankheitsrisiko. Mit diesem Wissen können Sie frühzeitig präventiv handeln und richtig reagieren. Ist es nicht auch beruhigend zu wissen, welche Krankheiten genetisch ausgeschlossen werden können?

Unsere Hürde

Ein Labor mit Hightech-Geräten auszustatten, die in der Lage sind, zuverlässige, hochpräzise und reproduzierbare Daten zu liefern und diese von unseren hochqualifizierten Wissenschaftlern analysieren zu lassen, kostet sehr viel Geld.

Unterstützung

Für den Firmenstart benötigen wir Ihre finanzielle Unterstützung. Bitte verbreiten Sie unsere Kampagne bei Ihren Freunden und Bekannten via Facebook, Twitter, YouTube und weiteren sozialen Medien. Sie werden durch Ihre Unterstützung exklusiv unsere ersten Kunden und Sie erhalten unsere Leistungen zu einem günstigeren Preis, der nur hier bei Indiegogo angeboten wird. Ihre Analyse wird 2015 erfolgen. Sollten wir in 2015 nicht mit der Firma starten können (was wir nicht hoffen), dann erhalten Sie ihr gespendetes Geld in voller Höhe zurück.

Perks

Jede einzelne Spende zählt und ist uns sehr wichtig, unabhängig von der Höhe. Es zeigt Ihr Interesse an unserem speziellen genetischen Gesundheitsservice. Wir benötigen Ihre Unterstützung, um die Firma aufzubauen. Unsere genetischen Untersuchungen gibt es ab 250 € (normaler Preis ab 450 €). Wählen Sie zwischen unterschiedlichen Gesundheitsmarkern, Krankheiten und Arzneimitteln aus. Wir untersuchen Ihre DNA daraufhin. Bitte fragen Sie nach Arzneimitteln und genetischen Krankheiten, die hier nicht aufgelistet sind, da wir diese möglicherweise ebenfalls untersuchen können.

Wo und für wen ist die Dienstleistung von Dr. Seibt Genomics verfügbar?

Weltweit in allen Ländern für alle Menschen, egal ob gesund oder krank, jung oder alt, egal welcher Herkunft!

Wie funktioniert es?

Bestellen Sie bei Indiegogo einen Perk (nur für kurze Zeit möglich; bis 18. Oktober 2014) oder loggen Sie sich unter www.dr-seibt-genomics.com (Homepage befindet sich im Aufbau; ab Januar 2015 möglich) online ein und wählen Sie die gewünschten Dienstleistungen aus. Wir schicken daraufhin eine Box mit einem Speichelprobenröhrchen, das „Dr. Seibt Genomics Kit“, zu, Sie sondern Speichel in dieses Röhrchen und senden es zurück an uns. Wir analysieren Ihre DNA und schicken Ihnen die Daten. Lassen Sie sich von unserem Arzt beraten und betreuen (fernmündlich oder vor Ort).

Datensicherheit

Datensicherheit ist uns extrem wichtig und hat in unserer Firma einen sehr hohen Stellenwert. Wir garantieren Ihnen, dass nur Sie Zugriff auf Ihre Daten haben und wir Ihre Daten unter keinen Umständen an Dritte weitergeben.

Dr. Seibt Genomics Team

Geschäftsführer: Dr. rer. nat. Benjamin Seibt

Benjamin Seibt hat in Bonn Pharmazie studiert, in pharmazeutischer Chemie promoviert und parallel den „Fachapotheker für Arzneimittelinformation“ absolviert. Im Rahmen der Promotion hat er an der Universität in Barcelona (Spanien) und dem Max-Planck-Institut in Göttingen gearbeitet. Benjamin Seibt arbeitet ehrenamtlich im Vorstand der Apothekerkammer Nordrhein (stellv.). Nach der Promotion ist er mit dem Zelt um die Welt gereist und hat zahlreiche einheimische Menschen auf allen Kontinenten kennengelernt. Anschließend hat er als Postdoktorand in Australien für die Universität Melbourne und das St. Vincent’s Krankenhaus Melbourne gearbeitet. Benjamin Seibt ist Preisträger des Bayer-Promotionspreises. 2014 wurde er mit dem  "Young Investigator Award" in Canberra (Australien) von der "Transplantation Society of Australia and New Zealand" ausgezeichnet. Zusammen mit Frau Dr. Schiedel und Frau Dr. Mecking hat er 2014 die Firma Dr. Seibt Genomics gegründet.

Geschäftsführerin: Priv.-Doz. Dr. rer. nat. Anke Schiedel

Anke Schiedel hat Biologie in Münster studiert und in diesem Fach promoviert. Als Postdoktorandin hat Sie in New York gearbeitet, anschließend in Bonn ihren eigenen Arbeitskreis aufgebaut und sich in Medizinischer Chemie habilitiert.

Mitbegründerin: Dr. jur. Bettina Mecking

Bettina Mecking hat Jura studiert und ihre Promotion in diesem Fachbereich abgeschlossen. Sie ist Fachanwältin für Medizinrecht und Justiziarin, sowie Geschäftsführerin (stellv.) der Apothekerkammer Nordrhein.

Apothekerinnen: Dr. rer. nat. Meryem Köse und Dorothee Müssemeier (MSc)

Wir danken insbesondere den beiden Apothekerinnen Dr. Meryem Köse und Dorothee Müssemeier, die in dem Crowdfunding-Video mitspielen und Dr. Seibt Genomics sehr unterstützen.



Resumen Corto – Dr. Seibt Genomics (Español-Sudamerica)

Su ADN contiene muchas informaciones importantes sobre su propia salud. Nosotros analizamos su ADN, le aclaramos cuales son las enfermedades genéticas que usted podría desarrollar durante su vida y cuáles se puede excluir genéticamente (diagnóstico genético predictivo). Mediante su ADN le podemos sugerir cuales son los medicamentos que le hacen efecto a usted y cuales no. Para los medicamentos que le hacen efecto, adoptamos la dosis individualmente a su ADN (farmacogenómica). Adicionalmente exploramos (in)tolerancias a los alimentos condicionados genéticamente y factores de salud genéticos. Una singularidad es la secuenciación del ADN completo incluyendo análisis y evaluación. Se examina todos los genes, incluyendo los genes cuales funciones no se ha investigado todavía. Con nuevos hallazgos de investigación la comparación será más fácil y más rápida sin tener que hacer un nuevo análisis.

Trasfondo y metas

Seres humanos son diferentes; algunos son altos, otros chicos, algunos gordos otros flacos. Cada medicamento impacta de manera diferente a cada ser humano. Una dosis estándar no puede tener ningún impacto en algunas personas, mientras que para otras puede ser tóxica. Dejemos la terapia convencional de masas y vamos juntos hacia una terapia individual hecha a la medida con Dr. Seibt Genomics. La meta es la mejora de la calidad de vida de cada ser humano.

Su ventaja

No pruebe más medicamentos que no le hagan efecto. No se arriesgue a tomar una sobredosis de algún fármaco.

¿En su familia se repitieron ciertas enfermedades? Conozca a través de Dr Seibt Genomics el riesgo individual de tener enfermedades genéticas. Con este conocimiento puede actuar acertadamente de manera preventiva. En caso que ocurra la enfermedad puede reaccionar rápidamente y de manera acertada para poder hacerle frente en la fase del desarrollo. Es tranquilizante también saber cuáles son las enfermedades que se puede descartar genéticamente durante su vida.

Nuestro obstáculo

Nuestro obstáculo es el financiamiento de un laboratorio con los implementos de alta tecnología, con los cuales se puede entregar datos confiables y precisos que se puede reproducir para que puedan ser analizados por nuestros científicos altamente calificados.

Apoyo

Para el lanzamiento de la empresa necesitamos su generosa ayuda financiera y la distribución de esta campaña entre amigos y conocidos a través de Facebook, Twitter, YouTube y otros medios sociales. Por su ayuda será uno de nuestros primeros clientes y recibirá nuestros servicios a un precio menor, que solamente se dará acá en Indiegogo. Su análisis será realizado a partir de 2015. Si no nos fuera posible de lanzar la empresa en el transcurso de 2015 (algo que esperemos que no pase) recibirán la donación completa de vuelta.

Beneficios/Perks

Cada donación, independiente del monto, cuenta. Demuestra su interés en nuestro servicio genético de salud. Nosotros necesitamos su ayuda para lanzar la compañía. Por su valiosa donación usted recibirá un análisis genético por el precio especial de 250 Euros (normalmente a partir de 450 Euros). Usted puede elegir entre diferentes análisis de genes, enfermedades o medicamentos que pueden ser de interés para usted. Después de analizar su ADN nosotros le proveemos informaciones importantes sobre su salud, hecha a la medida basado en su perfil de ADN. Por favor consulte por medicamentos y enfermedades genéticas que no encuentre en la lista ya que las podríamos analizar también.


¿Dónde y para quién estarán disponibles los servicios de Dr. Seibt Genomics?

A nivel mundial, para todos los seres humanos, independientemente, sano o enfermo, joven o viejo, no importando su procedencia.

¿Cómo funciona?

Ordene en Indiegogo un “Perk”  (posible solamente hasta el 18 de octubre 2014) o inicie una sesión en www.dr-seibt-genomics.com (página web en construcción; posible a partir de enero del 2015) y seleccione el servicio deseado. Nosotros le enviamos una caja con un tubo para su saliva (el “Kit de Dr. Seibt Genomics“). Usted secreta un poco de su saliva en el tubo y lo envía devuelta a nosotros. Nosotros analizamos su ADN y le enviamos sus datos. Déjese asesorar y atender de nuestro médico (telefónicamente o en el lugar).

La seguridad de los datos

La seguridad de los datos es uno de los campos más importantes y bajo ningunas circunstancias pasaremos sus datos a terceros.

El equipo de Dr. Seibt Genomics

Director Gerente: Doctor rerum naturalium Benjamin Seibt

Benjamin Seibt estudió farmacología en Bonn (Alemania), obtuvo su doctorado en química farmacéutica y paralelamente hizo el título alemán de “químico farmacéutico especializado en las informaciones de fármacos”. Durante su promoción trabajó en la Universidad de Barcelona (España) y en el Instituto Max-Planck en Göttingen (Alemania). Benjamin Seibt tiene el cargo de representante honorífico en la junta directiva de la “Cámara de Farmacéuticos Renania del Norte”. Después de su promoción viajó con una carpa alrededor del mundo y conoció a muchas personas en todos los continentes. Después hizo la investigación de postdoctorado en Melbourne (Australia) en el hospital St. Vincent para la Universidad de Melbourne. En 2014 fundó junto a Dra. Schiedel y Dra. Mecking la empresa Dr. Seibt Genomics.

Directora Gerente: Profesora Asociada y Doctora rerum naturalium Anke Schiedel

Anke Schiedel estudió biología y obtuvo su doctorado en biología en la Universidad de Münster. Para la investigación postdoctoral trabajó en Nueva York y creó su propio grupo de trabajo en Bonn (Alemania). Anke Schiedel adquirió su  venia legendi  en química medicinal en 2013 en Bonn.

Cofundadora: Doctora en Derecho Bettina Mecking

Bettina Mecking estudió Derecho y obtuvo su doctorado en la misma área. Es abogada especializada en derecho medicinal y abogada especializada en asesoría jurídica. Además es  directora representante de la “Cámara de Farmacéuticos de Renania del Norte”

Farmacéuticas: Dra. Meryem Köse y Dorothee Müssemeier

Damos las gracias especialmente a las dos farmacéuticas Dr. Meryem Köse y Dorothee Müssemeier, que participaron en el video de Crowdfunding y apoyan mucho a Dr. Seibt Genomics.
