gene analyses, diseases and drugs of interest to you, and after
analyzing your DNA, we can provide you with important health information, which is tailored to your DNA profile. Please ask us for medication
and genetic diseases which are not listed here, because we may also analyze
them.


Where and for
whom is ‘Dr. Seibt Genomics’ service available?
Worldwide in all countries,
for everyone. It doesn’t matter if you are ill or healthy, young or old.
How does it work?
Order your Perk here on
Indiegogo (only available until 18th of October 2014) or log in to our
website www.dr-seibt-genomics.com (website under construction, but available from
January 2015), select our service and you will get the “Dr. Seibt Genomics Kit”
with a sample tube. Send us your saliva sample in this tube. We will then analyze
your DNA and send you your results. We also offer consultation by our
specialized doctors (online or in person).
Data security
Data security is of paramount
importance to us and vital to our ongoing business. We guarantee that only
you will have access to your data and it will not be disclosed to any third
party.
The ‘Dr. Seibt Genomics’ Team


CEO: Dr. Benjamin Seibt (PhD)

Benjamin Seibt studied
pharmacy in Bonn (Germany) and completed his PhD in pharmaceutical/medicinal
chemistry. During his PhD he worked in Barcelona (Spain) and the
Max-Planck-Institute in Göttingen (Germany). He is an honorary member of the
board of directors of the Chamber of
Pharmacists in Nordrhein (Germany). On completion of his PhD he travelled
around the world with his tent and met many local people on all continents. In
2013/2014 he worked as a postdoctoral research fellow at the University of
Melbourne and St. Vincent’s Hospital Melbourne, Australia. Benjamin Seibt received the Bayer-PhD award and in 2014 the 'Young Investigator Award'  in Canberra (Australia) from the 'Transplantation Society of Australia and New Zealand'. Together with Dr.
Anke Schiedel and Dr. Bettina Mecking he founded the company ‘Dr. Seibt
Genomics’ in 2014. 
Executive board: Dr. Anke
Schiedel (PhD) Private lecturer
Anke Schiedel studied biology
and completed her PhD in biology in Münster. She worked in New York as a postdoctoral
research fellow and established her own group in Bonn
(Germany). Anke Schiedel acquired her venia legendi in medicinal chemistry in 2013
in Bonn.
Co-founder: Dr. Bettina
Mecking (Doctor of Law)
Bettina Mecking studied law
and also completed her PhD in law. She is a legal advisor and has specialized
in medical law. Bettina Mecking is also a representative and general manager of
the Chamber
of Pharmacists
in Nordrhein (Germany).
Pharmacists: Dr. Meryem Köse (PhD) and Dorothee Müssemeier (MSc)
We kindly thank our
pharmacists Dr. Meryem
Köse and Dorothee Müssemeier, who support Dr. Seibt Genomics and participated in our crowd funding
video.




Kurzbeschreibung – 
Dr. Seibt Genomics (Deutsch)
Viele sehr wichtige Informationen über Ihre Gesundheit
liegen in Ihrer DNA verborgen. Wir entschlüsseln dieses Wissen für Sie. Mit der
prädiktiven Gendiagnostik klären wir Sie darüber auf, welche genetischen
Krankheiten Sie erwarten oder verschonen. Anhand Ihrer DNA können wir Ihnen
vorhersagen, welche Arzneimittel bei Ihnen wirken und welche nicht. Außerdem
passen wir mittels Pharmakogenomik die Dosis individuell auf Ihre DNA an.
Zusätzlich untersuchen wir genetisch bedingte Lebensmittel(un)verträglichkeiten
und genetische Gesundheitsfaktoren. Eine Besonderheit ist die gesamte Genomanalyse
inklusive Auswertung, bei der alle Gene untersucht werden, auch diejenigen,
deren Bedeutung heute noch nicht erforscht ist. Bei neuen Forschungsergebnissen
ist ein einfacher und schneller Abgleich, ohne erneute Analyse, möglich.
Hintergrund und Ziele
Menschen sind unterschiedlich - manche sind groß oder
klein, haben blaue oder braune Augen. Wie ein Arzneimittel wirkt ist genauso
unterschiedlich. Eine Standarddosis hat bei manchen Menschen keine Wirkung und
bei anderen bereits eine toxische. Verlassen Sie die übliche Massentherapie und
gehen Sie zusammen mit Dr. Seibt Genomics zur maßgeschneiderten
Individualtherapie über. Unser Ziel ist
die Verbesserung der Lebensqualität eines jeden Menschen.
Ihr Vorteil 
Probieren Sie keine unwirksamen Arzneimittel aus und
liefern Sie sich nicht mehr der Gefahr der Überdosierung aus. Sind in Ihrer
Familie vermehrt bestimmte Krankheiten aufgetreten? Erfahren Sie mit Dr. Seibt
Genomics Ihr individuelles genetisches Krankheitsrisiko. Mit diesem Wissen
können Sie frühzeitig präventiv handeln und richtig reagieren. Ist es nicht
auch beruhigend zu wissen, welche Krankheiten genetisch ausgeschlossen werden
können?
Unsere Hürde
Ein Labor mit Hightech-Geräten auszustatten, die in
der Lage sind, zuverlässige, hochpräzise und reproduzierbare Daten zu liefern
und diese von unseren hochqualifizierten Wissenschaftlern analysieren zu
lassen, kostet sehr viel Geld.
Unterstützung
Für den Firmenstart benötigen wir Ihre finanzielle Unterstützung.
Bitte verbreiten Sie unsere Kampagne bei Ihren Freunden und Bekannten via
Facebook, Twitter, YouTube und weiteren sozialen Medien. Sie werden durch Ihre
Unterstützung exklusiv unsere ersten Kunden und Sie erhalten unsere Leistungen
zu einem günstigeren Preis, der nur hier bei Indiegogo angeboten wird. Ihre
Analyse wird 2015 erfolgen. Sollten wir in 2015 nicht mit der Firma starten
können (was wir nicht hoffen), dann erhalten Sie ihr gespendetes Geld in voller
Höhe zurück.
Perks
Jede
einzelne Spende zählt und ist uns sehr wichtig, unabhängig von der Höhe. Es zeigt Ihr Interesse an unserem speziellen genetischen Gesundheitsservice. Wir
benötigen Ihre Unterstützung, um die Firma aufzubauen. Unsere genetischen
Untersuchungen gibt es ab 250 € (normaler Preis ab 450 €). Wählen Sie zwischen
unterschiedlichen Gesundheitsmarkern, Krankheiten und Arzneimitteln aus. Wir
untersuchen Ihre DNA daraufhin. Bitte fragen Sie nach Arzneimitteln und
genetischen Krankheiten, die hier nicht aufgelistet sind, da wir diese
möglicherweise ebenfalls untersuchen können.




Wo und für wen ist die
Dienstleistung von Dr. Seibt Genomics verfügbar?
Weltweit in allen Ländern für alle Menschen, egal ob
gesund oder krank, jung oder alt, egal welcher Herkunft!
Wie funktioniert es?
Bestellen Sie bei Indiegogo einen Perk (nur für kurze
Zeit möglich; bis 18. Oktober 2014) oder loggen Sie sich unter www.dr-seibt-genomics.com (Homepage befindet sich im Aufbau;
ab Januar 2015 möglich) online ein und wählen Sie die gewünschten Dienstleistungen aus.
Wir schicken daraufhin eine Box mit einem Speichelprobenröhrchen, das „Dr.
Seibt Genomics Kit“, zu, Sie sondern Speichel in dieses Röhrchen und senden es
zurück an uns. Wir analysieren Ihre DNA und schicken Ihnen die Daten. Lassen
Sie sich von unserem Arzt beraten und betreuen (fernmündlich oder vor Ort).
Datensicherheit
Datensicherheit ist uns extrem wichtig und hat in unserer Firma einen sehr hohen Stellenwert. Wir garantieren Ihnen, dass nur Sie Zugriff auf Ihre Daten haben und wir Ihre Daten unter keinen Umständen an Dritte weitergeben.
Dr. Seibt Genomics Team


Geschäftsführer: Dr. rer. nat. Benjamin
Seibt
Benjamin Seibt hat in Bonn Pharmazie
studiert, in pharmazeutischer Chemie promoviert und parallel den „Fachapotheker
für Arzneimittelinformation“ absolviert. Im Rahmen der Promotion hat er an der
Universität in Barcelona (Spanien) und dem Max-Planck-Institut in Göttingen gearbeitet. Benjamin Seibt arbeitet ehrenamtlich im Vorstand der
Apothekerkammer Nordrhein (stellv.). Nach der Promotion ist er mit dem Zelt um
die Welt gereist und hat zahlreiche einheimische Menschen auf allen Kontinenten
kennengelernt. Anschließend hat er als Postdoktorand in Australien für die
Universität Melbourne und das St. Vincent’s Krankenhaus Melbourne gearbeitet. Benjamin Seibt ist Preisträger des Bayer-Promotionspreises. 2014 wurde er mit dem  "Young Investigator Award" in Canberra (Australien) von der "Transplantation Society of Australia and New Zealand" ausgezeichnet. Zusammen
mit Frau Dr. Schiedel und Frau Dr. Mecking hat er 2014 die Firma Dr. Seibt
Genomics gegründet.


Geschäftsführerin: Priv.-Doz. Dr.
rer. nat. Anke Schiedel

Anke Schiedel hat Biologie in Münster studiert und in diesem Fach
promoviert. Als Postdoktorandin hat Sie in New York gearbeitet, anschließend
in Bonn ihren eigenen Arbeitskreis aufgebaut und sich in Medizinischer Chemie habilitiert. 



Mitbegründerin: Dr. jur. Bettina
Mecking

Bettina Mecking hat Jura studiert und ihre Promotion in
diesem Fachbereich abgeschlossen. Sie ist Fachanwältin für Medizinrecht und
Justiziarin, sowie Geschäftsführerin (stellv.) der Apothekerkammer Nordrhein.
Apothekerinnen: Dr. rer. nat. Meryem Köse und Dorothee
Müssemeier (MSc)
Wir danken insbesondere den beiden Apothekerinnen
Dr. Meryem Köse und Dorothee Müssemeier, die in dem Crowdfunding-Video mitspielen
und Dr. Seibt Genomics sehr unterstützen.



Resumen Corto – Dr. Seibt
Genomics (Español-Sudamerica)
Su ADN contiene muchas
informaciones importantes sobre su propia salud. Nosotros analizamos su ADN, le
aclaramos cuales son las enfermedades genéticas que usted podría desarrollar
durante su vida y cuáles se puede excluir genéticamente (diagnóstico genético
predictivo). Mediante su ADN le podemos sugerir cuales son los medicamentos que
le hacen efecto a usted y cuales no. Para los medicamentos que le hacen efecto,
adoptamos la dosis individualmente a su ADN (farmacogenómica). Adicionalmente
exploramos (in)tolerancias a los alimentos condicionados genéticamente y
factores de salud genéticos. Una singularidad es la secuenciación del ADN
completo incluyendo análisis y evaluación. Se examina todos los genes,
incluyendo los genes cuales funciones no se ha investigado todavía. Con nuevos
hallazgos de investigación la comparación será más fácil y más rápida sin tener
que hacer un nuevo análisis. 

Trasfondo y
metas
Seres humanos son diferentes;
algunos son altos, otros chicos, algunos gordos otros flacos. Cada medicamento
impacta de manera diferente a cada ser humano. Una dosis estándar no puede
tener ningún impacto en algunas personas, mientras que para otras puede ser
tóxica. Dejemos la terapia convencional de masas y vamos juntos hacia una
terapia individual hecha a la medida con Dr. Seibt Genomics. La meta es la
mejora de la calidad de vida de cada ser humano. 

Su ventaja
No pruebe más medicamentos que
no le hagan efecto. No se arriesgue a tomar una sobredosis de algún fármaco. 
¿En su familia se repitieron
ciertas enfermedades? Conozca a través de Dr Seibt Genomics el riesgo
individual de tener enfermedades genéticas. Con este conocimiento puede actuar
acertadamente de manera preventiva. En caso que ocurra la enfermedad puede
reaccionar rápidamente y de manera acertada para poder hacerle frente en la
fase del desarrollo. Es tranquilizante también saber cuáles son las
enfermedades que se puede descartar genéticamente durante su vida. 

Nuestro obstáculo
Nuestro obstáculo es el
financiamiento de un laboratorio con los implementos de alta tecnología, con
los cuales se puede entregar datos confiables y precisos que se puede
reproducir para que puedan ser analizados por nuestros científicos altamente
calificados. 
Apoyo
Para el lanzamiento de la
empresa necesitamos su generosa ayuda financiera y la distribución de esta
campaña entre amigos y conocidos a través de Facebook, Twitter, YouTube y otros
medios sociales. Por su ayuda será uno de nuestros primeros clientes y recibirá
nuestros servicios a un precio menor, que solamente se dará acá en Indiegogo.
Su análisis será realizado a partir de 2015. Si no nos fuera posible de lanzar
la empresa en el transcurso de 2015 (algo que esperemos que no pase) recibirán
la donación completa de vuelta.

Beneficios/Perks

Cada donación,
independiente del monto, cuenta. Demuestra su interés en nuestro servicio
genético de salud. Nosotros necesitamos su ayuda para lanzar la compañía. Por
su valiosa donación usted recibirá un análisis genético por el precio especial
de 250 Euros (normalmente a partir de 450 Euros). Usted puede elegir entre
diferentes análisis de genes, enfermedades o medicamentos que pueden ser de
interés para usted. Después de analizar su ADN nosotros le proveemos
informaciones importantes sobre su salud, hecha a la medida basado en su perfil
de ADN. Por favor consulte por medicamentos y enfermedades genéticas que no
encuentre en la lista ya que las podríamos analizar también.

¿Dónde y
para quién estarán disponibles los servicios de Dr. Seibt Genomics?
A nivel mundial, para todos los seres humanos, independientemente, sano o
enfermo, joven o viejo, no importando su procedencia. 
¿Cómo
funciona?
Ordene en Indiegogo un “Perk”  (posible solamente hasta el 18 de octubre
2014) o inicie una sesión en www.dr-seibt-genomics.com (página web en construcción;
posible a partir de enero del 2015) y seleccione el servicio deseado. Nosotros
le enviamos una caja con un tubo para su saliva (el “Kit de Dr. Seibt Genomics“).
Usted secreta un poco de su saliva en el tubo y lo envía devuelta a nosotros.
Nosotros analizamos su ADN y le enviamos sus datos. Déjese asesorar y atender
de nuestro médico (telefónicamente o en el lugar). 
La seguridad de los datos
La seguridad de los datos es
uno de los campos más importantes y bajo ningunas circunstancias pasaremos sus datos
a terceros. 
El equipo de
Dr. Seibt Genomics


Director
Gerente: Doctor rerum naturalium Benjamin Seibt

Benjamin Seibt estudió
farmacología en Bonn (Alemania), obtuvo su doctorado en química farmacéutica y
paralelamente hizo el título alemán de “químico farmacéutico especializado en las
informaciones de fármacos”. Durante su promoción trabajó en la Universidad de
Barcelona (España) y en el Instituto Max-Planck en Göttingen (Alemania).
Benjamin Seibt tiene el cargo de representante honorífico en la junta directiva
de la “Cámara de Farmacéuticos Renania del Norte”. Después de su promoción
viajó con una carpa alrededor del mundo y conoció a muchas personas en todos
los continentes. Después hizo la investigación de postdoctorado en Melbourne
(Australia) en el hospital St. Vincent para la Universidad de Melbourne. En
2014 fundó junto a Dra. Schiedel y Dra. Mecking la empresa Dr. Seibt Genomics. 

Directora
Gerente: Profesora Asociada y Doctora rerum naturalium Anke Schiedel

Anke Schiedel estudió biología y obtuvo su
doctorado en biología en la Universidad de Münster. Para la investigación
postdoctoral trabajó en Nueva York y creó su propio grupo de trabajo en Bonn
(Alemania). Anke Schiedel adquirió su  venia legendi  en química
medicinal en 2013 en Bonn. 
Cofundadora:
Doctora en Derecho Bettina Mecking
Bettina Mecking estudió Derecho y obtuvo su doctorado en la misma área. Es
abogada especializada en derecho medicinal y abogada especializada en asesoría
jurídica. Además es  directora
representante de la “Cámara de Farmacéuticos de Renania del Norte” 
Farmacéuticas:
Dra. Meryem Köse y Dorothee Müssemeier
Damos las gracias
especialmente a las dos farmacéuticas Dr. Meryem Köse y Dorothee Müssemeier, que
participaron en el video de Crowdfunding y apoyan mucho a Dr. Seibt Genomics.

story:
OUR STORY

                                              

"From the Teaching Hands of our Elders"

Humble Beginnings…

Many people have asked, how did you come up with the idea for Rather Lather? Actually, the origin of Rather Lather Soap Creations came from my grandmother. Grandma Susie, as she was affectionately called, was quite resourceful and resilient. Born in 1908, she lived to be nearly 101 years old, before passing away in August 2009. She and I were extremely close, and she imparted a lot of wisdom, knowledge and creativity to me during her lifetime. One of her most remarkable skills was her ingenuity. She reused, recycled and repurposed household items long before it became known as “going green.” When I asked her how she survived the Great Depression, Grandma Susie’s response was, “What depression? We were already depressed. It was just another day, as I recall.”

Full of Mother Wit and keen insightfulness, Grandma Susie didn’t believe in wasting things. She would take soap scraps or pieces, and store them in an old Mason jar under the bathroom sink. She’d add a little water, and eventually, the soap pieces would soften and partially liquefy. She’d add a little to our bath water, creating a makeshift bubble bath. It didn’t quite have the same bubbly effect or the same pretty packaging as my preferred Mr. Bubbles, but it was better than nothing.

Everything Old is New Again…

I grew up looking at that jar, and was often repulsed by its unsightliness. It just looked icky, and moreover, anyone who saw it always wondered what the heck it was. So, to avoid any explanations or looks of disgust, I slyly moved the jar to the rear corner of the cramped bathroom cabinet, and hoped that my grandmother wouldn’t notice. Thankfully, she eventually forgot about it. And over the years, my memories of that hideous jar filled with globs of multi-colored soap pieces and murky water were also forgotten.

However, the inspiration behind this was never forgotten. One day, while brainstorming new ideas with my business partner, Danielle, we talked about how the world was changing, and how green products and services were the new trend. Having become more eco-conscious myself, I thought about how repurposing things was just about being more conscientious. I glanced over, and saw the picture of my grandmother’s hands, and the thought of her old soap jar suddenly came to mind. At that moment, the idea of Rather Lather was born. Instantly, we started discussing and researching existing methods for recycling soap pieces. The internet was filled with crafty ideas and homespun methods. But nothing like what we envisioned. We were determined to develop a more attractive, fun and inspiring way to reuse these soap pieces so that everyone would find it appealing. And we did. These are the humble beginnings of Rather Lather Soap Creations. And my Grandma Susie would be so proud!

Help Us Make “Going Green the New Black!”

Now comes the real challenge. Getting the word out. To the eco-friendly and those becoming more eco-conscious. And we really appreciate you taking the time to visit our website. Please tell ten friends! We are committed to creating products that will become part of your daily routine. Granted, we feel that our name is pretty memorable, however, we’ve also created a jingle that we hope you will also find just as memorable… and catchy. Please scroll down to hear our jingle…

 and soon you’ll say, “I’d Rather Lather!”

Thanks for your support,

Laverne


PRODUCT DEMONSTRATION VIDEO



    NEVER BE WITHOUT SOAP AGAIN... WITH RATHER LATHER!

    

We’ve created the Rather Lather Soap Creations kit, a patent pending product that converts soap scraps into luxuriously, rich lathering hand soap in minutes! The process will revolutionize the health and beauty care industry because there is nothing else like it on the market! It's so simple and easy that anyone can do it!

We are embarking on the future wave of eco-friendly soap products!

      GREEN IS NOT ONLY ECO-FREIENDLY, IT'S ECONOMICALLY FRIENDLY!

Everyday, consumers use millions of bars of soap around the world. From the most expensive to the most economic. Regardless of cost, consumers use them until they are a mere sliver of its former self, in an effort to get the most out of each bar.  Afterwards, those slivers are usually regarded as useless and usually discarded.

                                        GOING GREEN IS THE NEW BLACK!

It's easy to become more eco-conscious. In these harsh economic times, and as resources become scarcer, consumers are becoming more conscientious with their spending and concerned about the environment. That’s why we’ve developed a line of economical. eco-friendly products that reduce waste and encourage recycling.

                            


HEY KIDS...THIS IS JUST FOR YOU!

We want to get kids involved in conserving their planet, for their generation, as well as future generations to come. We have a fun and exciting eco-friendly product line for kids under development that kids will love! It too, is unlike anything else on the market. Kids will be begging to wash their hands and bathe, just to use our products!

Meet our mascot…

                                               

                                               

              

                                       DC GREEN FESTIVAL EXHIBIT

                        

We’re a partnership that is eco-friendly, earth-conscious, and overall committed to making a positive impact on our world. Our goal is to have everyone using our products... and enthusiastically say, “I’d Rather Lather!"

Our mission is to introduce the Rather Lather Soap Creations kit to the masses, as well as the many other eco-friendly products coming down the pipeline. We make quality products that appeal to everyone; not just the eco-friendly!


Appropriation of Funds:

Being the first to market, we have to establish product recognition, quality and value to create brand loyalty. Therefore, any future competitors will have a difficult time challenging our products. 

Marketing & Promotion

  • To broaden our Brand product visibility via an aggressive marketing and promotion campaign. 

  • With a new product, introducing a never before seen concept, it is essential that we develop and complete a professional, informative, high quality product demonstration video. We feel that producing an informative commercial would best display our product.

  • To reach the largest possible market, we want to use the most effective media tools available (television and internet)!

  • It is critical that we attend the largest Eco Exhibition in the country this year; South by Southwest (SXSW) to reach an audience of global sustainability experts and leaders.

Inventory

    • We need to purchase additional inventory to prepare for the sales increase we hope to generate as a result of this campaign and the awareness it raises.

    • As a small company, we do not have the funds to employ a sales support team which is greatly needed, since we ultimately want to get our products in the hands of major retailers. We are currently selling our products online on our website at www.rlsoaps.com.



     Let's make this product the global success we know it can be! This is where we'll be in the future with the help of our Rock Stars!


    Our Many Thanks

    • We appreciate contributions at any and all levels. No contribution is too small. Every single contribution gets us one step closer to realizing our dream of making Rather Lather a household name.

    • Please share our link with family and friends on social media and like us on Facebook.

    • Please tweet us on twitter to help get the word out about Rather Lather!

It's easy to become more eco-conscious. In these harsh 
economic times, and as resources become scarcer, consumers are becoming more
conscientious with their spending and concerned about the environment. That’s why we’ve developed a line of
economical. eco-friendly products that reduce waste and encourage recycling.
                            
HEY KIDS...THIS IS JUST FOR YOU!We want to get kids involved in conserving their
planet, for their generation, as well as future generations to come. We have a
fun and exciting eco-friendly product line for kids under development that kids
will love! It too, is unlike anything else on the market. Kids will be begging
to wash their hands and bathe, just to use our products! 
Meet our mascot…                                                 
                                                                                                      DC GREEN FESTIVAL EXHIBIT
                         

We’re a
partnership that is eco-friendly, earth-conscious, and overall committed to
making a positive impact on our world. Our goal is to have everyone using our
products... and enthusiastically say, “I’d Rather Lather!"
Our mission
is to introduce the Rather Lather Soap Creations kit to the masses, as well as the
many other eco-friendly products coming down the pipeline. We make quality products that appeal to everyone; not just the eco-friendly!
Appropriation of Funds:Being the first to market, we have to establish product recognition, quality and value to create brand loyalty. Therefore, any future competitors will have a difficult time challenging our products.  Marketing
& Promotion

To broaden our Brand product visibility via an aggressive marketing and
promotion campaign.  
With
a new product, introducing a never before seen concept, it is essential that we
develop and complete a professional, informative, high quality product
demonstration video. We feel that producing an informative commercial would best display our product. 

To reach the largest possible market, we want to use the most effective
media tools available (television and internet)! 

It
is critical that we attend the largest Eco Exhibition in the country this year; South by
Southwest (SXSW) to reach an audience of global sustainability
experts and leaders.

Inventory

We
need to purchase additional inventory to prepare for the sales increase we hope
to generate as a result of this campaign and the awareness it raises.
As
a small company, we do not have the funds to employ a sales support team which
is greatly needed, since we ultimately want to get our products in the hands of
major retailers. We are currently selling our products online on our website at
www.rlsoaps.com.



 Let's make this product the global success we know it can be! This is where we'll be in the future with the help of our Rock Stars!


Our Many Thanks 

We
appreciate contributions at any and all levels. No contribution is too small.
Every single contribution gets us one step closer to realizing our dream of
making Rather Lather a household name.
Please
share our link with family and friends on social media and like us on Facebook.
Please
tweet us on twitter to help get the word out about Rather Lather!

story:
Ulusal Kanal penguenleri değil halk hareketini yansıtıyor. Türkiye olağanüstü bir dönemden geçiyor ve halkımız gerçekleri ancak birkaç televizyon kanalından takip ediyor. Ulusal Kanal’ı büyütmeyi boynumuzun borcu görüyoruz.

Hızla gelişen ve güçlenen kanalımızın şimdiki hedefi 3G Kameralar ile bütün Türkiye’den canlı yayın yapmak. Bunun için ise mevcutta 4 olan 3G Kamera sayısını 10’a çıkartmayı amaçlıyoruz. Hedeflenen 6 yeni 3G Kamerası’nın toplam fiyatı 200.000 TL (110.000 $)’dir.

Tüm katkılar sponsorluk olarak değerlendirilecek ve faturalandırılacaktır.

Katkılarınızı bekliyoruz.

 

Ceyhun İlsever

Ulusal Haber Ajansı Yönetim Kurulu Başkan Yardımcısı ve Genel Müdürü

 

KATKINIZI NASIL YAPACAKSINIZ?

  • Sayfanın yanında ve altında yer alan "CONTRIBUTE NOW" düğmesine tıklayın.
  • Açılan bölüme katkı tutarınızı girin (yazdığınız rakam dolar olarak kabul edilecektir). İsminizin görülmesini istemiyorsanız tutarın altındaki kutuyu işaretleyin.
  • CONTINUE düğmesine tıklayın.
  • Açılan sayfaya kredi kartı blgileriniz girin. Sırasıyla; İsim, soyisim, güvenlik kodu, son kullanma tarihi, ülke, apartman adı ve/veya numarası, cadde adı, şehir adı, posta kodu.
  • CONTRIBUTE dümesine tıklayın. İşlem bundan ibaret. Ödemeniz yapılmıştır.

 

 -------------------

 

Ulusal Kanal reflects the public actions, not the penguins. As Turkey goes through extraordinary days, our people can follow the realities only over a few television channels. We acknowledge it as our duty to advance and to develop Ulusal Kanal.

Our swiftly developing and strengthening channel now aspires to broadcast live from all over Turkey. For this reason, we aim to increase the number of our 3G cameras from 4 to 10. The total price for the desired 6 new cameras is 200.000 TL (110.000 $).

Every contribution will be considered and billed as a sponsorship.

We are awaiting your contributions.

 

Ceyhun İlsever

Ulusal New Agency Inc. Vice Chairman Of The Board and General Director

story:
Short Summary

Aesthetic Addictions is a newly found clothing line by two college students in Cincinnati, OH. The reason for Aesthetic Addictions is to spread the word of being healthy and staying fit. Sometimes it is hard for people who may be struggling with their weight to really get started or stay motivated, and that's what we want to be here to help them with. According to National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey, in 2009-2010, nearly 69% of all adults were obese or overweight. At Aesthetic Addictions, we aren't saying that everyone needs to be toned and have a six-pack, we are just trying to raise awareness of being overweight and the risks that come with it and we are trying to encourage everyone else to make the change and be more healthy. Being obese can lead to major heart and health problems, and studies show that the healthier you are, the happier you tend to be. Being happier tends to sound a little better, doesn't it? -So why not chose that lifestyle? Get addicted to aesthetics!

What We Need & What You Get

Aesthetic Addictions right now is an "idea", it is a state of mind of wanting to get better, and wanting to prove. What we want to do is spread the word via a youtube channel which will encourage fitness, a blog with tips on how to eat and be healthy, and other means of social media. That is what we can do that is free. But, not everything is free. What our goal is by the end of this campaign is to raise enough money for products such as t-shirts and wristbands, so that people will see our logo and learn the message we are trying to convey! Plus, by giving out these products as perks, we are already starting to spread the word through you who donate!

The Impact

The impact is on you, your families, your children, your neighbors, your loved ones, and your future. The goal of Aesthetic Addictions is simply to make a change in the world. We know that we can't change the way that everyone thinks and lives, but we do know that little by little, we CAN make a difference. Not only are we at Aesthetic Addictions making the difference though, we all are. TOGETHER, WE CAN ALL MAKE A DIFFERENCE. Wouldn't the world seem like a better place if everyone was healthier and happier and people were living longer and fuller lives? Anyone who needs this help will be able to make that change through the help and encouragement of Aesthetic Addictions and those who support us and help spread our message.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that the economy is tough, and not everyone has money to donate, but that doesn't mean you can't help us. We are always looking for helpful tips to share or increase our own knowledge. We also might need help in other ways such as art and design if you have any talents you think might be useful (email us at aestheticaddictions@gmail.com). Promotionally, you can still help by word of mouth and telling others our goals and hopes on changing and bettering the health of people everywhere. And if you don't want to help by donating or telling others about us, you can still help us by doing us the personal favor of bettering yourself. Just take that one extra step to work a little harder in the gym, or even just going to the gym can be a big step for some people. If that's the route you take, we don't need money or anything in return, as long as people are taking the initiative to better themselves as an individual, that is what our ultimate goal is. (But we would love to hear back about your results and how you've improved and how we've helped you!).

story:
LETS RAISE MONEY FOR DEREK & HIS FAMILY!

Hi, I'm Jennifer, Derek's sister.  I created this page to try and help raise some money for Derek to help pay his medical bills from his recent surgery and on-going expenses such as physical therapy.  It is my hope that we can at least get him $3,000 to help with these expenses.  They do not know when Derek can return to work, so any financial support we can give them will help tremendously.  (And your body heals better when you're less stressed, and we all know what the stress of money can do to us.)

Here's some background info on all Derek's been through, for those of you who don't know the details:

Derek was born with, a Coarctation of the Aorta Artery,( a narrowing of part of the aorta artery, causing high blood pressure on the top of his body, and low pressure on the bottom; the normal- should be the same pressure)  He was also born with a Bicuspid Aorta Valve, and a Prolasped Mitral Valve.  The Bicuspid valve has two leaflets, instead of the normal valve which have three. The valve had a leak, but was functioning.

At age three, Derek had heart surgery to repair the coarctation of the aorta artery, they removed the narrowed section.

At age 16, scar tissue had built up in the artery, causing blood pressure problems again. Second surgery was, an artificial aorta artery put in to by pass the coarctation of the original artery.  The two heart valves  continued to function, so they were left alone.

At age 36, doctors found a 7.5cm aortic artery aneurysm.  Surgery to by pass from his carotid artery to the left brachiad artery to his left arm.( this had to be done before, so blood flow would go to Derek's left arm during surgery to get to the aneurysm) A stent was put in Derek's carotid artery, and also, a stent in the artificial aorta artery. After that procedure, surgery to cut off all blood flow to the aneurysm, using a plug of some sort! I am sure there is a medical term for it, but we called it a plug.

At age 37, plug did not seal off all of the blood flow to the aneurysm, it continued to grow. Nothing left to do, but go in through the chest. Pre surgery tests done, showed Derek's Aortic Valve had a serious leak, and needed to be replaced!  Open heart surgery ( 10 hours) to have a valve replacement and cut off all blood flow to the original aorta artery. Also, another carotid artery by pass done.  They checked on his Mitral Valve, said it was wiggly, but functioning and not leaking at this time. They will keep and eye on it.   Derek's new aorta valve is a mechanical valve, due to his age. It should last his lifetime!

 

So as you can see, he is a trooper and no stranger to recovering.  He is currently recovering nicely, but deals with a good amount of pain on a regular basis.  The physical therapy helps and will keep on helping, but it is costly as well.  Lets all pull together and give him a cushion to soften the blow to all of those bills!

Thank you for taking the time to read this and consider making a donation to him.  Any little bit helps, and the good karma you'd be getting is priceless. :)

story: Hi All. I'm reaching out for help as i have been recently diagnosed with anal cancer. Based on my father's fight and eventual win over prostate cancer, and the fact that most gay men have HPV, my doctor decided to do the male version of a pap smear on me during my last appointment on April 8, 2013. Two days later, while on a Disney Date Day with my guy, i got the phone call from my A.R.N.P. informing me I tested positive for HPV and the cancer swab was positive as well. Since it was discovered in the very early stages, i have pretty much a 100% chance of beating this. I know there are no sure things in life other than death and taxes, but I also know a strong and positive attitude is one of the greatest keys to good health and recovery, so I am continuing to live in that mode. The reason I started this campaign is to help defray some of the expenses that will be associated with my fight. I am working again for the first time since June of 2011, but it is part time (about 15-20 hours per week), and I have no health insurance. My HIV care is paid for by a non-profit organization, but since the cancer isn't HIV related, they don't cover those costs. My doctor is about an hour south of me in Vero Beach, and I'll probably have to make some trips into Orlando for care as well, and I drive a gas hog, so your help will go towards time lost from work for care, gas to get me to my care, and any other help I may need that my already compromised immune system decides to throw my way. I promise to keep you all updated on my treatment and health so you know that your support is working. I don't know what else to say other than thanks for taking the time to read this, and extra special gratitude and thanks to you if you can help. Cheers!

story:
Overview

Many people around me are getting married and starting to have children.  As the go-to yogini for my relatives and friends, I need to prepare for their growing families!   Help me lead them in a healthy and loving pregnancy by taking a course in prenatal yoga.

The Full Story

I have considered taking the Prenatal Teacher Training Workshop for years but it never seemed like quite the right time. Now prenatal understanding is growing in relevance to my life and my role as a Yoga teacher. My goal is to get the best possible training in order to bring knowledge back to my friends, family, and, most importantly, to the young women participating in classes I may lead with the nonprofit Art of Yoga Project.

In order to be consistent with my background in traditional Hatha Yoga I want to take the prenatal course with the same organization that I have taken the 200 hour teacher training, Yoga Anatomy and Therapeutics Workshop, and Children's Yoga Workshop; the North Carolina School of Yoga under the guidance of Chandra Om and her disciples. 

All I need is your support... 

$1500 in total and here is how it breaks down:

  • Prenatal Workshop $295
  • 3 Nights at the Ashram $75
  • Approximate cost of round trip flight to the east coast $800
  • Additional local transportation costs estimated $330
Any additional funds will be split be RISE and AYP Bay Area yoga nonprofits.

What You Get (Perks!)

$10 Thank You Shout Out on my Facebook Page 
$20 Snail Mail Thank You Note 
$25 Hat Trick donate $25 to this campaign and any amount (starting at $1) to the RISE for Youth campaign to receive a personally hand knit hat.
$50 Join me in San Francisco for a special Nov 8 class with other mommies to be while the course material is fresh in my memory!
$108 Your own Hatha Yoga lesson either prenatal or traditional. Choose either a private lesson or small group lesson with your friends. Class may include Pranayama, Asana, Savasana, Mantra, Nidra, and Meditation. 
$500 Eat Like a Yogini! Vegan dinner for you and three of your friends in the Bay Area.

    The Impact

    A mother's body goes through many changes during the course of pregnancy. Even a yogini with a steady and strong Yoga history will have to alter her practice for the nine months and ease her way back into the traditional practice during the neonatal months to follow. Currently, when a mommy-to-be attends my class I am happy to have her and can instruct on some of the basic necessary changes (no major twists, and nothing that might put undue pressure on baby) However, it is ideal for her to be in the care of a trained prenatal instructor. I often recommend finding a pre-natal specific class to attend during the pregnancy. With the prenatal training I will be able to lead prenatal classes or private lessons for mothers to be. 

    Sometimes my students have limited options of where and when to attend class. This is most often true for students with the Art of Yoga Project. Frequently classes will have one or more pregnant young women. The classes that we bring to the Bay Area juvenile justice facilities are often the only time these girls are given the opportunity to practice, so what a benefit it would be for both myself and the students to be a trained prenatal resource for them. 

      Other Ways You Can Help

      I know it isn't always possible to provide monetary compensation! If you know of anyone who might like to support this endeavor please send them a link or let me know so I can contact him or her personally.

story:
THE BACKGROUND...

Bubble Soccer first hit the world as “Boblefotball”, appearing on a Norwegian TV show, in 2011.  Since that time, it's grown in both popularity and demand.  League and Tournament style Bubble Soccer games can be found throughout Europe, Australia, New Zealand and in select states throughout the US.  Currently, Bubble Soccer and Bubble Suit rental is not available in Wisconsin.  The Milwaukee Bubblers are about to change that!

With your help, The Milwuakee Bubblers will become Wisconsin's PREMIER Bubble Sport organizer.  Our focus will be organizing quarterly tournament style play (teams registration), monthly public drop-in games (individuals sign up in advance and day-of), private rental (birthdays, church/non-profit events, parties...) and corporate team building.

As co-founders we are uniquely qualified to imagine, implement, organize and pull off Wisconsin's first Bubble Sport organization.  Collectively we have over four decades of management and sales experience.  We also bring to the table extensive financial planning expertise, large scale event planning, social as well as traditional marketing skills and a shared desire to take on interesting projects and see them through to fruition.


TO BE THE BESTEST WE CAN BE:

We are currently raising funds to fully kick-off both tournament-style Bubble Soccer in Wisconsin and provide start-up costs for community and private rentals.  To adequately provide for these activities for the first year, we will need to purchase:

  • 14 adult size balls for Tournament and Drop-In Games
  • 10 children sized balls for community rental 
  • Supplies to maintain and clean everything 
  • Equipment for tournament and rental play (cones, goals, knee pads...)
  • Hall/Field rental fees for the first 6 months
  • Administration costs for the first 6 months (web hosting, software, insurance, postage...)

WHAT IS BUBBLE BALL/BUBBLE SOCCER?


Basically, Bubble Soccer (one of the many sports that can be tailored to these specially designed suits) is played the same as basic soccer...except FUNNER!  For those of you wondering what Bubble Soccer is, here's how it works

All players are protected by Bubble Suits encased from head to mid thigh: 

Two teams (usually 5 players each team) play a field 


                                    The players have THREE objectives: 


1) Stay upright(ish) 


2) Score!



3) Laugh as hard as you can and embrace unbridled joy like a child! 

    Referees (not in bubble suits) are present to keep score, encourage safe play and make sure players of all ages are making full use of the balls. 


    COMMUNITY + EDUCATIONAL PARTNERSHIPS

    We've already got the balls rolling by teaming up with ... 

    • The Lowlands Restaurant Group (Cafe Hollander, Cafe Centraal, Cafe Benelux, Trocadero and Bavaria) 
    • WMSE 91.7fm "Community Powered Radio" 
    • Milwaukee School of Engineering (MSOE) Kern Athletic Center 

    We are honored to have earned the trust of these local businesses. These community partnerships will provide stability and strength to our programming.  

    The Lowlands Group allows us regular and affordable post gaming social space throughout the Greater Milwaukee area and into Madison, WI and Mequon, WI by 2015. They are also generously donating space, food and beverages to our Gala Event on October 29th at Café Benelux (see rewards to the right to purchase your tickets now...quantities limited)

    Having WMSE 91.7fm as a partner is so exciting!  Co-branding on events and having access to marketing experts (radio, print and social media) will grow our visibility and brand dramatically.  We're thrilled to have the Milwaukee School of Engineering (MSOE) as one of our Founding Partners! 

    The MSOE Kern Athletic Center, a state of the art athletic complex nestled in the MSOE campus, is going to be "home base" for quarterly tournaments, winter drop-in games and will provide a unique opportunity connect with students.  The Kern Center is also generously providing the space we need to host our Inaugural Tournament on October 29th (tickets available n the rewards section to the right).   We are also getting ready to partner with MSOE professors to provide exciting "real-world" classroom projects and internship opportunities as well.


    Risks & Challenges

    Fortunately there are few barriers The Milwaukee Bubblers anticipate having to hurdle. That having been said, we'd like to be as transparent as possible. So, here are the possible challenges we want everyone to be aware of.

    First: Our Balls. 
    We like to think that we've got the biggest and best ball (suits) in the country, however since they are currently manufactured overseas there is always the chance that delivery could be stalled or arrive in poor condition.  We anticipated for this and have already ordered a set of adult ball suits, so when game time comes,  we'll be prepared with extras (just in case). We are also working with MSOE faculty to create special projects for the students to work on our suits. We're looking forward to seeing what the creative young minds at MSOE can design!

    Second Potential Challenge: Too Many People Want to Play With Our Balls. 
     It's not very often that this is a concern, but when your balls are as expensive and specialized as ours, you need to be careful with them. We are currently planning for two primary types of bubble play: Tournament and private rental. Since our ball suits have an actual life/usage span, we are aware that if we become too popular, our balls will wear out.  To address with problem, we have rolled the cost of ball replacement and staffing into the overall cost of tournament play and rental costs. We want to stay affordable and competitive, but we also need to make sure we have the capital necessary to ensure consistent and healthy play. By partnering with MSOE, we're also hoping to develop stronger, more affordable bubble suits to make the game even more affordable and fun!

    Third Possible Hiccup: Not Enough People Want to Play With Our Balls. 
     Sometimes, even if people say they want to get involved, they will forget to sign up, have conflicts or simply won't have the means to secure a private rental. To encourage local and regional Bubble Play, we have partnered with WMSE 91.7fm. They will be working with us on marketing and promotion. We will provide introductory discounts as we roll out our brand and support student and veteran discounts to help with those on a tighter budget.  Physical activity and social interaction are powerful tools to staying healthy, we want to do what we can to keep Milwaukee Bubblers accessible to the general population. We're also integrating lower cost "drop-in" games throughout Southern Wisconsin to provide a time and cost effective option.


    WHAT CAN YOU DO?

    EVERY LITTLE BIT HELPS!

    While money goes a long way to pay the bills, we also need people to spread the word about what we're doing and are always in need of volunteers to help us with charity and outreach events.  If you are available to help or would like to get more involved, email us right away!
    • Like us on Facebook: www.Facebook.com/MilwaukeeBubblers
    • Friend us on Instagram: @MilwaukeeBubblers
    • Follow us on Twitter: @MKEbubblers
    • MOST IMPORTANT: Use the Indiegogo share tools!

    And that's all there is to it.  Roll on!

story:
Short Summary

Rare human and mom Ali Zimmer is attempting to find a peaceful way in the world while embracing her passion for mountain biking. Aside from being a mom to a beautiful 11 year old daughter, Ali maintains a career in Physical Therapy, working with the community as well as athletes.

This campaign is the exciting result of an unexpected email. Just days ago Ali recieved a message informing her the she was selected as a member of the USA World Championship Mountain Bike Team headed to Hafjell, Norway! 

"This is a once in a lifetime opportunity to travel, ride a world championship course, and continue to network on working as a physical therapist with World Cup MTB athletes in the future!" Says Ali.

What She Needs & What You Get

The flight, and baggage fees to Hajfell with cost $1,150. The USA team support is $2,500 and will cover everything while there (ground transport, mechanics, lodging, food, medical, insurance, PT, logistics).

What Ali and her sponsors can offer (see Perks) to those who help her achieve this endeavor is skilled service as a PT and tokens of appreciation from sponsors. If the goal is not reached in the projected time frame (before Ali leaves for Norway on August 30th,) then the funds raised will still be collected to help Ali, however, Indiegogo will claim 9% of the total.

Risks & Challenges

"This summer has marked the time for me to leave my position of 12 years to pursue providing the community as well as athletes with high quality affordable care. My new physical therapy practice, Synergy in Motion, will open its doors in Bristol, Vermont in mid September as well as offering some house calls in the Addison County, VT community."

Starting her own practice is exciting and daunting, and although she is in a position to thrive, funds are exhausted to assist in attending the World Championships. Help us help Ali today! 

Party Time! The Alchemist Brewery will be throwing a send-off party on Thursday August 28th in Stowe, VT, complete with bevies, music, food, bike riding, swag and more. Ride with Ali from 3-5pm, then party from 5-7 at the Skiershop in Stowe. Tickets and details here >>

Unable to Help with Funding?

Networking can do wonders. No one should feel obligated to help monetarily. Sharing, and being psyched can be an equally powerful gift!

story:
Short Summary

Cycling is growing in Kenya but there are still no proper bike shops or tools available. Bike Mike is a bike mechanic (known locally as a fundi) in Nairobi who is passionate about offering an excellent repair service to his customers and seeing more cyclists on the road.

This campaign aims to help him achieve this by raising money to supply him and his shop with a selection of professional bike tools.

We Need...

...£1075 to buy a Park Tool Professional Tool Kit (PK65). The kit retails at around £950 and £50 will go towards shipping it across to Nairobi. £75 is needed to cover Indiegogo's fees(!).

The tool kit contains the following (and this is where you can also select your tool to personally name - see the perks on the side...):

  • Hex Wrench Set x2
  • Bottom Bracket/ Cassette Lockring Tool
  • Cartridge Bottom Bracket Tool
  • Bottle Opener
  • Hand Brake Tool
  • Open End Wrench x2
  • Chain Checker Chain Wear Indicator
  • Crank Puller x2
  • Crank Wrench
  • Chain Lube
  • Cable and Housing Cutter
  • Chainring Nut Wrench
  • Crown Race Setting System
  • Chain Tool
  • Derailleur Alignment Gauge
  • Cassette Lockring Tool
  • Pre-Glued Patch Kit
  • Gear Clean Brush
  • Bottom Bracket Pin Spanner
  • Double-Sided Bottom Bracket Lockring Tool
  • Laser Cut Headset Wrench
  • Bearing Cup Press
  • Hammer
  • Hex Tool
  • Needle Nose Pliers
  • Offset Brake Wrench
  • Adjustable Wrench
  • P-Handled Hex Wrench Set
  • PolyLube 1000 Grease
  • Pedal Wrench
  • Headset Cup Remover
  • Spoke, Bearing, and Cotter Gauge
  • Shop Cone Wrenches
  • Screwdriver #0 Phillips
  • Screwdriver Flat Blade 3mm
  • Screwdriver #2 Phillips
  • Screwdriver Flat Blade 6mm
  • Saw Guide
  • Side Cutter Pliers
  • Chain Whip/Sprocket Remover
  • Spoke Wrench x3
  • Tap for Derailleur Hanger
  • Tire Boot
  • Tire Levers
  • Threadless Nut Setter
  • Star-Shaped wrench set

story:
Building the Future with Healthy Habits 

As a certified strength coach at a community college and also a personal trainer, I think that coaches and personal trainers everywhere work very hard to help people achieve goals but come up short because of time and resources. 

I believe that personal trainers and coaches can keep clients and players on track and  accomplish more goals with the help of an online exercise library.

The library will provide both coaches and personal trainers with numerous exercise illustrations that easily download and send to clients or players on a daily basis or post online and reach hundreds of more potential clients or players. 

I believe it will work because it's what I do already. I send out daily routines to clients via text and email and also post routine online to hundreds of followers on Facebook. 

I reach more people each and every day because I use this exercise library! On top of that, my clients get more results and they also know that I care about them.

The Exercise Library 

These exercise illustrations  are worth a thousand words of instructions. Just see for yourself- visit the Facebook page to see how detailed these illustrations are! Here's the link: www.facebook.com/onlineexerciselibrary 

  • Plan to host thousands of detailed illustrations of exercises with instructions.
  • Exercises will be categorized according to intention, technique and purpose.
  • All illustrations are easily downloaded to phones, tablets and computers or can be printed out and given to clients in the gym.


Making a Difference for More People

The purpose of this project is to give coaches and personal trainers the best opportunity to positively affect as many people as possible! The Exercise Library can keep clients accountable and lead to more results in their training programs. It is also a tool to introduce your training style and method to potential clients.

The constant contact will say that "I care about your health. I care about your goals. I care about your life."


What Your Support will Build

Our goal of this project is to provide consistent and positive communication around exercise and wellbeing. The funds we raise will build an exercise library that will provide printed and digital materials for coaches and trainers to share with players and clients.

  • An easy-to-use exercise library with hundreds of illustrations that are easily downloadable to mobile devices, tablets and computers.
  • Material to build and post routines online to reach more people and introduce yourself to potential clients.

We will use the funds to:

  • Create hundreds of detailed illustrations of exercises that you want: recommend specific exercises that you would use with clients!
  • Pay for an editor to create detailed written instructions for each illustration.

The Impact

People will know that people care! Players and clients will know that their efforts are being guided by some one who cares about them as individuals, which will encourage them to keep to their training programs and achieve their goals!

What else to do? Spread the word!

  • Spread the word! Tell your colleagues and friends! Tell your clients & players!
  • Share our campaign via Facebook, Twitter, Email and more!

What are your thoughts?

Tell me what you think! Comment below or email me, Michael Rosengart, the organizer, at: michaelrosengart@gmail.com

Thank you!

story:
12/13/2013

The bike was recovered!

Dear donors,
a few days ago, Derek's bike was recovered by school authorities.
I don't know the circumstances behind the return of the bike but I do know that there was some damage to it.

How to get a refund:

A few angel donors have committed to paying for the repairs on the bike so I will be fully refunding each donor individually. However, I can't give a refund to anybody until after the campaign is over.

NO MORE DONATIONS PLEASE!

Thank you all for your show of support,
-Tony

------ Below is the original fundraiser -----

Stolen Bike

On December 4th, Cogswell student Derek Williams discovered that his custom "Giant Defy 5" bike had been stolen from campus even though he had locked it up on the bike rack at school.

The Bike

Here's a link to the bike we hope to buy:

http://offrampbikes.com/product/14giant-defy-5-193995-1.htm?variations=7542,7546

$700 Fundraiser

This is a fundraiser to replace the original "base" bike, and anything raised above the base price will go to replacing the custom parts that Derek had saved up for. In total, Derek spent over $1,200


About Derek

For those of you who don't know Derek, he is one of the most dedicated students I have ever met. He is working toward a career as a technical artist in the realm of 3D animation, games, film and VFX.

http://www.derekwilliams3d.com

Thank you!

-Tony Dias

story:
What is FIOSys?

My name is Jon Fernandez. I am a 28 year software developer, and my goal is to make software development, in general, easier, faster, and less costly. What would it mean for us as consumers if software was simpler to develop? If important software took less time to create, wouldn't you expect new applications to arrive sooner, and do more than a product that was rushed to market? Companies might balk at the idea of developing a four year project that they might consider if it only took two years. If software takes less time to create, maybe we will all see new and better applications that do more than they would have otherwise.

I've spent over five years developing this system, called FIOSys (File Input Output System), a software developer's tool. It is finished now and ready to develop an advanced prototype for, so that we can demonstrate for other developers and investors its market readiness. We are asking for your help to develop this prototype so that we can demonstrate the benefits of incorporating FIOSys as the foundation for all new software development.

What is a prototype? A prototype is like a real life software application we create in-house that uses FIOSys to handle its work. The FIOSys prototype will act like an airline reservation system, with customers trying to reserve seating for airplanes that must be filled before they can take off. FIOSys manages the entire system, handling conflicts when multiple customers want the same seat, when the system goes down, and any other need that a robust reservation system requires. With this prototype, we can demonstrate to other developers how using FIOSys can speed up and enhance their own development efforts with the applications they are trying to create.

You might be tempted to think that FIOSys has nothing to do with you? Did you use a computer today, a smart phone, mp3 player, or a tablet? Did you look up the news online, check email, or send a text? Consider that almost everything you see is "smart" now - from going through the checkout register at a store, while visiting your doctor, to just about everything you do at work. Cars are even starting to drive themselves. Technology changes so fast, that it's hard to imagine what tomorrow will look like. Innovative software is what makes it all happen.

What is the potential impact of FIOSys?

The promise of FIOSys is that new software development could forever change. FIOSys seeks to become a standard, so that all significant new software development starts with FIOSys as the foundation. The lure for doing this is twofold.

  1. Eliminate years of future software development time. What would it mean for a tech company to get their products out to market sooner, and those products were better and more reliable? It means less risk for the company, and more time to add the features into their products that would make them outstanding.
  2. Encourage standardization. If more and more applications use FIOSys, they are in a position to "talk" to each other more easily. This could mean that software we are proficient with can be used in more and more ways. It could mean we as consumers don't have to continuously learn new software that does something we already know how to do. It could mean the easing of frustrating incompatibility issues between old and new software, and between different types of software. FIOSys can improve the ability, for all of us, to share applications and data more fluidly.

Video Presentation

We have created seven videos to explain clearly what we're trying to accomplish and the potential for this technology.

  1. Introduction (5 minutes): This is an explanation of FIOSys - what it is and what it seeks to accomplish.
  1. Benefits (3 minutes): What are the primary benefits that FIOSys provides?
  1. Standardization (4 minutes): One of the primary goals for FIOSys is to encourage standardization in the software industry. Why is standardization so important, and is it even possible?
  1. Software development takes time (4 minutes): You may not realize how long it takes to create new and important software. We can change this.
  1. Why me? Why files? (4 minutes): Enhanced file handling has been my world for 28 years. Why am I suited for this effort, and why is this so important to me?
  1. The Team (2 minutes): The FIOSys team has over five decades of experience developing retail software, and building and supporting small business.
  1. Technical Overview (18 minutes): If you prefer a technical approach, this may be the one and only video you need to watch to fully understand what FIOSys does and its potential (this video was created in low definition, so is better watched at its current size on this page).

What we need funding for

Primarily we need funding to create the FIOSys prototype. This prototype will demonstrate the readiness of FIOSys for the market and illustrate what FIOSys can do. An additional benefit of this prototype is as a high speed testing platform that stresses the underlying system in a way that ensures and promotes its robustness in a high pressure environment. To accomplish this, we need funding for:

  1. High end computer equipment to enhance prototype development and create high definition video presentations.
  2. Development Time so that the team can dedicate all its resources to this effort.
  3. A patent - primarily to protect us from someone else trying to say that "they got here first" and obstruct FIOSys's expansion into the market.
  4. FIOSys Promotion. A vigorous Crowd Funding campaign will put us in contact with many developers. An adequate budget to connect with the right people at the right time could be crucial.

What else could we use funding for?

Beyond creation of a prototype, equipment, and a patent - we could use additional donations for many purposes. With more funds, we can hire programmer(s) to help bring FIOSys to market. There are three additional tasks that need to be developed for this.

  1. A developer's application that shows the developer what's going on behind the curtain, so that they can see what they are doing and that they are using FIOsys correctly.
  2. An Administrator application. For large business (enterprise) users, an admin app is necessary to setup user and file access rights, so that proper personnel have the desired rights to the company's data. This application can also be used to monitor what files are in use and by whom, and what activities are being performed.
  3. A support website - complete with tutorials, walkthroughs, sample applications, guides, and a forum so that developers can find the information they need to quickly and efficiently utilize FIOSys.

The next step if we obtain even more funding, would be to grow the FIOSys company. It will take a concerted effort to reach out to other companies small and large, to encourage them to base their development efforts on FIOSys. Especially larger arenas like government, medical, science, research, and business, will all take a significant amount of outreach to seriously consider the benefits of what FIOSys can do for them.

Funding Rewards

Most likely the FIOSys model will be similar to technologies like Adobe Flash and PDF - which are given away free to the consumer (but not the developers). Beyond our undying gratitude for your helping us change the world, what can we give you that you won't receive for free anyway? Fortunately, there are certain awards we can provide you in token of our appreciation (you can remain anonymous if you wish).

  1. Your honored name on our website (the FIOSys Hall of Champions).
  2. Your picture on our website. We will put your picture in our changing picture motif at the top of the Hall of Champions.
  3. A limited edition coffee cup (for CrowdFunding donators only) acknowledging that you had the foresight and advanced vision to support the FIOSys project when it was just a baby.

  4. A limited edition t-shirt (for CrowdFunding donators only) acknowledging that you had the foresight and advanced vision to support the FIOSys project when it was just a baby.
  5. A personalized copy of Water: the developer's second application written for Windows while he was just learning how to do such things (1997 - could be a collector's item). This application involves the blending of drips of colored water into a bucket and watching them interact. It allows you to experiment freely with the system, changing colors, and utilizing certain advanced techniques (multithreading) during its operation.

  6. A personalized copy of the finished FIOSys prototype - Your Airline. You choose the name of your airline, what exotic area of the world you want to service, and various other options that may interest you. Your Airline: "The best seats and the best service on the market!"

Other ways you can Help

If you can contribute, great! But you can also help us by getting the word out. Anyone you know that would be interested in helping us "change the world" - let them know. We'd dearly love for you to share the news about FIOSys!

Indiegogo provides many tools to help you get the word out (located at the top of this page - below the introduction video). Please use those, if you wish, so that we can bring FIOSys to market and make it a success!

Thank you so much in advance!
The FIOSys team

www.fiosys.net

story:
Version en español   (Spanish version)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5g6pxe9HYOE

Our names are Carolina and Marc Bouchard our background is we are ordinary people who lived the pain and suffering from the UN none of what was coming and now that we have lived it we understand the importance of maintaining circulation,alignment,and stretching of the tend ants,movement in your hips so atrophy does not set in. People with existing problems such as cerebral palsy, ms, stroke,the elders,and much more can also realign threw repetition and taking there mind off of the task at hand and using an inner thigh brace. We have a sophisticated MOBILIZER 1 unit as well as other inexpensive in house prototypes. Abel ling people to help themselves in the comfort of there home.

If we do not reach our goal after Carolinas nonprofit in Mexico and the molds for the mini mobilizer and super mini mobilizer we will do everything possible to insure the Canadian and American VA soldiers get a CSA approved MOBILIZER1

These vouchers suitable for donations to your local community/rehabilitation center honor others if you wish to be honored Buddhism!


What the Money is for~

1. Registration of a non profit association in Mexico City to enable Carolina to make this simple and inexpensive technology available to the most deprived corners of Mexico.  With the help of generous and open minded people, Get Mobile Enterprises will reach its goals to help others in all parts of the world.  

$10,000

2. Design and making of Production Molds for the Super Mini Mobilizer and the Mini Mobilizer, which will be made  made primarily of durable plastic and aluminum the production of accessories and educational materials that will accompany it. 

$10.000 

3. Company international Liability insurance.

$10,000 annually

4.  UL approval is the equivalent of CSA approval for the USA.  We require UL approval for the Mobilizer 1 and we require CSA and UL approval for the Super Mini Mobilizer and the Mini Mobilizer.

$10,000

5.  Web Master to design and maintain the Get Mobile site to enable us to provide support for those individuals and their families who are already using our products and easy access for those who want to attain more information or to purchase any of our products.

$5,000

6. Funding for full time administration, legal documentation and distribution for equipment available through Get Mobile Enterprises.

$25,000

7. Funds to help launch the 1st production run of the Mini Mobilizer which will óaccommodate children from approximately 12 - 24 months of age.  This will give these young children an opportunity to encourage and maintain proper body alignment. build muscle mass and support a healthier immune system because of the circulation this system enhances in the body.  The use of the Super Mini Mobilizer  allows caregivers to focus on the the problem the child has been diagnosed with, rather than the unknown complications that come with lack of movement and circulation.  Some examples of such complications are future hip and tendon operations, atrophied muscles, contracting of the muscles and additional medical complications with the immune system and general poor health.

$10,000

8.  Attain ISO 13485 level two custom system certification program certificate.  This program certificate verifies that the Company has passed all the necessary requirements to allow it to produce the Mobilizer 1, as well as future products that can be sold internationally as motorized pieces of medical equipment.  This would allow the Mobilizer 1 to be used in hospital settings.  At this time the Mobilizer 1 is CSA approved and Get Mobile Enterprises holds a patent in both Canada and the USA.

$70,000 

9. Fulfill our promise to donate a Mobilizer 1 to one Canadian and one American Veterans Rehabilitation Hospital to help support  those who have so bravely protected their Countries. (Each Mobilizer 1 has the value of $27,000)

Cost of Production

This is an on the road Get Mobile fundraiser!!

Thank you for all of your support!  Please tell your friends and forward our address and bar code to connect with all our information

The lady in this video is 91 years old

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eMZRjnFDO28

People can help by emailing, tweeting or face booking our link to everyone they know. If you follow any celebrities or people of influence please ask them to join our campaign. You can also download flyers from our website that can be printed and put up in laundry mats, libraries, community centers, supermarkets, cafes, bistros etc. in your area. You can also print the information sheet and distribute it manually. Call or email your newstation, newspaper and favorite radio station to help get our story out there. If you know someone who is involved with professional sports players, coaches, announcers or staff of a stadium, encourage them to give a shout out or pass it on to the big screen and urge others to do the same.

Spanish version 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5g6pxe9HYOE

story:
Holistic Fitness & Health

Physique Pro Gym will practice a Holistic approach to Fitness & Health and will help build the entire person from Mind, Body, Emotional & Soul, to achieve this Physique Pro Gym is 100% committed to all of its future gym members.  Physique Pro Gym is bringing back the “Old School Gym” it will be family owned and operated.  Physique Pro Gym will be a gym for all walks of life Efrem B. Martin BA, Owner/Fitness Trainer does not believe in separating Men & Women when it comes to Fitness & Health because we have a lot to learn from each other.  Physique Pro Gym members must feel connected, they must feel invested in and they will in turn become vested, they must feel and believe in the need for a Life Style Change. 

Physique Pro Gym will become the voice of the Fitness & Health Communities within Green Valley Ranch, Montbello in Denver and Reunion in Commerce City.  Physique Pro Gym will build long term sustainable relationships within these communities, Physique Pro Gym will network and outreach and build partnerships within these communities as well as with the Medical Campuses in Aurora, Children’s Hospital, CU Medical Centers and the likes, this is how the Holistic approach to Fitness & Health will come together and become attainable.

The following video's are Efrem's actual clients.


What We Need & What You Get

Physique Pro Gym is seeking $500,000 dollars in order to build the inside infrastructure and purchase of New Cardio Equipment and New/Refurbished Free Weight Equipment.  100% of your contributions is invested into Physique Pro Gym.

The Perks come from Physique Pro Gym Owner/Fitness Trainer Efrem B. Martin.  www.2legit2quitfitness.com.  All contributors depending on the level of contribution will receive a Perk from one to several of the following: Physique Pro Gym T-Shirts, Hoodies, Gym Memberships, Meal Management Guide, Fitness Workout Plan, Skype Online Training & Coaching Sessions and Nutritional Advice.

Physique Pro Gym Owner Efrem B. Martin BA/Fitness Trainer & Masters 100% Natural Bodybuilder, 24yrs Weight Training Experience.


Health Risks &The Impact of Obesity

With the obesity epidemic that is currently going on in the United States, fitness and weight loss has been growing in popularity, if not becoming an obsession, for Americans. The rate of obesity grew steadily from 1987 to 2007 and all states except Colorado consider at least one fifth of their population obese. Over 72 million Americans, or one third of the population of the United States, are considered clinically obese. One billion people around the world were considered over ideal weight.

One trend in the industry is the change in demographics of those who use fitness centers membership used to be concentrated fairly highly on the 18-34 range, but the popularity has spread out over all age groups, and increased particularly amongst Americans over 50 and children and teenagers. Appealing to America's aging demographic will be essential for gym franchises. One way to appeal to this audience is to add amenities such as health maintenance and monitoring like checks for blood sugar, blood pressure and bone density.

 

Challenges to a Life Style Change

The Mind is the most powerful weapon all human beings have, and if the Mind is sick then the Body is sick.  Physique Pro Gym will help create sustainable long term health awareness and wellness from every person who becomes a member of Physique Pro Gym.  A Life Style Change is a commitment to self.

Physique Pro Gym is not just a gym it will help change your life forever!!!  Physique Pro Gym is going to change the landscape of how all gyms need to become vested partners within the communities they serve and not just take and make money off of those communities in which they serve we must always give back to the communities in which we serve this is how everyone becomes better. 

Physique Pro Gym is not a gym just about making money off of its members and not giving back, we will have a vested partnership with all of our members within the communities of Green Valley Ranch, Montbello and Reunion.

Physique Pro Gym will help all of its members understand the since of urgency that must take place in order to maintain and sustain a long term Life Style Change which can only happen from the “Mental State of Mind”.  The body will do whatever the Mind tells it to do!!!!! 


Other Ways You Can Help

I would like to take this time to thank everyone who can and cannot contribute.  Please help me promote and share my Dream and Vision with your family, friends, colleagues and co-workers.  Please link my campaign to your Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and all other social media outlets, click the share links on all your social media.

I am humbled and forever blessed to be able to help all people work toward a healthy life long, sustainable Life Style Change through Fitness & Health.  Thank you and much love to you all, Efrem.
