What We Need & What You Get Physique Pro Gym is seeking $500,000 dollars in order to build the inside infrastructure and purchase of New Cardio Equipment and New/Refurbished Free Weight Equipment.  100% of your contributions is invested into Physique Pro Gym.
The Perks come from Physique Pro Gym Owner/Fitness Trainer Efrem B. Martin.  www.2legit2quitfitness.com.  All contributors depending on the level of contribution will receive a Perk from one to several of the following: Physique Pro Gym T-Shirts, Hoodies, Gym Memberships, Meal Management Guide, Fitness Workout Plan, Skype Online Training & Coaching Sessions and Nutritional Advice.


  

Physique Pro Gym Owner Efrem B. Martin BA/Fitness
Trainer & Masters 100% Natural Bodybuilder, 24yrs Weight Training
Experience.

Health Risks &The Impact of Obesity 

With the obesity epidemic that is currently going on in the
United States, fitness and weight loss has been growing in popularity, if not
becoming an obsession, for Americans. The rate of obesity grew steadily from
1987 to 2007 and all states except Colorado consider at least one fifth of
their population obese. Over 72 million Americans, or one third of the
population of the United States, are considered clinically obese. One
billion people around the world were considered over ideal weight.


One trend in the industry is the change in demographics of
those who use fitness centers membership used to be concentrated fairly
highly on the 18-34 range, but the popularity has spread out over all age
groups, and increased particularly amongst Americans over 50 and children and
teenagers. Appealing to America's aging demographic will be essential for gym
franchises. One way to appeal to this audience is to add amenities such as
health maintenance and monitoring like checks for blood sugar, blood pressure
and bone density.

    Challenges to a Life Style Change 
The Mind is the most powerful weapon all human beings
have, and if the Mind is sick then the Body is sick.  Physique Pro Gym will help create sustainable
long term health awareness and wellness from every person who becomes a member of
Physique Pro Gym.  A Life Style Change is a commitment to self.
Physique Pro Gym is not just a gym it will help change
your life forever!!!  Physique Pro Gym is
going to change the landscape of how all gyms need to become vested partners
within the communities they serve and not just take and make money off of those
communities in which they serve we must always give back to the communities in
which we serve this is how everyone becomes better.  Physique Pro Gym is not a gym just about
making money off of its members and not giving back, we will have a vested
partnership with all of our members within the communities of Green Valley
Ranch, Montbello and Reunion.
Physique Pro Gym will help all of its members
understand the since of urgency that must take place in order to maintain and
sustain a long term Life Style Change which can only happen from the “Mental
State of Mind”.  The body will do
whatever the Mind tells it to do!!!!!      Other Ways You Can Help
I would like to take this
time to thank everyone who can and cannot contribute.  Please help me promote and share my Dream and
Vision with your family, friends, colleagues and co-workers.  Please link my campaign to your Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and all other social media outlets, click the share links on all your social media. 




I am humbled and forever blessed to be able
to help all people work toward a healthy life long, sustainable Life Style
Change through Fitness & Health.  Thank you and much love to you all, Efrem.

story:
Avengers: the Origin Story

The Avengers are a small but mighty merc team, representing seven regular season teams across Ontario and Quebec. Much like our Marvel counterparts, we're a ragtag bunch of misfits brought together by a common goal: Eastern Canadian representation at the Quidditch Canada National Championship.

Who the Hell are You??

The Avengers Quidditch Roster includes:
Daniel Clarke 7 Beater
Devin Dutt 42 Chaser/Seeker
Kera Lanouette 17 Chaser
Mary Macgowan 57 Chaser
Wesley Mackie 21 Keeper
Jennifer Magel 9 Chaser
Ronald Martinez 10 Chaser
Ryan Maxwell 12 Chaser
Erin McCrady 3 Beater
Franco Pang 66 Beater
Trevor Primett 96 Keeper
Allison Rich 20 Chaser
Raphael Roy-Laurore 13 Chaser
David Saint-Germain 41 Chaser/Seeker
Katie Sharpe 22 Beater
Ema Shiroma-Chao 26 Beater
Arianne Zamin 5 Chaser/Seeker


What We Need & What You Get

Team startup and tournament travel aren't cheap, and we're doing both at the same time! Your contributions will go toward:

  • Quidditch Canada registration for our new team
  • Transportation (flights to Vancouver and transportation in Burnaby)
  • Accommodation (hotels, or booze and chocolate for whoever lets us stay on their floors)

The Impact

Along with McGill Quidditch, we aim to represent Eastern Canada at this year's Nationals and help Quidditch Canada grow! Think of it as a glorious, trans-continental hug, but with brooms and superhero references!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share this campaign with your friends, enemies and family.
  • If you are a business interested in sponsoring the team, please contact us!

story: This campaign was an experiment in crowdfunding and provided me with kindness, generosity and great learning about myself and my needs. I am no longer accepting contributions and thank you greatly for your support.

story:
Washington Governor Jay Inslee has proposed a 95% tax on ALL vape products, and that is just the beginning...
  • Flavor Ban, with the exception of plain Menthol or Tobacco
  • Banning Internet Sales of all Vape-related products
  • Raising the age of Vaping to 21
  • Redefining Vape products as Tobacco

If action isn't taken immediately by the Washington community and pro-Vape supporters across the country, other states will implement similar laws. 

New York is already on their way to having Vaping completely banned.

The two bills in question are HB-1645 and SB-5573. Please take the time to read the Bills, so you can be as informed as possible. 

HB-1645 
Proposes to raise the purchasing age from 18 years to 21; Implementing a heavy tax on tobacco and vapor products in order to fund other health departments to develop programs to prevent and reduce tobacco use by youths.
SB-5573 
Promoting HB-1645; Prohibiting the sale of flavored e-liquid other than traditional tobacco and menthol flavors; Implementing 95% tax on vapor products, 90% to general state fund and only 10% to public health services; Out-of-state distributors will be unable to do business without a proper license approved by the state of Washington.

Here's what you can do:

Proactive WA vape shops have teamed up with national trade organizations and quite frankly, we need your support to raise funds to hire lobbyists and raise awareness through marketing campaigns.  Please Contribute!

Lobbying is the ONLY way your government will listen! Everyone with an interest in vaping needs to band together - this may be our last chance to fight the ignorance and corruption impeding on your freedom to vape.

Our 2015 goal is to collect $50,000. Everything collected will be used to combat any unfair legislation now and in the future. Money is not the only way you can help. Please call the Senator and Representatives in your district and respectively let them know that you oppose these Bills. (Link at the bottom)

Let our government know that Washington Approves Vaping! 

Every email, letter, call, and donation will help in making sure these Bills DO NOT PASS! 
  • Questions? Please Contact:

         Kyle T. |  kylet@beyondvape.com

  • Find your rep via http://app.leg.wa.gov/DistrictFinder/
  • Email, Write, or Call your representative! Below is a quick template on how to address your ideas to your local rep.
Name: (Insert your name)
District: (Insert your district)
[Body paragraph]

Dear (Insert Rep's name here),

 (Tell them your name and which district you reside in then respectfully inform them that you strongly oppose HB-1645 and SB-5573. Also, feel free to tell them why Vaping is important to you!)
Thank you for listening,

(Insert your name)

Thank You, Everyone!

All support and donations are greatly appreciated! Vape On, Washington.

story:
Hello, my name is Rose Madison, the need for education, training and support for people living with diabetes is so great. As someone who has spent the last 15 years working in healthcare and personally seen the effects of this disease first hand, I felt the need to put my time, energy and effort behind a cause. 

 This disease is preventable through small changes and education. My plan is to start one community at a time, one step at a time taking the education to where people are, not have them come to me.

A mobile training/education type of setting will get the education/training out to the people that need it the most.

How many of you know your numbers (Blood pressure, cholesterol,blood glucose or A1c). So many of us can't seem to find the time to get it done.  Well, we will come to you. A mobile unit allows us to get to you one community at a time bringing nurses, dieticians and educators.

If you have been diagnosed with diabetes, then learning as much as possible about the latest medical therapies and approaches, as well as healthy life style choices is essential to preventing or delaying complications.

story:
Horse Science and Technology by Horse People

(*also a spectacular gift for your "horsey" friends!)

As  horse owners and competitive equestrians, the health and well-being of our horses comes first and we generally want three things:

1)  A healthy, disease-free horse (& to know about any health hazards!)

2) A horse with abilities/temperament perfect for our discipline & lifestyle

3) A beautiful horse that, if bred, produces incredible healthy, beautiful and athletically superior foals.

Wouldn't it be great if there was a way to test for these genetic traits all in one affordable test and from one simple lock of hair?  There is now!

Find multiple underlying diseases and health risks, traits and discover abilities (even personality insights) now with one simple test - know your horse, inside and out:

 Etalon Diagnostics - Comprehensive Genetic Testing - 30+ traits for $150

 If you were to go out and try to buy yourself the perfect car, you would look for one that matched the specs you needed on paper and was probably pleasing to the eye as well.  However, would that be the only way you'd vet your purchase or would you want to take a good long look under the hood first?  Wouldn't it be great to know what's in good working order, how well it was built, and what issues might be coming down the pike? After all, this is likely a major decision and one you'll have to live with for quite some time. 

As an avid horse enthusiast, buyer and owner, I have plenty of horror stories about buying a horse that later turned out to have undisclosed problems (like Navicular & PSSM) or breeding for foals that didn't quite turn out as expected.  I wished many times for some kind of insight, a peek beneath the exterior of each horse so I could understand what was there, what wasn't there, and what I might be faced with later on so I could be prepared or even possibly prevent the oncoming disaster from happening in the first place.  To help you understand exactly how different genes interact, and how predictable they can be,  here's a fun tool we use to illustrate coat color - click here and see for yourself!

As biotech scientists and preclinical specialists we see a way to provide genetic screening for all equines to identify everything from health problems (such as metabolic disorders and viral susceptibility) to color, patterns, and even performance traits, like gaits and speed.  While we're aware that there are scattered genetic tests out there now, they are primarily individual tests leaving the normal horse owner puzzling over which tests to choose and at great expense. For example:

The average cost per trait test is anywhere from $25 to $85 each with some traits going as high as $350 - $1000.  If you wanted to test your horse for everything currently available in the market today, you would have to visit more than 3 labs and shell out over $2000.00.  The situation might look like this

Average cost of testing a horse for the following (assuming the lowest $25 per) is

 Black/Red + Agouti + Cream + HYPP + SCID + PSSM =  $150

Using cutting edge technology, we set out to create an "All-in-one" test where one sample is submitted for a single, comprehensive test at one economic price: multiple traits, diseases, multiple colors, patterns and abilities along with a Discovery ability all on one test - a Couture Service designed to detect and reveal as much information as possible for the discerning owner or buyer.  Once we had created, "the one test to rule them all" and by popular demand, we chose the most commonly requested traits that would work on a lighter, faster, and even more economical platform and the Minipanel was born. So now, what was

BEFORE:  Black/Red + Agouti + Cream + HYPP + SCID + PSSM =  $150

becomes

NOW:  Black/Red + Agouti + Brindle + Champagne + Cream + Dominant Whites (1-20) + Gait + HERDA + HYPP +  Lavender Foal Syndrome + Lethal White Overo + PSSM + Sabino + SCID + Silver + Speed + Splashed Whites (1-4) + West Nile Virus Susceptibility + more = $150

That means, we can offer 30 + traits and growing for the same price -see below:

We designed our couture platform (or the Complete Panel) as a true "Discovery" panel allowing us to not only provide the current known traits, but also to uncover new ones in the process.  The result is a larger comprehensive panel which detects mutations and unknown changes as well as an in depth ongoing research project buzzing away in the background of normal diagnostics but at a much reduced cost in terms of time and money.  We are offering the Complete Panel at $300 (as seen on our website and in the image below):

You enable us with your support and we'll provide genetic analysis on your horse and other horses in need - We'll also show you how helping horses ultimately helps people!


If you have ever had horses or know anyone who has horses, you know that the horse fascination is a strong one indeed. Genetics and horses share a common theme:  They are addictive.  As "Addicts" (us) we require an "Enabler" (you) to keep going forward with the obsession in order to further develop the technology and test more horses to both prevent disease and enhance performance.  The great thing about having this particular addiction (and spreading it) is that it will ultimately benefit humans and the development of human therapeutics.  

"The gene that causes Appaloosa spotting(and thus, Congenital Night Blindness) was first uncovered through horse research, which led the human geneticists to realize it was responsible for many "unknown" cases of human congenital stationary night blindness, and gave us more of an idea of what this gene's function is!"  Dr. Heather Holl, Equine Geneticist

By supporting our research you'll not only personally benefit from being one of the early adopters and elite Genetically Educated horse folks wandering the streets (and barns), but you'll also have contributed to a major movement in the guardianship and responsible ownership of horses.

For example:  People breed many many horses for the purposes of racing, but, not every foal born to racehorse parents is suited to become a racehorse.  Due to the nature of genetics and statistical chance, that baby might be a crummy racehorse but a fantastic eventing or dressage mount.  In fact, according to Jockey Club statistics, between 2009 and 2012 roughly 86,000 thoroughbred foals were registered, less than half of them ever actually made it to the races.  What happened to the rest? Some are lucky and get adopted for other careers, but in many cases, however, there are not so lucky.  Many face permanent injury, abandonment, and the slaughterhouse.  Wouldn't it be better for both the foal, the breeder, and the future owner to have had that insight as soon as possible to avoid injured or abandoned horses?

The more horses we test and the faster we test them, the faster the discovery platform works (especially with owner and trainer input) and we find new abilities and genetic disorders in weeks and months rather than years.  The equipment and techniques needed to do this are expensive, tricky, and take serious dedication to run.  It takes both funding and expertise along with a whole lot of good will and stubborness to make this happen.  We've got some of those things covered (the expertise, the stubborness and good will for sure) and it got us off to a great start, but we your need help to keep going!  Raising $100k would afford things like:

  1.  leasing equipment, buying reagents, and affording manpower to complete several of our ongoing studies
  2. a stonger outreach program so we can focus more on our rescue horses from collaborators such as the SPCA for Monterey County (where we are currently processing testing on several horses in need of homes)
  3. completing our process of creating a fantastic client-user web interface where your horses' information, profile, health reports, photos, videos, show scores and breedmatching information can be kept and monitored or shared as you wish. (see preview photos in our gallery)  *Building a website is one thing, but building a good one with client security controls is on another level altogether and we want to do this right.

What else??

  • Who wouldn't want to know more about their horse's health, abilities and an Etalon T shirt to boot?  Not just any T shirt, but one with DNA sequences from your very own horse - now that's custom!!
  • We have several studies waiting in line at our lab on horse samples we've already collected from friends, family, and local rescue groups.  Any funding we receive will go to completing those studies, providing as much diagnostic information as possible to those people/horses and finding the traits or markers we set out to discover (for example: OCD, Laminitus, or susceptibility to EHV, etc.)  
  • If you choose to fund the Rescue Horse testing (see Perks) we will send you pictures and information on the horses that you've helped fund and rehome. 

The Impact

People helping horses who ultimately help people in so many ways...

  • Science is a funny thing.  While people work really hard to create diagnostics and therapeutics for the health of people, it turns out that people are the hardest species in the world to work with, especially when it comes to medical and clinical trials:  You've got heavy expense, regulation, liability, lawyers and doctors, patient confidentiality and reliability, and just one big moral dilemma after another. Not to mention what might happen if doctors ran around tearing chunks of hair out of patients for good DNA samples!  Horses and other mammals like dogs, on the other hand, make excellent subjects.  They couldn't care less about their coat color or what you think of it, they don't have HMO issues, miss appointments, or lie about what they had for lunch.  They are happy in their barn with their friends, eating and working out on the same schedule and performing their best each day.  They do what they can with what they were given and they don't bat an eye at losing a lock of mane or tail.  In short, they make perfect clinical subjects.  What's more?  They are mammals just like us and if we can discover a genetic disorder or predisposition in a horse or dog, it's highly likely that we'll find it in people - we may even know where to look at that point and, possibly, how to treat it.  
  • Case and point: In addition to the aforementioned Congenital Night Blindness, the list of genetic disorders suffered by both horses and humans consists of many, including Severe Combined Immunodeficiency, Glycogen Branching Enzyme Deficiency, various metabolic disorders and so on.
  • Therefore:  Feel good about funding painless research on your horse for the good of horses and know that, ultimately it's also good for people:  you.  This is a better, faster way to discover genetics traits, abilities and disease without victims, pain or HMOs!
  • The Etalon team is composed of not only carefully chosen experts in their fields, but of those obsessed with science and animals.  Each of us is driven to research and discover.  We actually do this stuff for fun - really.  Nerdiness aside, however, each of us, from advisors and scientists to business folks and hard-core riders has a demonstrated track record of success and accomplishment.  
  • One last little thing to mention:  We are also working on dogs!  We have this theory that if we could help determine talents and temperament, there would be no end to the help we could provide in the training and placement of service dogs, homeless dogs, and dogs in distress.  Think about it...

Risks & Challenges

The idea that genetic tools can be so very powerful and reveal so much about us is often hard to grasp and even harder to explain.  Getting our message out there that we can, in fact, do this right now is really important.  Understanding what we're on the brink of finding can be simply mindblowing.  Below are some of the conditions and traits we are currently working to find

  • Resistance and susceptibility to multiple viruses including EVA, EHV, etc.
  • Serious and terminal career ending conditions like Laminitis, Navicular, OCD, and Tendonopathy 
  • Fantastic and fun traits like curiosity, vigilance, confidence, and "bombproofness" over spookiness
  • Highly competitive traits such as speed, ability, dressage extension, dressage collection, jumping and more
  • Using our proven platform and, you, our horsey owners, riders, trainers and fans, we can start to parse out who is who in the horsey world and turn those traits hidden deep within pedigrees into real genetic proofs.  
  • We actually want to hear all about your horse and the silly things he does or won't do, so sign up and tell us all about your horse.  Send us pictures, show us the show scores, we love it and we'll try to provide you with even more in return!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you're just not in the position to fund us, there are lots of ways you can help

  • Pass it on!  Make noise and send this on to your friends and family - one of them is bound to have a horse (or three) and they'll love you for it.
  • Think about the horses and dogs you know who could use a little help, if there's one (or a particular group) tell us their story and we'll see if we can help!
Wherever man has left his footprint in the long ascent from barbarism to civilization we will find the hoofprint of the horse beside it.  ~John Moore

That means, we can offer 30 + traits and growing for the same price -see below:


We designed our couture platform (or the Complete Panel) as a true "Discovery" panel allowing us to not only provide the current known traits, but also to uncover new ones in the process.  The result is a larger comprehensive panel which detects mutations and unknown changes as well as an in depth ongoing research project buzzing away in the background of normal diagnostics but at a much reduced cost in terms of time and money.  We are offering the Complete Panel at $300 (as seen on our website and in the image below):


   You enable us with your support and we'll provide genetic analysis on your horse and other horses in need - We'll also show you how helping horses ultimately helps people! 
If you have ever had horses or know anyone who has horses, you know that the horse fascination is a strong one indeed. Genetics and horses share a common theme:  They are addictive.  As "Addicts" (us) we require an "Enabler" (you) to keep going forward with the obsession in order to further develop the technology and test more horses to both prevent disease and enhance performance.  The great thing about having this particular addiction (and spreading it) is that it will ultimately benefit humans and the development of human therapeutics.  
"The gene that causes Appaloosa spotting(and thus, Congenital Night Blindness) was first uncovered through horse research, which led the human geneticists to realize it was responsible for many "unknown" cases of human congenital stationary night blindness, and gave us more of an idea of what this gene's function is!"  Dr. Heather Holl, Equine Geneticist
By supporting our research you'll not only personally benefit from being one of the early adopters and elite Genetically Educated horse folks wandering the streets (and barns), but you'll also have contributed to a major movement in the guardianship and responsible ownership of horses.
For example:  People breed many many horses for the purposes of racing, but, not every foal born to racehorse parents is suited to become a racehorse.  Due to the nature of genetics and statistical chance, that baby might be a crummy racehorse but a fantastic eventing or dressage mount.  In fact, according to Jockey Club statistics, between 2009 and 2012 roughly 86,000 thoroughbred foals were registered, less than half of them ever actually made it to the races.  What happened to the rest? Some are lucky and get adopted for other careers, but in many cases, however, there are not so lucky.  Many face permanent injury, abandonment, and the slaughterhouse.  Wouldn't it be better for both the foal, the breeder, and the future owner to have had that insight as soon as possible to avoid injured or abandoned horses?
The more horses we test and the faster we test them, the faster the discovery platform works (especially with owner and trainer input) and we find new abilities and genetic disorders in weeks and months rather than years.  The equipment and techniques needed to do this are expensive, tricky, and take serious dedication to run.  It takes both funding and expertise along with a whole lot of good will and stubborness to make this happen.  We've got some of those things covered (the expertise, the stubborness and good will for sure) and it got us off to a great start, but we your need help to keep going!  Raising $100k would afford things like:



 leasing equipment, buying reagents, and affording manpower to complete several of our ongoing studies


a stonger outreach program so we can focus more on our rescue horses from collaborators such as the SPCA for Monterey County (where we are currently processing testing on several horses in need of homes)


completing our process of creating a fantastic client-user web interface where your horses' information, profile, health reports, photos, videos, show scores and breedmatching information can be kept and monitored or shared as you wish. (see preview photos in our gallery)  *Building a website is one thing, but building a good one with client security controls is on another level altogether and we want to do this right.


What else??
 Who wouldn't want to know more about their horse's health, abilities and an Etalon T shirt to boot?  Not just any T shirt, but one with DNA sequences from your very own horse - now that's custom!! We have several studies waiting in line at our lab on horse samples we've already collected from friends, family, and local rescue groups.  Any funding we receive will go to completing those studies, providing as much diagnostic information as possible to those people/horses and finding the traits or markers we set out to discover (for example: OCD, Laminitus, or susceptibility to EHV, etc.)  
If you choose to fund the Rescue Horse testing (see Perks) we will send you pictures and information on the horses that you've helped fund and rehome.  
  The Impact People helping horses who ultimately help people in so many ways... 
Science is a funny thing.  While people work really hard to create diagnostics and therapeutics for the health of people, it turns out that people are the hardest species in the world to work with, especially when it comes to medical and clinical trials:  You've got heavy expense, regulation, liability, lawyers and doctors, patient confidentiality and reliability, and just one big moral dilemma after another. Not to mention what might happen if doctors ran around tearing chunks of hair out of patients for good DNA samples!  Horses and other mammals like dogs, on the other hand, make excellent subjects.  They couldn't care less about their coat color or what you think of it, they don't have HMO issues, miss appointments, or lie about what they had for lunch.  They are happy in their barn with their friends, eating and working out on the same schedule and performing their best each day.  They do what they can with what they were given and they don't bat an eye at losing a lock of mane or tail.  In short, they make perfect clinical subjects.  What's more?  They are mammals just like us and if we can discover a genetic disorder or predisposition in a horse or dog, it's highly likely that we'll find it in people - we may even know where to look at that point and, possibly, how to treat it.  

Case and point: In addition to the aforementioned Congenital Night Blindness, the list of genetic disorders suffered by both horses and humans consists of many, including Severe Combined Immunodeficiency, Glycogen Branching Enzyme Deficiency, various metabolic disorders and so on.
Therefore:  Feel good about funding painless research on your horse for the good of horses and know that, ultimately it's also good for people:  you.  This is a better, faster way to discover genetics traits, abilities and disease without victims, pain or HMOs! The Etalon team is composed of not only carefully chosen experts in their fields, but of those obsessed with science and animals.  Each of us is driven to research and discover.  We actually do this stuff for fun - really.  Nerdiness aside, however, each of us, from advisors and scientists to business folks and hard-core riders has a demonstrated track record of success and accomplishment.   One last little thing to mention:  We are also working on dogs!  We have this theory that if we could help determine talents and temperament, there would be no end to the help we could provide in the training and placement of service dogs, homeless dogs, and dogs in distress.  Think about it... 
  Risks & Challenges The idea that genetic tools can be so very powerful and reveal so much about us is often hard to grasp and even harder to explain.  Getting our message out there that we can, in fact, do this right now is really important.  Understanding what we're on the brink of finding can be simply mindblowing.  Below are some of the conditions and traits we are currently working to find 
Resistance and susceptibility to multiple viruses including EVA, EHV, etc.
Serious and terminal career ending conditions like Laminitis, Navicular, OCD, and Tendonopathy 
Fantastic and fun traits like curiosity, vigilance, confidence, and "bombproofness" over spookiness
Highly competitive traits such as speed, ability, dressage extension, dressage collection, jumping and more Using our proven platform and, you, our horsey owners, riders, trainers and fans, we can start to parse out who is who in the horsey world and turn those traits hidden deep within pedigrees into real genetic proofs.  
We actually want to hear all about your horse and the silly things he does or won't do, so sign up and tell us all about your horse.  Send us pictures, show us the show scores, we love it and we'll try to provide you with even more in return! 
  Other Ways You Can Help Even if you're just not in the position to fund us, there are lots of ways you can help 
Pass it on!  Make noise and send this on to your friends and family - one of them is bound to have a horse (or three) and they'll love you for it. Think about the horses and dogs you know who could use a little help, if there's one (or a particular group) tell us their story and we'll see if we can help!

Wherever man has left his footprint in the long ascent from barbarism to civilization we will find the hoofprint of the horse beside it.  ~John Moore

story:
Cosmotron says: "Baby needs a ride home from hospital! 

I have been living on the edge, financially, but am always willing to help out an orphan pup, shoeless African village or sick neighbor. I took a vow of poverty by working in social work, but, frankly, I'd probably do it for free. This translates to a meager bank account and savings.

Because of a series of unfortunate events (partner on his death bed in another country, transmission broke, necessary meds.not covered by insurance) my savings are gone, and I am having a little baby any minute now. I have no relatives with money (I send THEM money). I need help, otherwise, baby will be hoofin it. or something. I am not asking for a new car, or even a new transmission. just want enough to buy a used one and put it in my car so that it runs."

Let's make sure Cosmotron doesn't have to bring her new baby home on BART. We know it's nontraditional to put a transmission and car registration on a baby registry, but this is what a mama needs. Transportation.

We know that not everyone can contribute financially, but it'd help a lot if you could spread the word.

Thanks so much for taking the time to read our campaign page and considering a contribution.

story:
We're Out of Toothbrushes!

Did you know that there is only one dentist for every 30,000 Samoans? Samoans on average have the worst dental hygiene in the world. This is mostly because the ability to access high sugar and high calorie foods has increased, but their knowledge of and access to good dental hygiene has not. Some Samoans have never owned a toothbrush, and don't know how to use one.

My name is Kyle Roth, and my grandparents have been running a free dental clinic in Samoa for about half a year. They are hard at work, and are swamped with patients! They arranged to bring a few hundred toothbrushes with them, but are giving away many more brushes than they expected. They are in desperate need of supplies.

My family and I will be visiting them this spring to work on several service projects, and we would like to restock their toothbrushes so they can continue to provide Samoans with necessary dental care. We have a goal of bringing 1000 toothbrushes with us on our visit. With your help, we can reach this goal and provide one thousand Samoans with the first step in dental care. 100% of the donations collected will go directly to funding the dental care of these people.

What We Need

Our goal is 1000 toothbrushes; that's all there is to it. 

If we exceed our goal of 1000 toothbrushes, we'll be using all of that money to bring even more brushes to my grandparents' clinic. Of course, if we can't reach our goal of $1000 by the deadline, any money we do receive will go to toothbrushes. 

What They're Doing in Samoa

Here's a story about my grandparents' recent trip to the neighboring island of Savai'i:

"Savai'i is a lovely place where life is simple and peaceful... we headed up to Vaiola Church College to set up our equipment for the next day of dental work. We had a million dollar view of the jungle and beautiful ocean...

"The next day we were up early and off to the school to get started. We gave a short program about how to brush and floss teeth to the primary school kids and then had them come up by class, to the teacher's room where we were set up... Talk about beautiful kids! They have these big brown eyes and curly dark hair...

"There were so many that only had little black stubs for their front teeth. Some had most teeth decayed away. We spent the day doing check-ups and painting fluoride varnish on their teeth to slow decay.

"Most were very grateful and gave us a big smile and a thank you... We had a wonderful experience helping all those beautiful kids."

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't donate, please pass the word along! Remember, every single dollar donated will be used to pay for dental supplies. We need all the help we can get! Remember to let people know through the Indiegogo share tools, too!

story:
This is my Son Jesse, The night of January 29th was the beginning of a horrible event, My Son was stabbed in the back and as he fell to the ground he was again stabbed, but this time in the chest, the knife went through his lung and into his Heart, after his phone call to me (his Mom) it took me 20 minutes to find him, crumpled in the middle of a deserted road; the next 4 days were a blurr and filled with many prayers and hope. This picture above is Jesse at home 6 days later. This was done by someone that he/we trusted and loved. She is in jail, but Jesse is left with His Medical bills, they are high ($104,000) and He does not have Medical and the State will not help with his Medical bills!, We are asking for help.

Sincerely,

His loving Mom

story:
The Beginning

My passion is to deliver the highest quality of personal care products for conscious consumers who are ready for change.

As a professional in the industry for nearly a decade, I have noticed an increasing interest in organic, natural, and chemical free products.

To meet the needs of my clients, I began looking for an integral line of products that I could provide for them. After weeks of researching the market, I could not find one Canadian company,  producing a truly chemical free product of Spa & Salon quality.

Creating natural products and formulas had always been a personal interest and passion of my own. When I discovered this void in the marketplace, the vision behind Om Organics was born.

 

Sales

In November 2013, sales were launched throughout the BC Kootenay’s and Alberta. The products were so well received that it was difficult to keep up with the demand. Production went into high gear, and by Christmas Eve 2013, not one product remained unsold. Shelves were empty across the board. In 6 short weeks, Om Organics sales reached $10,000.

Outlook

In the coming weeks Om Organics will be launching it's new collection at various locations throughout British Columbia and Alberta. Om Organics will also be featuring it's products at Wanderlust Whistler.

Once customers have purchased our products and experience the quality, they will be able to buy directly online, through our newly launched website.

By 2015, Om Organics will expand into a commercial workspace. In this space,
we will be openly manufacturing our products, so that customers can experience the natural production process. We will also sell retail, through a boutique style storefront.

 

Funding & Perks

All of the funding we received will be used to purchase bulk ingredients, mixing supplies, packaging materials, and labels.

This will allow us to increase production and keep up with the demand!

UPDATE:

Our new labels are not meeting my vision. A graphic designer is needed immediately to help with label design! Since we have a good amount of ingredients and supplies, the funds we receive for the next while will go towards the expense of hiring a graphic designer.

UPDATE:

A graphic designer has been hired and our labels are looking incredible! Only 2 weeks before our official launch. Thank you to everyone who has contributed thus far! The remaining funding we receive will help us cover the some of the many costs we have incurred in getting this project off the ground. Sheesh, starting a company from the ground-up is expensive!

UPDATE:

We are SO close to the end of our campaign! Our NEW WEBSITE was just launched, check it out! www.omorganicscanada.com


Your contribution will be rewarded with tons of Om Goodies!

See our different Perk Packages for details.  

Our Commitment

In addition to delivering these products, one of our main objectives is to EDUCATE consumers. People need to know what exactly it is they are putting on their skin and how it affects the body as a whole. Consumers are generally unaware of the hundreds of harmful chemicals that are in many of the products we use daily.

We do not test on animals and we do not use petrochemicals or parabens. By eliminating synthetic ingredients and using only recyclable materials, we are minimizing our environmental impact and contributing to a greener and healthier tomorrow.

 Please share our newly launched website www.omorganicscanada.com with friends and family! You can also join us on Facebook to hear about new products and enjoy exclusive offers.

story:
Have you ever asked anyone you know, “do you know who you are?”

The answer was probably, “I'm still trying to figure it out.”

This answer can be applied to a majority of the people in the world and possibly you too. 

We understand that throughout life, everyone questions who they are as a person. Taking this into consideration and we decided that everyone should have the ability to truly understand themselves as well as the people they love, that is why Who Am I Now will release the burden by taking the weight of the world off everyone's shoulders by allowing them to know who they are.


THIS IS WHAT WE ARE TALKING ABOUT...

WILL SMITH THE ACTOR

Dream - Motivational Video

"Its not fear that holds people back, its not knowing who you are.
Knowing yourself will make you the best you can be" (Michael Post).


Who Am I Now Is The Most Powerful All-In-One Self-Discovery Database That Compiles Personal Information That Generates Real Answers!

To make what we do possible, we have built long lasting relationships with authors who have dedicated decades of research to human personalities and natural born abilities.  These authors believe in what we are able to provide to the community and gave us the publishing rights to share their content with our users through our self-analyzing software where they will receive real answers based upon themselves.

What we have come up with is almost like human DNA.  Just like human DNA, everyone's results are different. And to our surprise we found billions of possible results based on each individuals answer to the questions provided by our software.  

To do this, we have combined a wide variety of positive and useful information that is nothing short from a person's genetics. We can show each individual a special gift or talent they might of not known they had just by their personal background shared with our self-analyzing software. 

We are completely confident that we can answer back with accurate results regardless of an individual's race, religion, birth name, birth date, beliefs, or even their favorite color!  We understand that everyone is different so depending on their own background will determine their own unique results.

We are very happy that our research will allow people to receive detailed information that relates only to themselves so they may be able to save and look back on to results as a reminder of who they are so they may remain balanced.

For Families: This is perfect if you're a parent who wants to know more about your children. Our program will open up your mind to a deeper understanding of who your children are so your family can communicate better with each other. Through this knowledge given by our software, you'll be able to help guide and support each other through life.

For Couples: This same concept can be used for couples as well. Have you ever questioned if the person your dating or thinking about marrying is right for you? Are you falling in love with someone or struggling to understand your partner? You could be trying to figure out their behavior, what makes them tick, their interests in work, careers, music or art. Who Am I Now isn't just about who you are, it allows you to discover and understand the people you love also. 

WE HELP PEOPLE TAKE A JOURNEY INTO THEIR MINDS, NATURAL TALENTS & DREAMS.

WE INSPIRE & EMPOWER  INDIVIDUALS BY HELPING THEM DISCOVER WHO THEY ARE.

How Does It Work?

It all starts with five dollars and the “pay/pass it forward” concept that is fun for everyone! After someone goes onto the Who Am I Now website they will have the ability fill out a questionnaire on our registration page online to start their process of discovering who they are. We've made all of the questions simple, fast and fun by making the user experience interesting so that anyone regardless of age would enjoy. For example, one part of the questionnaire, we allow everyone to have the ability to create their own fortune cookie or personal quote for another user to receive as a inspirational message. Other questions on the forum will ask for more personal information such as the user's birth name, birthday, and nationality so we can compute accurate answers that is directly about them. However, all content is written in English.

The results will help a person understand themselves with clarity. It will help remove their own human perception on who they think they are and/or how they believe others view them. It will help them remove themselves from the confusion which wastes their time and energy. These are common struggles that everyone faces in life from childhood throughout adulthood. Who Am I Now now gives them the ability to understand and battle the struggles that they face through the knowledge of self-discovery.

However, in order to receive all of the details regarding themselves the user will have the option to pay five dollars for the rest of their results. When they pay they will not only receive all of their results but also a personal QR code, that is artistically designed around who they are.

MAKE IT FUN! SHARE YOUR RESULTS!

Through this code, users are able share their saved results with friends or family members at anytime to help them understand who they are so they'll be able able to communicate better. Not only will they feel a sense of clarity, the user will also receive a free registration code to pass it forward code to a loved one who can also learn more about themselves.

GREETING CARDS TO INSPIRE OTHERS
We also have created artistically designed greeting cards which individuals may give away as gifts to their loved ones. Each card will come with a heartwarming poem and a registration code to use on the Who Am I Now website. These cards are perfect for any holiday or birthday. They can also be used as get-well cards, thank you cards, love cards, and so on!


We want to motivate people as they learn what their strengths and weaknesses are, their challenges in life, what type of people they're attracted to in relationships, natural career choices they would be successful in, their hidden personality traits, and much more!

Where Is The Project Now?

The content of the project is pretty much put together. We have collected and researched a variety of globally known authors and implemented information based on variety of personal subjects to create a globalized self-analyzing software that everyone around the world will be able to use.

However, even though the project is pretty much completed there are still a few areas that need to be met before Who Am I Now officially goes live.

Our minimum financial goal is $10,000.

The funding that needs to be met in order to finish building a complete solution that we feel is needed required to take the next steps are:

  • Finalization of the self-analyzing software.

  • Completion of greeting card library and inventory.

  • Payment of authors and local artists.

  • Payment for legal fees.

How Did We Get Here?

Together we have met a variety people that are lost and wandering through life in confusion. Many of these individuals seem to have jobs or careers they don't like. They're upset that they went to college to get a degree but have a completely different career then what they went to school for. Some of them are upset that they're stuck in a repetitious job and are just realizing what they actually love.

We started to question this occurrence and believed there had to be a way where everyone no matter who they were or what age they may be, would be able to discover who they are. Collaborating, we came up with a solution that would help everyone!



“From personal experiences and challenges we face in life. If we only knew who we are at a younger age, we would all have the ability to have the lifestyle we naturally desire without even knowing it.”
-Micheal Post

“With all the different types of people I have met throughout my life, each one has impacted me in someway. Yet when observing as most writers do, I truly believe that we all need a little guidance in life to find our inner inspiration.”
-Alexandria Post

The Rewards! :)

We want to thank every supporter with a gift of appreciation. Everything given as a reward is tied to the Who Am I Now project. We want to ensure that everyone has the ability to discover themselves, starting with our own supporters.

Project Advisors:

Who Am I Now is proud to have such a fantastic team of advisors to our project:
Alexandria Post- Co-founder, artistic director and writer/editor.
Micheal Post- Co-Founder, business development and marketing.
Gordon Taylor- Co-Founder and software engineer.

Tell Your Friends!

One way you can help is by telling your friends and family about the Who Am I Now project and encourage them to support it too! There are links below where you may be able to follow us on our Facebook/Tumblr/Twitter/YouTube where you may be able to support our project and see where it ends up. You will also have the ability to embed our videos to your own personal social media sites. Your help means the world to us; please pass on the exciting news about our project!

Thank You!

To those who pledge support, we want to thank you from the bottom of our hearts. This is a life changing dream that will help individuals across the world towards a pathway of understanding and happiness.

We would also like to thank our friends, family, advisors, authors, and artists who have supported us to where we are now. Without your help, we wouldn't be where we are today. 


Thank you everyone!

Sincerely,

The Who Am I Now Team


Who Am I Now Website
Who Am I Now Facebook
Who Am I Now YouTube
Who Am I Now Tumblr
Who Am I Now Twitter
story_txt:
Have you ever asked anyone you know,
“do you know who you are?” 	The answer was probably, “I'm
still trying to figure it out.” 		
This answer can be applied to a
majority of the people in the world and possibly you too.  
We
understand that throughout life, everyone questions who they are as a
person. Taking this into consideration and we decided that everyone
should have the ability to truly understand themselves as well as the
people they love, that is why Who Am I Now will release the burden
by taking the weight of the world off everyone's shoulders by allowing them to know who they are. 


THIS IS WHAT WE ARE TALKING ABOUT... 






WILL SMITH THE ACTOR


Dream - Motivational Video

"Its not fear that holds people back, its not knowing who you are. Knowing yourself will make you the best you can be" (Michael Post).



Who Am I Now Is The Most Powerful All-In-One Self-Discovery Database
 That Compiles Personal Information That Generates Real Answers!
To make what we do possible, we have built long lasting relationships with
authors who have dedicated decades of research to human
personalities and natural born abilities.  These authors believe in what we are able to provide
to the community and gave us the publishing rights to share their
content with our users through our self-analyzing software where they will receive real answers based upon themselves. 
What we have come up with is almost like human DNA.  Just like human DNA, everyone's results are different. And to our surprise we found billions of possible results based on each individuals answer to 
the questions provided by our software.   
 To do this, we have combined a
wide variety of positive and useful information that is nothing short from a person's genetics. We can show each individual a special gift or talent they might of not known they had just by their personal background
shared with our self-analyzing software. 
We are completely confident that we can answer back with
accurate results regardless of an individual's race, religion, birth name, birth date, beliefs, or even their favorite color!  We understand that
everyone is different so depending on their own background will
determine their own unique results.
We are very happy that our research
will allow people to receive detailed information that relates only
to themselves so they may be able to save and look
back on to results as a reminder of who they are so they may remain balanced. 


For Families: This is perfect if you're a
parent who wants to know more about your children. Our program will
open up your mind to a deeper understanding of who your children are
so your family can communicate better with each other.
Through this knowledge given by our software, you'll be able to
help guide and support each other through life.
 For Couples: This same concept can be used for
couples as well. Have you ever questioned if the person your dating
or thinking about marrying is right for you? Are you falling in love
with someone or struggling to understand your partner? You could be
trying to figure out their behavior, what makes them tick, their
interests in work, careers, music or art. Who Am I Now
isn't just about who you are, it allows you to discover and
understand the people you love also. 

WE HELP PEOPLE TAKE A JOURNEY INTO THEIR MINDS, NATURAL TALENTS & DREAMS.

WE INSPIRE & EMPOWER  INDIVIDUALS BY HELPING THEM DISCOVER WHO THEY ARE.

How Does It Work? 

It all starts
with five dollars and the “pay/pass it forward” concept that is fun for
everyone!  After someone goes onto the Who Am I Now website they will have the ability fill out a questionnaire on our registration page online to start their process of discovering who they are. We've made all of the
questions simple, fast and fun by making the user experience
interesting so that anyone regardless of age would enjoy. For
example, one part of the questionnaire, we allow everyone to have the
ability to create their own fortune cookie or personal quote for
another user to receive as a inspirational message. Other questions
on the forum will ask for more personal information such as the user's birth name, birthday, and nationality so we can compute accurate answers that is directly about them. However, all content is written in English.


The results will
help a person understand themselves with clarity. It will help
remove their own human perception on who they think they are and/or
how they believe others view them. It will help
them remove themselves from the confusion which wastes their time and
energy. These are common struggles that everyone faces in life from
childhood throughout adulthood. Who Am I Now
now gives them the ability to understand and battle the struggles that
they face through the knowledge of self-discovery.


However,
in order to receive all of the details regarding themselves the user
will have the option to pay five dollars for the rest of their
results. When they pay they will not only receive all of their
results but also a personal QR code, that is artistically designed
around who they are. 
MAKE IT FUN! SHARE YOUR RESULTS!





Through this code, users are able share their
saved results with friends or family members at anytime to help them
understand who they are so they'll be able able to communicate
better.  Not only will they feel a sense of clarity, the user will also receive a free registration code to pass it forward code to a loved one who can also learn more about themselves.GREETING CARDS TO INSPIRE OTHERSWe also have created artistically designed greeting cards which individuals may give away as gifts to their loved ones. Each card will come with a heartwarming poem and a registration code to use on the Who Am I Now website. These cards are perfect for any holiday or birthday. They can also be used as get-well cards, thank you cards, love cards, and so on!


We want to motivate people as they
learn what their strengths and weaknesses are, their challenges in
life, what type of people they're attracted to in relationships,
natural career choices they would be successful in, their hidden
personality traits, and much more! 


Where Is The Project Now?

The content of the project is pretty much put
together. We have collected and researched a variety of globally
known authors and implemented information based on variety of
personal subjects to create a globalized self-analyzing software that
everyone around the world will be able to use.
However, even though the project is
pretty much completed there are still a few areas that need to be met
before Who Am I Now officially goes live.
Our minimum financial
goal is $10,000.The funding that needs to be met in
order to finish building a complete solution that we feel is needed
required to take the next steps are:



Finalization of the self-analyzing
	software.


Completion of greeting card
	library and inventory. 
	


Payment of authors and local
	artists. 
	


Payment for legal fees. 
	




 How Did We Get Here? 


Together we have met a variety people
that are lost and wandering through life in confusion. Many of these
individuals seem to have jobs or careers they don't like. They're
upset that they went to college to get a degree but have a completely
different career then what they went to school for. Some of them are
upset that they're stuck in a repetitious job and are just realizing
what they actually love.  


We started to question this occurrence
and believed there had to be a way where everyone no matter who they
were or what age they may be, would be able to discover who they are.
Collaborating, we came up with a solution that would help everyone!
“From personal experiences and
challenges we face in life. If we only knew who we are at a younger
age, we would all have the ability to have the lifestyle we naturally
desire without even knowing it.” -Micheal Post 





“With
all the different types of people I have met throughout my life, each
one has impacted me in someway. Yet when observing as most writers
do, I truly believe that we all need a little guidance in life to
find our inner inspiration.”-Alexandria Post

The Rewards! :)


We want to thank every supporter with a gift of appreciation. Everything given as a reward is tied to the Who Am I Now project. We want to
	ensure that everyone has the ability to discover themselves,
starting with our own supporters. 

 Project Advisors:
Who Am I Now is proud to have
such a fantastic team of advisors to our project:Alexandria Post- Co-founder, artistic
director and writer/editor.Micheal Post- Co-Founder, business
development and marketing.Gordon Taylor- Co-Founder and software
engineer.

Tell Your Friends! 

One way you can help is by telling your
friends and family about the Who Am I Now project and
encourage them to support it too! There are links below where you may
be able to follow us on our Facebook/Tumblr/Twitter/YouTube where you may be able to support our project and see where it ends up. You will also have the ability to embed our videos to your own personal social media sites. Your help means the world to us; please pass on the exciting
news about our project!



Thank You!To those who pledge support, we want to
thank you from the bottom of our hearts. This is a life changing
dream that will help individuals across the world towards a pathway
of understanding and happiness. 


We would also like to thank our
friends, family, advisors, authors, and artists who have supported us
to where we are now. Without your help, we wouldn't be where we are
today. 
Thank you everyone!
Sincerely, 

The Who Am I  Now Team
Who Am I Now WebsiteWho Am I Now FacebookWho Am I Now YouTubeWho Am I Now TumblrWho Am I Now Twitter

story:
Overview

Sierra Leone, Liberia, Guinea, and Nigeria are experiencing the most lethal Ebola outbreak on record. This is the first large scale outbreak of the virus in the region and communities are struggling to contain the epidemic.

The GlobalGiving Foundation is fundraising for medical supplies and educational efforts to stop the spread of the outbreak.

What is at Stake

The Ebola virus is highly contagious, has no known treatment or cure, and is fatal within days or weeks in most cases. Since early this year, an outbreak of the most lethal strain of the Ebola virus has spread through Guinea, Sierra Leone, Liberia, and Nigeria. As of the end of July, the outbreak has resulted in more than 1,200 reported cases of the disease and almost 700 deaths, making it the most deadly Ebola epidemic in history.

Your donation will ensure that aid organizations on the ground in West Africa have the resources they need to stop the outbreak. Funds will be used for medical supplies to care for those already infected, protective equipment to keep health workers safe, and educational campaigns to inform the public about Ebola and how it spreads.

The Impact

We believe that organizations that are deeply-rooted in local communities are often in the best position to provide long-term support for disaster victims. By directly funding the relief efforts of local organizations, donations to this fund have the potential to build stronger disaster-response capacity so that these organizations are better equipped to face future disasters. GlobalGiving will post reports about how funds have been used.

  • GlobalGiving's Disaster Response Approach
  • Ebola: what you need to know
  • Ebola in west Africa: gaining community trust
  • Main photo courtesy European Commission DG ECHO

Risks & Challenges

Ebola has no cure and supply chains are strained with the outbreak. Your donation will go to fund medical supplies as quickly as possible. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, you can share this campaign with your friends or learn more about our fund at www.globalgiving.org/ebola.

story:
First let me explain to you what is MS .....

About 400,000 Americans and more than two million people worldwide have multiple sclerosis, many of them, women first stricken in their 20s. The disease is believed to occur when the body’s immune system attacks the insulation around nerve fibers, causing symptoms like difficulty walking, blurred vision and fatigue.

There are 2 kinds of pain that goes along with MS. You can have Acute pain:

which is often intense but can be brief in duration. The description of these acute pain syndromes are sometimes referred to as burning, tingling, shooting, or stabbing. Then you have Lhermitte's Sign: which is a brief, stabbing, electric=shock-like sensation that runs from the back of  your head down the spine, brought on by bending your neck forward.

Tecfidera, is a new oral medication that was approved by the FDA in the spring of 2013. It is taken twice a day and was developed specifically for people with multiple sclerosis. It is thought to inhibit immune cells and molecules, and may have anti-oxidant properties that could be protective against damage to the brain and spinal cord. It appears to have anti-inflammatory actions and brain-protective actions. The main problem in MS is that immune cells are getting into the brain and the spinal cord and they are attacking the nerves. One of the main ways they cause damage is by inflammation, particularly in relapsing-remitting MS. So Tecfidera does a number of different things to lower inflammation and lower the ability of the immune cells to get in and attack the central nervous system. Additionally, it may protect nerves from damage.

Tecfidera reduces relapses in the neighborhood of 50%. The potential advantage that Tecfidera has over the other two drugs is that its active ingredient has been used in Germany for almost 20 years. The average cost annually runs 60,000 to 55,000.

I know that not everyone can donate, times are rough for everyone, but if you could share this campaign, I would really appreciate it.

Thank you for your time.

Sincerely,

Jo Jarnagin Carrasco

story:
Short Summary

EACH DONATION FROM YOU WILL BE MATCHED 1 : 1 BY US.

We are a UK-registered company UNICORN POWER LTD,  manufacturing GreenCold containerized solar chillers, biomass-powered, LandGenerator containerized power plants (50-500 kWe) and PARS raw shale gas equipment for its conversion into liquid fuels.

We are starting our own charitable foundation as we find it easier to donate our community health and energy equipment to where it's needed - hot countries of Africa and Central Asia, where the requests come from.

Each donation from you will be matched 1 : 1 by us.

Each donation from YOU (name, country) will be reflected on a plaque, attached to each GreenCold chilling container, so you will be permanently in the hearts of the beneficiary community.

Each 2-200 euro donation will get us closer to the next GreenCold container serving a hot-climate community for its medical or just food storage needs.
While everyone understands the cold for medicines, vaccines and patient comfort, many people don't know that the storage for the crops they grow will allow them to be sold weekly in a marketplace, sometimes as far as 100 km away. The cold allows them to store the produce, milk and meat until it gets sold.

What We Need & What You Get

The matching funding needed for each GreenCold containerized unit is GBP 8,800, to cover the production and transportation to its destination.

The GreenCold units do not need any expensive fuel to run and rely entirely on solar heat and internal energy storage during the nighttime.

There are no moving parts to wear out, so the useful life of each unit is estimated to be 15 years. Each donation over GBP 50 will receive a limited-edition "I Gave a GreenCold !" T-shirt.

If the collected funds do not cover the costs of sending one unit, they will be added to the next campaign.
You may submit your own ideas where the GreenCold units should go.

The Impact

The GreenCold container units will help each off-grid community to obtain precious cold without spending money on electricity or fossil fuels. It is worth mentioning that solar power (PV) is not suitable for the cold generation, as the overall energy efficiency is very low (the costs are too high). Our units have a patented conversion equipment, assuring the best conversion rate available (30% higher than the marketplace).

Risks & Challenges

Although we are trying to get other agencies to further match the donated funds (another 3 units per donation vs. our 1 unit per donation), we can't be sure it will be successful until the end of 2014. The basic scenario then is the fund-matching we promised in the beginning.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please, if you like what we do, help to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
You can share this with your network, using IndieGoGo communication tools.
We will also appreciate any ideas where the GreenCold containers should go (remote islands, poor communities, refugee camps).

story: After a challenging start we stopped promoting this campaign, deciding to spend more time researching and working on another campaign for later in the year which will be launched in November - many thanks to those who contributed and supported!

story:
Chi siamo: Atletico Diritti, In Campo in Nome dell'Anti-Razzismo e dell'Integrazione

L'Atletico Diritti è una squadra di calcio molto speciale: è nata nel 2014 per volontà di due organizzazioni non governative da lungo tempo attive nella tutela dei diritti umani - Associazione Antigone e Progetto Diritti - con il supporto dell'Università Roma3 ed è composta da migranti e rifugiati, detenuti ed ex detenuti e studenti.
La squadra anche questo anno scende in campo ogni domenica per gareggiare nel Campionato di Terza Categoria e, sopratutto, per dimostrare che lo sport ed il calcio sopratutto possono essere gli strumenti giusti di coesione e coinvolgimento per affermare valori importanti come l'integrazione, l'anti-razzismo e i diritti per tutti.

About Us: Atletico Diritti, Taking the Field in the Name of Anti-Racism and Integration

Atletico Diritti is a very special soccer team: born in 2014 thanks to the involvement of two NGOs which have long been active in human rights protection - Associazione Antigone and Progetto Diritti - and to the support of Università Roma3, it is indeed composed by migrants and refugees, current and former detainees and students. 
Every Sunday the team takes the field to compete in the regional Third League Championship and, furthermore, to demonstrate how sport and soccer especially can be precious tools to affirm fundamental values such as integration, anti-racism and equal rights for all. 

Tifa Atletico Diritti: Perché e Come Supportarci

La nostra partita nel nome dell'integrazione è tutta da giocare, ed abbiamo bisogno del vostro supporto.
Nonostante il nostro impegno sia su base completamente volontaria, le spese sono comunque tante: l'iscrizione al Campionato di Terza Categoria, i costi da sostenere per il magazzino, il campo, i palloni e l'abbigliamento sportivo da fornire ai nostri giocatori...
Per questo motivo, vi chiediamo di supportarci in maniera concreta, aiutandoci con le vostre donazioni ad affrontare nel migliore dei modi il duro match che ci attende ed arrivare DIRITTI ALLA VITTORIA!

  • Il raggiungimento dell'obiettivo di 3000 euro ci permetterebbe di coprire TUTTE le nostre spese per il 2015/2016. Qualora l'obiettivo non fosse raggiunto, quanto raccolto sarebbe comunque un prezioso contributo per la sopravvivenza della squadra!
  • I nostri tifosi sono importanti: per questo ad ogni donazione corrisponderà un'adeguata ricompensa targata Atletico Diritti.
  • Se ti importa, condividi! Anche qualora non potessi aiutarci con una donazione, puoi far girare la nostra petizione tra amici e parenti... Perché, si sa, l'unione fa la forza.

Support Atletico Diritti: What We Need & What You Get

Our match in the name of integration and anti-racism has just began and we need all of your support. Despite the fact that we are all working on a completely voluntary basis, the are still many expenses that need to be covered, such as the enrolment fees for the Third Category League, the costs for our training and playing field as well as for balls and uniforms...

  • Reaching our goal (3000 euros) would mean that we would be able to cover ALL of our expenses for the 2015/2016 championship. And even if we fail to reach the goal, all the money collected thanks to your generosity would provide a much needed help for the team survival!
  • Our supporters matter to us, a lot: this is why each and every donation will have its original Atletico Diritti reward.
  • If you care, you share! Even if you are not able to pledge your support, you can still help us by sharing our petition amongst your friends and relatives. 


Vuoi Conoscerci Meglio?
Nel corso del nostro primo anno di attività, abbiamo avuto la fortuna di incontrare tante persone speciali che hanno deciso di credere nel progetto Atletico Diritti.
Il regista Alessandro Marinelli è arrivato al campo con l'idea di fare un documentario sulla nostra storia - il bellissimo Frammenti di Libertà, recentemente presentato in rassegne cinematografiche come il Todi Human Rights International Film Festival - e non se n'è più andato, diventando uno dei pilastri della squadra. Hanno raccontato di noi e della nostra partita tutta da giocare anche i ragazzi dell'Angelo Mai (qui il video), gli studenti della Roma Film Academy con il loro documentario breve Oltre le Barriere e la trasmissione sportiva di Rai2 Dribbling, che ci ha dedicato un bel servizio. 
Recentemente, abbiamo poi avuto l'occasione - nel contesto del The 19 Million Project - di sfidare sul campo una squadra composta da giornalisti e attivisti provenienti da tutto il mondo e di quel match (piuttosto epico!) si è parlato su Fusion e Global Editors Network. 

P.S. Siamo anche su Facebook, seguici sulla nostra pagina ufficiale!

Do You Want to Find Out More About Us?

During our first year of life, we had the luck to meet many special persons who decided to believe and invest in our project. Filmmaker Alessandro Marinelli came to the field with the idea of making a documentary on our story - the beautiful Fragments of Liberty, which has recently been presented at festival such as the Todi Human Rights International Film Festival - and he ultimately never left, becoming one of the team's pillars. Our story has also been reported by some vounteers from Angelo Mai (here the video) as well as by the students of the Roma Film Academy (with their short doc, Behind Barriers) and by the Rai2 tv-show Dribbling (here the reportage).
Recently, we also had the opportunity - in the context of The 19 Million Project - to compete against a team made up by media professionals and activists coming from all over the world and the story of that pretty epic match has been reported on Fusion and Global Editors Network. 

P.S. We're also on Facebook - don't forget to like and follow us on our official page!
