Il raggiungimento dell'obiettivo di 3000 euro ci permetterebbe di coprire TUTTE le nostre spese per il 2015/2016. Qualora l'obiettivo non fosse raggiunto, quanto raccolto sarebbe comunque un prezioso contributo per la sopravvivenza della squadra!
I nostri tifosi sono importanti: per questo ad ogni donazione corrisponderà un'adeguata ricompensa targata Atletico Diritti.
Se ti importa, condividi! Anche qualora non potessi aiutarci con una donazione, puoi far girare la nostra petizione tra amici e parenti... Perché, si sa, l'unione fa la forza.


Support Atletico Diritti: What We Need & What You Get Our match in the name of integration and anti-racism has just began and we need all of your support. Despite the fact that we are all working on a completely voluntary basis, the are still many expenses that need to be covered, such as the enrolment fees for the Third Category League, the costs for our training and playing field as well as for balls and uniforms...  Reaching our goal (3000 euros) would mean that we would be able to cover ALL of our expenses for the 2015/2016 championship. And even if we fail to reach the goal, all the money collected thanks to your generosity would provide a much needed help for the team survival! Our supporters matter to us, a lot: this is why each and every donation will have its original Atletico Diritti reward.
If you care, you share! Even if you are not able to pledge your support, you can still help us by sharing our petition amongst your friends and relatives.  


Vuoi Conoscerci Meglio?Nel corso del nostro primo anno di attività, abbiamo avuto la fortuna di incontrare tante persone speciali che hanno deciso di credere nel progetto Atletico Diritti.Il regista Alessandro Marinelli è arrivato al campo con l'idea di fare un documentario sulla nostra storia - il bellissimo Frammenti di Libertà, recentemente presentato in rassegne cinematografiche come il Todi Human Rights International Film Festival - e non se n'è più andato, diventando uno dei pilastri della squadra. Hanno raccontato di noi e della nostra partita tutta da giocare anche i ragazzi dell'Angelo Mai (qui il video), gli studenti della Roma Film Academy con il loro documentario breve Oltre le Barriere e la trasmissione sportiva di Rai2 Dribbling, che ci ha dedicato un bel servizio. Recentemente, abbiamo poi avuto l'occasione - nel contesto del The 19 Million Project - di sfidare sul campo una squadra composta da giornalisti e attivisti provenienti da tutto il mondo e di quel match (piuttosto epico!) si è parlato su Fusion e Global Editors Network. 

P.S. Siamo anche su Facebook, seguici sulla nostra pagina ufficiale!
Do You Want to Find Out More About Us?

During our first year of life, we had the luck to meet many special persons who decided to believe and invest in our project. Filmmaker Alessandro Marinelli came to the field with the idea of making a documentary on our story - the beautiful Fragments of Liberty, which has recently been presented at festival such as the Todi Human Rights International Film Festival - and he ultimately never left, becoming one of the team's pillars. Our story has also been reported by some vounteers from Angelo Mai (here the video) as well as by the students of the Roma Film Academy (with their short doc, Behind Barriers) and by the Rai2 tv-show Dribbling (here the reportage).Recently, we also had the opportunity - in the context of The 19 Million Project - to compete against a team made up by media professionals and activists coming from all over the world and the story of that pretty epic match has been reported on Fusion and Global Editors Network. 
P.S. We're also on Facebook - don't forget to like and follow us on our official page!

story:
Family Is Family!

Remember that most orphans are orphans for life. They have special needs. A family that will always love them and that will be with them for life is one of them. 

"Help SXS Sorority Make Good Magic For Orphans!"

House of XI Maidens! SXS Sisters of XI Sorority Orphans!
http://www.houseofxi.com/hxi/sorority/sorority_orphans.htm

Diamonds In The Rough!

Sisters of XI Sorority Orphan Resource will be seeking out orphan candidates to sponsor through college level studies and career preparation. The areas of SXS Sorority sponsored studies can include endeavors such as Rhythmic Gymnastics, Dance, Tennis, Volley Ball, Graphic Arts, Swimming, Marine Studies, Geological Studies, Agriculture, Archery, Fencing, Cheer Dance. Audio Video Production, and even Fashion Design - We've been an accredited employer at F.I.D.M. Fashion Institute of Design and Merchandising for many years. For Example, students enrolled at FIDM can receive school study credits for working on SXS Sisters of XI Sorority "Vie de Elegance! (TM)" Fashion Projects.

Love Is Good, Yet It Is Best When It Is Shared!

For starters we need initial funds to properly setup a lasting trust that will make certain that the resources actually get where they are supposed to go. SXS Sorority has friends and contacts living in regions and cities into which we send assistance, cutting through the red tape of politics and self serving religious organizations, 

The cities which we have chosen to send help to, indefinitely, are Sophia Bulgaria, Belfast Northern Ireland, Dublin Ireland, Prague Czech Republic, and Bucharest Romania. 

SXS Sorority is committed to freeing forgotten and abandoned children from the constrains of poverty and social status, by giving them the education and international association to know, without a doubt, that they do count and that they are able to live the life they had hoped for. They will receive support through college and beyond. 

The Impact - More Means More!

What must be understood is this... It is very difficult for a ten year old student to strive with confidence, when they expect to be expelled and later abandoned to the world, once they've reached a certain age, anyway. 

Support from the SXS Orphan Resource gives that same ten year old the hope and surety that their efforts will count and that their accumulated skills, education and experiences are meaningful. A family for life, no matter what, supercharges and inspires that Kid to believe in them self, learn more, and be better prepared for a productive and more expressive life. 

Risks & Challenges

Our campaign financial goal is very small to help insure that at least the first step (organizing a 501c3 Trust) gets accomplished. Then we will need your help to raise much more and start sponsoring some Kid's educations and career preparatory activities for them! Let's Do This! 

Help Us Be Able To Tell Another Abandoned Child That People Care About Them So Much That Their Education Is Funded!

And That They Have A New Family!

For Life!

SXS Sisters of XI Sorority - We Really Can Change The World - One Life At A Time!

Other Ways You Can Help

Don't just wait for us or someone else to help these Kids. Get on the web, get on the phone, and find orphans or orphan care givers and ask them what they need. You can probably help more than you think that you can.

Here are just a few things the SXS Sisters of XI Sorority found that orphans really need Right Now! 

Clothing, grooming supplies, school supplies, medical care, school uniforms, rail passes to get to school, books, art supplies, technical supplies, computers, eye glasses, documentations - they are expensive and a constant set back for orphans at every stage of life, hearing aids, wash towels, food, and nutritional supplements - these Kids deserve vitamins too. 

Just contact an orphanage and see for yourself how much is needed and what you can do about that, You Can Do It!

story:
Missed our Indiegogo campaign?

Come find us at mybackmate.com

The Backmate sets up in any doorway in seconds and gives fast and long lasting back and neck pain relief. Give yourself deep tissue massage any time to relieve pain, lower stress levels, and make your body stronger than ever. 

It not only alleviates back pain and sore muscles, but does much much more...

The best part? 

All you need is TWO MINUTES PER DAY! Just lean into your problem areas, and let The Backmate do the rest!

No More Feeling Hopeless. Take Back Control.

 

 

Unlike pain pills or expensive therapy, The Backmate is a long-term solution for pain relief that doesn’t break the bank or come with serious risks. 

 

Simply adjust the height of The Backmate to target tight muscles around the head, neck, and shoulders. 

 

Alleviate tension headaches by increasing blood flow through the upper back, shoulders, and neck.

 

Combat the harmful effects of smartphone and computers use. Strengthen your cervical muscles to perfect your posture and help avoid the dreaded TEXT neck.

 

Tight hips lead to lower back pain and increased risk of injury. Release your IT bands, glutes, and quads. 

 

Hit all the body’s trigger points and increase blood flow to improve circulation, range of motion, and central nervous system health. 

 

Massage speeds recovery and promotes soft tissue and muscle health. It also helps avoid injuries and makes muscle tissue more resilient.

 

Massage promotes better sleep by improving both the quantity and quality of sleep. 

 

Daily massage has been proven to lower stress hormones. The Backmate helps you find and then release the exact areas you’re storing stress to feel more relaxed and happy every day. 

 

It doesn’t take 90 mins and hundreds of dollars to release tension and restore soft tissue health. All you need is consistent use of The Backmate to reap all the benefits of massage. 

 

Just lean into The Backmate where you feel pain and tension and relax. The Backmate does the rest. 

 

Combining a level and a quick release button for easy setup, The Backmate is fully adjustable and expands to fit in 24” - 36” doorways. Any doorway becomes a gateway to pain relief. Get consistent and proper deep tissue release to speed recovery and relieve pain. 

 

Hi, I’m Eric Bostrom. That's me in the picture above from Sports Illustrated, sliding on the ground at 100 MPH, about to wear a 400 lbs motorcycle on my head.

I spent 25 years racing motorcycles and winning multiple championships for Kawasaki, Harley-Davidson, Ducati and Honda. Ever since I was a little kid, being on bike has been my passion. It’s always been the one thing that has kept me focused and happy to be alive. 

And then it happened…

I suffered a traumatic spine injury and was left with relentless neck and back pain. All of a sudden, my entire life was put on hold. When you wake up in pain each day—life feels hopeless. I visited medical experts around the country, tried addictive pain pills, and even contemplated risky surgeries—nothing worked and my pain and depression grew.

Unwilling to give up, I deciding to take things into my own hands. Combining years of research, science, and using my own broken body as a guinea pig, I developed The Backmate SELF-MASSAGE DEVICE to come back stronger than ever. If I can find pain relief, so can you. 

 

While I searched for a solution for relief, I saw first hand the reason so many people live with pain.

For one, physical therapy is incredibly expensive. And my insurance (like many others) would not cover me. 

Secondly, there was nothing that gave me long-term pain relief. Even when I did find relief with massage therapists, my symptoms would quickly return because I couldn’t be there everyday.

There was also no other massage devices that could effectively reach all areas of the body. I needed to work on all muscles groups to properly relieve my back and neck pain. 

To make matters worse, the pain medications doctors prescribed were making me sick and miserable. My brain was foggy, my bank account was drained, and my body was still broken. 

 

We realized the world deserves an all-in-one self-massage system that is EASY and EFFECTIVE for fighting pain and stress and helping more people feel amazing in their bodies.

 

We didn’t set out to make a tool that helped “take the edge off” or make pain “more manageable.” The Backmate was always and will forever be a tool that leads to a healthier life where humans can thrive and continue to push themselves in all areas of life. 

It isn’t a rehab device, it’s an accelerator to reach the next level in anything you want to do, both in body and mind. 

But getting here wasn’t easy… 

It took tons of trial and error. Tons of feedback from friends, family, and other professional athletes. Some things worked, some didn’t. But we slowly inched closer and closer to what would ultimately become the ultimate self-massage device.

We created this Indiegogo campaign to get the Backmate into your doorway as soon as possible! 

Our patent pending design is 90% done and now we NEED your help! Join the Backmate community and help us make The Backmate even better!

 

We added the dual-roller, fully rotating massage head to fit into any and all muscle groups. It allows you to hit the perfect angle no matter what type of tension and pain you’re feeling.

 

Unlike other self-massagers, The Backmate lets you easily use your own body weight to apply the perfect amount of pressure.

No more tensing your upper body to massage your back and neck... 

No need to tire out your hands or arms working other areas...

Just pure and simple pain relief. 

 

There’s no reason to wake up each morning wondering if your body is going to make it through the day.

No longer will you be hopeless when you experience pain.

Support The Backmate today and discover how easy it is to relieve pain and emerge feeling stronger than before.

 

I know firsthand what it's like to feel and live with pain. When you wake up each day wondering if your body is going to hold up, it’s hard to see the good in anything. That’s why at the core of everything we do is a simple mission: Create healthy, long-term solutions for pain relief.

We believe that in order to live fully-active and fully-realized lives, we must be able to empower ourselves to maintain our own bodies. The Backmate does just that. 

It is the ultimate self-massage device that enables everyone to take control and take back their bodies from distress and become stronger, happier, and better than ever.

I’m on Indiegogo for one major reason: I’m hoping 1,000 people will pledge so we can bring The Backmate to the masses and give the world the pain relief it deserves. 

We’ve worked hard to perfect The Backmate and with your support we can reach our goal to perfect, manufacturer, and deliver it to people in need of pain relief all around the world. 

Just as the doorway pull-up bar revolutionized home fitness, we believe The Backmate will change the pain game for millions of people! 

Please join me in supporting the Backmate and be part of the movement that brings the ultimate self-massage device to doorways everywhere. 

 

Once I had The Backmate, it only took a few weeks before I was on a bike. The Backmate was so effective in rehabbing my body that I was able to take 2nd place in the USA Cycling Pro Mountain Bike Ultra-Endurance Tour (Pro UET). 

The Backmate allowed me to take my body back and stop feeling helpless. 

And if I can get pain relief, so can you. 

 

Eric professionally raced motorcycles in the US and internationally for over 20 years, winning multiple championships for Kawasaki, Harley-Davidson, Ducati and Honda. After years of racing at speeds up to 200 mph, he suffered several skeleton rattling crashes that left him with relentless neck and back pain accompanied by severe headaches. Backmate represents his mission to encourage others to take an offensive approach to pain and immobility. During his racing career, Eric and his brother Ben started a successful motorcycle hardware, accessories and lifestyle business called BozBros.

 

With a background in mechanical engineering, Dustin worked at a number of reputable companies including NASA, Northrop-Grumman and Boeing. He has also founded several startups including a medical device company that was acquired by the industry leader in prosthetics, and Fogo, a consumer electronics company that ran a successful Kickstarter campaign in 2015 and currently sells products online.

In addition to being  one of the first to own The Backmate, you will be a key contributor to product development, packaging design and product evangelism. As part of our team, you will also be responsible for helping us with brand awareness, public relations and spreading awareness for The Backmate and natural, lasting solutions for pain relief.

The rollers come off with a simple press of a button and can be swapped out with a variety of options. The Backmate comes with a set of the standard ball rollers AND a set of blade-shaped rollers. Upgrade to the premium perk to get an additional set of rollers that can be heated or cooled by placing in your microwave or freezer and take your massage therapy to the next level!

story:
CONCEPT – ReLive SERIES:

·  The ReLive series of devices is based on the Electrotherapy, Vibrotherapy and Phototherapy for PAIN management.

·  The device is portable and will be at cheap cost, thus encouraging people to go for it and help themselves get rid of pain.

·  The Electrotherapy and vibration or Vibrotherapy is in the market for many decades now and till date there are no known side effects of it, thus assuming the device to be safe to use and help patients to recover faster.

 
ReLive APPLICATIONS:

·  Arthritis

·  Diabetic Neuropathy

·  Low Back Pain & Knee Pain

·  Stroke Patients

·  Sports & Health

·  Pain Rehabilitation


OUR EDGE:

·  Combinational Therapy

·  Licensed Customer Support (Web Based Secure Portal with Knowledge Base)

·  Customized on need

·  Priceline

·  Upgradable systems


OUR VARIOUS MODELS:

ReLive E

·  Electrotherapy

·  Variable Intensities

·  Single Fixed Frequency

·  LED Indications

·  Disposable Electrode (2 Sets)

·  Standard Electrode(Optional)

ReLive NL

·  Phototherapy

·  Fixed wavelengths

·  Variable Intensities

·  Multiple Frequencies- Programmable

·  LED Indications

·  Standard LED Pad

·  Customized LED Pad (Optional)

ReLive NMV

·  Combination of Electrotherapy and Vibrotherapy

·  Variable Intensities

·  Multiple Frequencies- Programmable

·  LED Indications

·  Disposable Electrode (2 Sets)

·  Standard Electrode + Standard Vibropad

·  Customized Electrode (optional)

ReLive NML

·  Combination of Electrotherapy and Phototherapy

·  Fixed Wavelengths

·  Variable Intensities

·  Multiple Frequencies- Programmable

·  LED Indications

·  Disposable Electrode (2 Sets)

·  Standard Electrode 

·  Standard LED Pad

ReLive NMVL

·  Phototherapy, Electrotherapy and Vibrotherapy

·  Fixed Wavelengths

·  Variable Intensities

·  Multiple Frequencies- Programmable

·  LED Indications

·  Standard LED Pad

·  Standard Electrode + Vibropad

·  Disposable Electrode (2Sets)

ReLive – Stroke

·  Customized Electrotherapy and Vibrotherapy for stroke patients.

·  Variable Intensities

·  Multiple Frequencies- Programmable

·  LED Indications

·  Standard Electrode + Vibropad 

·  Customized Electrode (Optional)

·  Disposable Electrode (5 Sets)

ReLive – Ultimate

·  Phototherapy, Electrotherapy and Vibrotherapy

·  Customized Wavelengths

·  Variable Intensities

·  Multiple Frequencies- Programmable

·  LCD Display

·  Battery Operated

·  Can be Upgraded

·  Standard LED Pad

·  Standard Electrode + Vibropad

·  Customized Electrode and LED Pads (Optional)

·  Disposable Electrode (10 Sets)


VIDEO LINK:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c32Pa7GaUQM&feature=youtu.be

story:
Short Summary

Michaela Platt and Sarah Hunt are two community midwives from Stroud, Gloucestershire who are passionate about keeping birth normal and finding new ways to help mothers give birth naturally. We are volunteering as midwives to work at a Birth Centre in Northern Uganda run by Mother Health International. 

Mother Health International is a NGO dedicated to giving care to pregnant women and newborn babies in areas of disaster, war and extreme poverty. They are committed to reducing maternal and infant mortality rates by creating sustainable birth centres based on the midwifery model of care and working alongside traditional midwives to create best practice.

The Birth Centre Michaela and Sarah are going to is in Northern Uganda, 20 miles south of the South Sudan border. The closest hospital is 50 miles away via an unpaved road. 

Most of the women cared for at the birth centre are internally displaced refugees. An average of 1-2 women give birth every day and dozens come for antenatal care. There is also antenatal care in the remote villages for women who cannot get to the birth centre on foot. These women are reached by midwives on bicycles.
The outcomes for Mother Health International birth centres are significantly better than the national average. 2013 infant mortality was 9.5/1000 compared to the national average of 64/1000. They have never had a mother die.

What We Need

We are raising funds to buy much needed supplies for the Birth Centre including drugs, midwifery equipment, gloves etc, homeopathic and herbal remedies We are also collecting baby clothes and cloth nappies. We are hoping to raise £5,000.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    The Birth Centre desperately need cloth nappies, cotton baby vests, T-shirts, dresses and knitted hats, all in ages 0 - 6 months. If you would like to contribute please contact us via our facebook page midwives on a mission.

    Come to an event - please see our facebook page!

    Please donate whatever you can.

story: In March of 2014 my wife and I set off on our dream of hiking the Appalachian trail.  During this adventure we saw bears, snakes, bobcats, deer, rats, and most importantly deer ticks.  Which brings me to the situation I am currently in now.  On July 27th, 2014 I became very sick with Lyme disease and the nasty co-infection bartonella.  During the trail I was energetic, spontaneous, and I loved the adventure and fun of the trail.  After contracting lyme disease and bartonella I became weaker, more tired, and anxious.  I also have chronic headaches, and spinal pressure due to the lyme and bartonella entering my spinal column.  I was fortunately able to finish the trail after 2 weeks off in Stratton, ME.  We completed the trail atop MT katadhin on August 18th, 2014.  What I thought would be the end of the lyme journey was just the start.  I have been slowly improving after seeing a doctor in Tallahassee, FL, but it has been an extremely expensive treatment process.  My supplements cost 500+ dollars a month and the doctors visit is 200 minimum every visit which I have only been able to see once.  I have opened a new credit card which I maxed out to get my first antibiotics and doctors visit and I have nowhere else to turn to but to ask for your help.  Without this money I cannot seek more treatment and I will become sicker.  I am asking for 1000 dollars in order to seek additional treatment.  Please if you can help in anyway I would he very grateful.  If not I understand also and appreciate you looking at this page.  Please check out our facebook and youtube pages just search ATConquered.  Thank you everyone

story:
Easton Grey Long arrived 7 weeks early, when during a routine non-stress test the doctors learned there was no amniotic fluid in his mommy's womb. Baby Easton was delivered on July 25th via caesarean section and is facing a lot of challenges, as he weighed in at only 3.10 lbs and required a blood transfusion and intensive care. He is facing a long stay in the NICU because his kidney and liver functions are too low. This fund will be given to the family to help pay for medical expenses, family travel, lost work and incidental expenses to help the family through this difficult time. Any assistance would be greatly appreciated. Thank You!!

God Bless this Little Child…

God bless the little child behind the plastic wall For all he knows is the ringing of the bells and the blurred images around him. He has been taken from my womb without warning and I long to hold him in my arms.

Lord, I ask in your name that my child be healed. I am willing to accept your decision no matter what it will be. I am willing to take on the responsibilities  for caring for this child. I am willing to give this  child love and understanding no matter the cost.

Please Lord help me to accept reality and what has happened without explanation or warning. Help me face the fact that this is not my fault and that I was given a special task to complete here on Earth.

God give my child the strength to make it through another  second, minute, hour and day as each moment is  a blessing and a triumph from heaven.

God, may you give the strength and compassion to the caregivers and nurses that take care of my child.  May you keep my child protected and free from all injury and pain.

Please take away the guilt and burden from my heart dear Lord. It is heavy and I feel it is all my fault. Take it away dear Lord. Sweet Jesus allow me the strength  and understanding I need to communicate with the Doctors and Nurses.

As you see dear Lord, I am at your mercy for the life of my child. Please leave him here on Earth and know that I will provide all the love and understanding that  this child needs. I accept the challenge and will be  your humble servant dear Lord.

Author unknown

story:
The Story

Ebony Mickel was a wonderful wife, mother, sister, and friend.  Unfortunately, Ebony suffered an unexpected asthma attack early December 30, 2013.  Ambulance were called, but they were little help; Ebony passed away early that morning in the ambulance.  Ebony left her husband Jamil and 5 sons, aging from aged 8 to 16.  Ebony was only 33 years old when she left this earth, but her memory will carry on.

What Your Donations Can Do!

Ebony and her family lived in Texas, away from most of Ebony's family who currently reside in Nevada.  Ebony's family would like her burial to take place in her hometown of Las Vegas, Nevada.  Unfortunately, neither her Texas family nor her Nevada family can afford all of this alone.  With such a large family of children, a proper burial and funeral in a different state is difficult to pay for.  Your donations will go to a number of things: 

  1. flying Ebony to Nevada where the majority of her family resides
  2. helping cover burial/funeral costs
  3. help the Mickel family move to and settle in Nevada, closer to family

Can't Donate?  That's Okay!

Although monetary donations would help out the family a lot, spreading the word can help as well!  Whether you choose to donate, spread the word, or do both, Ebony's family thanks you.

story:
More information 

My name is Kate Jansyn Thaw.  I have been working with the head of the hospital in Djohong, Cameroon, the traditional chief,  the local government officials, and the president of International Surgical Health Initiative to facilitate a volunteer surgical mission to Djohong.  With the help of an NGO in Cameroon, the hospital has built a new surgical area but has not yet been able to use it, one reason being the lack of a powerful enough generator. The hospital has no other power source as there is no electrical service in the village.

The lack of a generator is preventing the volunteer surgical team from going, they are otherwise eager to begin their preparations. Not only would this generator be used by the volunteer surgeons from ISHI to perform much needed routine and emergency surgeries and to train local professionals, but it would remain for the hospital to use in their new surgical area continuing to serve the local population. And it would remain for regular return visits by the ISHI team. 

With the funds in place, we will be able to purchase a generator in Cameroon and truck it to Djohong.  The cost for a generator and shipping would be $10,000.00.  We'd like to be able to cover $9,000.00 of this cost and look for local contributions to cover additional costs like the cost of installing it, building a shed to house it, maintenance and fuel. 

My hope is to procure the generator this summer, have it installed and tested by the fall when ISHI may be able to make a preliminary visit to the area.  If we don’t meet our goal this time around, ISHI has agreed to hold all funds raised in this campaign until we have secured enough funds, by this and other means, to go ahead with the project.  So all donations will eventually go for health care in Djohong! 

Even if you are unable to donate money right now, but you are interested in helping, please share this campaign with others!

 

The Back Story

My mother, Phyllis Jansyn, lived in Djohong , Cameroon from January 1990 until she died in 2004.  She went there, in her 60’s, as a nurse with the Peace Corps, but chose to stay long after her tour of duty was done in order to develop health care programs for the village and the surrounding area; places that could be reached only on foot.  I have maintained contact with the village and have visited twice since my mother's death. Even though I am not a medical person, I am so happy to now be able to help- in honor of my mother’s work in this village.  

Check out the International Surgical Health Initiative at www.ishiglobal.org

 

Slideshow Thanks

to Stella Johnson for her black and white images

to Ruth Henning for her artwork

to Issek for his artwork

to Georgette Adjie for her music   

http://www.songcastmusic.com/profiles/GeorgetteAdjie

story:
Nate was riding his bicycle and collided with another bicyclist who was riding in the opposite direction around a sharp turn on a bike path. Neither of them saw each other until the moment of impact. Nate's face, nose and upper jaw suffered multiple fractures upon hitting the other guys collarbone, and the other guys collarbone also fractured upon impact. Facial reconstruction surgery and orthodontia are what we know at this point are needed. So many of you have reached out to help and we are so grateful for that. With encouragement and assistance from some of you, we were able to get this request on Indiegogo up and running. The cost is daunting for Nate, even after insurance kicks in their portion. Athletes suffer injuries, but this one has been over the top excruciating and traumatic.

Through it all, Nate has had a positive, grateful, and hopeful attitude which has been inspiring and amazing to witness. He has cracked jokes and laughed at himself, never doubting he would get to the other side of this unexpected, painful accident.

If you can help in any way... especially sending loving thoughts and prayers, and sharing this with others who may be able to help, it would be greatly appreciated. Indiegogo has provided share tools for you to use, if you so choose.

Many blessings have come Nate's way already, and many more are sure to come. He is young, resilient and strong.

Thank you so much for being a part of Nate's life.

story:
In Demand to end on October 9th, 2015.


Thank you to all of our Sensative Hero's!

Thanks to you all, we've reached 265% (and counting) of our goal! We'll be around for a little while longer (till October 9th, 2015) as an In Demand campaign to give those heros who may have been a little late the chance to support us by contributing or sharing our message.
We are so honored to have received this tremendous outpouring of support, compliments and well wishes. We know that Stips is going to change the way people see, or rather don't see, magnetic sensors and this is just the start for Sensative.
We're certain you're going to see many more great things from us. Thanks for supporting us from the start!

 

Strips by Sensative is the world's thinnest wireless, magnetic, window and door sensor! It is so thin it can be mounted invisibly on most windows and doors.

Meet Strips:

Strips is the world’s thinnest magnetic sensor. So thin that it can be placed invisibly on windows and doors! 

Strips is your new window and door guard. It can notify you if you’ve left anything open or if something goes wrong and can communicate with other smarthome devices.

From the very first day we have pushed the limits of what a magnetic sensor could be. Today we are proud to present Strips, a sensor that’s less than 3 mm thick, comes with a battery life of up to ten years, and is easy to use. We believe, and several people in the industry agree, that Strips will be the next generation of magnetic sensor.

That’s why we are at Indiegogo. We need your support to make invisible sensors the new standard for windows and doors.

Support our campaign by liking, sharing and becoming one of the first Strips owners in the world.

Measuring less than 3 mm (< 0,12 inches), Strips is the thinnest wireless magnetic sensor in the world.


What Strips can do for you:

Strips can offer you complete perimeter protection and can keep you and your home protected, whether you are there or not. Strips makes your everyday life easier, you are able to check that everything is OK, it alerts you if something unexpected happens or, if you’ve simply forgotten to close a window or door. By placing it between the window/door and its frame, it becomes your invisible guard.


Why we developed Strips: 

Smart homes make sense, but we see a lot of smart home products that are not good enough. They are: 
  • Too difficult to mount
  • Too visible
  • Too complicated to connect
And, you (or your installer) needs to replace the battery far too often (every second year in many cases).

(Example of today's magnetic sensor. Not good enough!)

Strips by Sensative, now that makes sense! 
  • It is as easy to mount as a sticker
  • Neither you or a burglar will see Strips
  • When a window or door is closed, Strips is protected from tampering
  • Stips will be Z-Wave plus certified for enhanced compatibility and ease of use
  • And, you can forget about needing to change a battery for up to 10 years! 

Mounting Strips is easy! Use the adhesive backing to easily mount Strips and the magnet in place. Almost as easy as a sticker! 


Strips Features:

Strips is a unique sensor, here are some of the features it provides:


Invisible and simple mounting: The days of drilling and wires are gone! At just under 3 mm, the sensor fits invisibly between the door/window and its frame. All you have to do is connect Strips to a Z-Wave gateway, then use the adhesive backing to stick the magnet to the door or window and the sensor to the frame.

Indoor & outdoor usage: Strips is designed for both indoor and outdoor environments. That means you can use it as an outdoor thermometer or to monitor your storage or garage door. 

Don’t forget: With a battery that has a lifespan of up to ten years it's easy to forget about the sensor once it's mounted. But, the sensor keeps track of the remaining power in the battery and will let you know when it’s running low. 

Temperature: No bulky sensors, only a slim, sleek design which detects the temperature in a room in order for you to better manage your energy usage and lower your energy bills. (Stretch Goal 100 000 USD)

Connectivity: Strips uses Z-Wave technology. Z-Wave enables communication between smarthome devices, Strips can talk to you through your smart phone. In order to do this, you will need a Z-Wave gateway to include Strips into your smarthome network. 

What is a gateway?

Z-Wave is a communication technology which makes it possible to connect Strips and other Z-wave devices in your home.

You connect a Z-Wave gateway to your internet router. The gateway will connect an app on your smartphone to Strips and your other Z-Wave devices so you can be in control of your smart home.

During the campaign, we can offer a great opportunity to buy a complete kit from our friends at WeBeHome. We have tested and optimised the performance for your best experience. Here is a link for more information https://www.webehome.com/Doc/WeBeHome_HG2_product_sheet.pdf

Now you can get started on a smaller scale with our Starter Hero Kit. The same WeBeHome gateway, 1 year service and only 3 Strips to get your smarthome system up on running!

SUPPORT US, BECOME A SUPER HERO

PERKS: 

The Strips Design

In order to make an invisible window and door sensor, we have really pushed the limits to make Strips as thin as possible while still meeting the 10 year battery life target. Here are some of the actions we took:

  • Dual processors. A dedicated ultra-low power application processor manages all built-in sensors and wakes the Z-wave processor only to send data to the gateway.
  • A completely new battery, optimised for Strips, based on smart card battery technology.
  • An ultra-thin plastic cover design using our experience from mobile phone development.
  • A small surface-mounted anisotropic magnetoresistive sensor , instead of traditional bulkier reed switches.
  • An ultra-thin PCB board which also acts as the lid of the sensor.

Designing the concept

Our team accepted the challenge to create a great looking and incredibly thin magnetic sensor with world-class battery performance.

At first we used replaceable batteries and existing built-in batteries. We made a lot of design sketches. Finally we came up with a good conceptual design. Next we made a few really good looking mock-ups, tried it on friends and business partners and we got a fantastic response. We also found our battery partner and designed the advanced architecture needed to get it to an expected life of 10 years. 

Voila! Strips was born! 



The different layers of Strips:

How it works:

Check out the video to see how the latest prototype works, how you connect Strips to a Z-Wave gateway from WeBeHome.


The Story of Sensative

Fredrik Westman, a young student and Anders Hedberg, an experienced tech wizard, met during an innovation competition and submitted an idea for an ultra-thin magnetic, window and door sensor.

They didn’t win.

But Fredrik and Anders truly believed in their idea and became committed to proving their concept. They soon validated that they would be able to make a sensor so thin that it could fit invisibly on most doors and windows. And, a short time later, Sensative AB was born.

This idea later turned out to become the revolutionary, ultra-thin sensor, Strips.

During the early development of Strips, Mats Pettersson, a Sony Mobile veteran with hands-on experience from concept designs, technology & product development as well as product planning and executive management joined the team as CEO and project manager. 

With Mats on-board we attracted a few more members with mobile phone experience and soon had a complete and skilled team ready to take Strips all the way to market.


Team Sensative

Meet the team working on Strips! For the rest of team Sensative, click here.


Our journey from idea to market



Support us and become a hero

Developing a cutting edge product like Strips is not easy. Funding from our Indiegogo campaign will go in part to the following important activities. 

Certification: The battery and the complete Strips sensor needs to be certified for sales in both Europe and North-America at certified test houses. We will also conduct Z-Wave compliance tests to make sure that Strips works flawlessly with other Z-wave devices and systems.

Production: Setting up the factory for production and ordering the parts that go together to create Strips.

Delivery: Shipping Strips to our heroes! We are really looking forward to this day! 


Why your support is really important for us

We are proud to present Strips and the team that made it possible.  We truly believe our unique and revolutionary sensor will change the industry. We simply see no reason why there should be visible, complicated and even ugly sensors when they could be invisible, easy to use and beautifully designed! Do you? 

Now you can be a hero! Become one of the first in the world to protect your home with Strips. Just as important, you can also support us by spreading the word through social channels, reaching out to your networks through email, sharing with bloggers and others in the media.


Risks & Challenges:

Developing a product like Strips is demanding.  The only way to succeed is to really push the limits further than you (and everyone else) thinks is possible. When we started, we were constantly told this was an impossible task and we still often get that response when we show Strips to someone new. But, we are now proud to say that we will succeed, all critical design parts are validated and we are looking forward taking Strips to market.
Now our main attention is on remaining software functionality, certifications, quality and production ramp up. We are working very hard to secure any issues as we know that even a tiny flaw could have a large impact on the product or delivery to our customers.
Strips will make it to market. Of this we have no doubt. However, If any challenges cause some perks to be shipped later than expected, our supporters can count on being notified of any delays as soon as we become aware of any issues.

FAQ:

What is Strips?

Strips is an ultra-thin, wireless, magnetic sensor that can be mounted invisibly on most windows and doors to detect if it is open or closed. It uses the Z-Wave smart home communications protocol to communicate with your smartphone through a Z-Wave gateway and your internet connection. 

Where do you mount Strips?

Strips is designed to be placed on a window or door, between the sash/door and the frame. However, Strips and its magnet will not work satisfactory if placed on a solid metal surface or in a metal cavity.

You should also check how the window´s opening mechanism is designed. There may be moving parts that Strips could interfere with.

Can I mount Strips on every window/door?

Strips works with almost any window and door. Whether you can mount it invisibly or not will depend on the gap between the window and its frame. You’ll need at least a 3 mm gap. You may do the “coin test” to check if your gap is wide enough.

The “coint test” is a simple test to verify that there is space for Strips in your windows and doors. Here are some coins you can use to verify, in different currencies:

- USD: 1 x 50C + 1 x 25C coin

- EURO: 1 x cent + 1 x nickel

- CAN: 2 x 5 cent

- GBP: 2 x 20 p

- NK: 2 x 1 kr 

- DK: 2 x 1 kr

- SEK: 2 x 1 kr

And we do not recommend that you place Strips inside a window made of solid aluminum or other metal, because it will significantly decrease its radio performance.

What if Strips does not fit between the window/door and its frame?

There are many different doors and windows. Strips fits in most modern windows and doors. But there will certainly be times when Strips will not fit into this space. 

First check all four sides of the frame and all four sides of the window.

If it still doesn’t work, Strips can be placed like a regular sensor on the outside of the frame and the magnet on the window. Thanks to Strips discreet design and white color it will still look good, however it will no longer be invisible.

How is Strips Powered?

Strips uses an environmental-friendly LiMnO2 battery cell designed as a integrated unit in Strips. 

What is the expected battery life?

The estimated battery life is up to 10 years under normal usage. Of course, extreme usage and conditions may affect this.

What mobile platforms will Strips work with?

Strips will be Z-wave plus compliance tested to work any Z-Wave system. Most Z-wave systems support at least both IOS and Android.

Does Strips talk directly to my phone?

Strips communicates with a Z-Wave Gateway connected to your internet connection. The gateway will forward Strips information to a cloud service that sends the notification to your phone.

Sensative says that Strips is weatherproof. What does this mean?

Strips is designed to withstand normal outdoor climates. The mounted PCB is coated in a moisture protective film before it is placed and sealed in the plastic casing. All components are specified to work between -30 degrees Celsius (-22 F) up to + 80 degrees Celsius (176 F).

What colors does Strips come in?

Initially Strips will come in a very gentle off white to fit in your white windows. If the interest is large for Strips in any other color, we would be happy to look into that

What gateways will Strips work with?

Strips will be Z-Wave plus certified and compliance tested to work with any Z-wave gateway. 

Strips doesn’t work with my gateway. What should I do?

If you have followed the inclusion directions and still can’t include Strips in to your gateway, please send an email to support@sensative.com and describe the problem.  

Is it possible to move Strips?

Yes, directly after mounting, Strips is easy to adjust and move. After a few hours the adhesives will harden and by then it will be much more difficult to move Strips.

At that time, you might need a new adhesive to mount the sensor again. Email support@sensative.com for help.

What functionality does Strips have?

Our first Strips is a magnet sensor that detects when a window or door is open or closed. Our stretch goal is to include a temperature sensor as well in the first version. 

Strips can also detect some types of tampering. It will tell you when the battery is empty and you are able to change the wake up interval. 

Is Sensative planning for other functionalities as well? 

We are planning to add vibration sensor in the future in order to sense not only if the window is open or closed, but also alert you if the window is broken.

We also have some additional ideas for the future. Support us and be a part of this development of new smart home products that makes sense!

What Z-Wave gateways have you tested Strips with?

We are currently preparing Strips for Z-wave plus certification, http://z-wave.sigmadesigns.com/z-wave_plus, which is the Z-Wave Alliance's new certification program to secure compliance. 

However, we are now also stepping up our efforts to verify the compliance towards common Z-Wave gateways on the market. So far we have verified Strips' compliance with the units in the list below, with more to follow.

•WeBeHome Gateway 

•Fibaro Home Center 2 

•Zipato Zipabox

•Vera (Vera 3; Vera Edge)

We would love to know what gateways are you using today. Send us an email at info@sensative.com and let us know what gateway and app you are using today. Our goal is to test Strips with as many gateways as possible in order to deliver a great product when we are ready to ship.

What command classes are you using?

We are still in the development phase and the command classes are not final until we are finished with the product and certification process. But, the command classes we are using today are:

- COMMAND_CLASS_ZWAVEPLUS_INFO

- COMMAND_CLASS_VERSION

- COMMAND_CLASS_MANUFACTURER_SPECIFIC

- COMMAND_CLASS_ALARM

- COMMAND_CLASS_DEVICE_RESET_LOCALLY

- COMMAND_CLASS_SENSOR_BINARY

- COMMAND_CLASS_ASSOCIATION

- COMMAND_CLASS_ASSOCIATION_GRP_INFO

- COMMAND_CLASS_BATTERY

- COMMAND_CLASS_WAKE_UP

- COMMAND_CLASS_POWERLEVEL

In what regions does Strips work?

Z-Wave uses different frequencies in different regions of the world. We decided to start with the European and US/Canada regions. However, we plan to expand to different regions as we scale up.
story_txt:
In Demand to end on October 9th, 2015.

Thank you to all of our Sensative Hero's!
Thanks to you all, we've reached 265% (and counting) of our goal! We'll be around for a little while longer (till October 9th, 2015) as an In Demand campaign to give those heros who may have been a little late the chance to support us by contributing or sharing our message.
We are so honored to have received this tremendous outpouring of support, compliments and well wishes. We know that Stips is going to change the way people see, or rather don't see, magnetic sensors and this is just the start for Sensative.
We're certain you're going to see many more great things from us. Thanks for supporting us from the start!
 

Strips by Sensative is the world's thinnest wireless, magnetic, window and door sensor! It is so thin it can be mounted invisibly on most windows and doors.









Meet Strips:

Strips is the world’s thinnest magnetic sensor. So thin that it can be
placed invisibly on windows and doors! 
Strips is your new window and door guard. It can notify you if you’ve left anything open or if something goes wrong and can
communicate with other smarthome devices.
From the very first day we have pushed the limits of what a
magnetic sensor could be. Today we are proud to present Strips, a sensor that’s
less than 3 mm thick, comes with a battery life of up to ten years, and is easy to
use. We believe, and several people in the industry agree, that Strips will be
the next generation of magnetic sensor.
That’s why we are at Indiegogo. We need your support to make
invisible sensors the new standard for windows and doors.
Support our campaign by liking, sharing and becoming one of
the first Strips owners in the world.


Measuring less than 3 mm (< 0,12 inches), Strips is the thinnest wireless magnetic sensor in the world.


What Strips can do for you:
Strips can offer you complete perimeter protection and can keep you and your home protected, whether you are there or not. Strips makes your everyday life easier, you are able to check that everything is OK, it alerts you if something unexpected happens or, if you’ve simply forgotten to close a window or door. By placing it between the window/door and its frame, it becomes your invisible guard.






Why we developed Strips: 

Smart homes make sense, but we see a lot of smart home products that are not good enough. They are: 


Too difficult to mount
Too visible
Too complicated to connect

And, you (or your installer) needs to replace the battery far too often (every second year in many cases).


(Example of today's magnetic sensor. Not good enough!)

Strips by Sensative, now that makes sense! 



It is as easy to mount as a sticker
Neither you or a burglar will see Strips
When a window or door is closed, Strips is protected from tampering
Stips will be Z-Wave plus certified for enhanced compatibility and ease of use
And, you can forget about needing to change a battery for up to 10 years! 







Mounting Strips is easy! Use the adhesive backing to easily mount
Strips and the magnet in place. Almost as easy as a sticker! 

Strips Features:

Strips is a unique sensor, here are some of the features it provides:





Invisible and simple mounting: The days of drilling and wires are gone! At just under 3 mm, the sensor fits invisibly between the door/window and its frame. All you have to do is connect Strips to a Z-Wave gateway, then use the adhesive backing to stick the magnet to the door or window and the sensor to the frame.
Indoor & outdoor usage: Strips is designed for both indoor and outdoor environments. That means you can use it as an outdoor thermometer or to monitor your storage or garage door. 
Don’t forget: With a battery that has a lifespan of up to ten years it's easy to forget about the sensor once it's mounted. But, the sensor keeps track of the remaining power in the battery and will let you know when it’s running low. 
Temperature: No bulky sensors, only a slim, sleek design which detects the temperature in a room in order for you to better manage your energy usage and lower your energy bills. (Stretch Goal 100 000 USD)

Connectivity: Strips uses Z-Wave technology. Z-Wave enables communication between smarthome devices, Strips can talk to you through your smart phone. In order to do this, you will need a Z-Wave gateway to include Strips into your smarthome network. 
What is a gateway?

Z-Wave is a communication technology which makes it possible to connect Strips and other Z-wave devices in your home.
You connect a Z-Wave gateway to your internet router. The gateway will connect an app on your smartphone to Strips and your other Z-Wave devices so you can be in control of your smart home.
During the campaign, we can offer a great opportunity to buy a complete kit from our friends at WeBeHome. We have tested and optimised the performance for your best experience. Here is a link for more information https://www.webehome.com/Doc/WeBeHome_HG2_product_sheet.pdf
Now you can get started on a smaller scale with our Starter Hero Kit. The same WeBeHome gateway, 1 year service and only 3 Strips to get your smarthome system up on running!





SUPPORT US, BECOME A SUPER HERO
PERKS: 




The Strips Design
In order to make an invisible window and door sensor, we have really pushed the limits to make Strips as thin as possible while still meeting the 10 year battery life target. Here are some of the actions we took:


Dual processors. A dedicated ultra-low power application processor manages all built-in sensors and wakes the Z-wave processor only to send data to the gateway.
A completely new battery, optimised for Strips, based on smart card battery technology.
An ultra-thin plastic cover design using our experience from mobile phone development.
A small surface-mounted anisotropic magnetoresistive sensor , instead of traditional bulkier reed switches.
An ultra-thin PCB board which also acts as the lid of the sensor.






Designing the concept

Our team accepted the challenge to create a great looking and incredibly thin magnetic sensor with world-class battery performance.
At first we used replaceable batteries and existing built-in batteries. We made a lot of design sketches. Finally we came up with a good conceptual design. Next we made a few really good looking mock-ups, tried it on friends and business partners and we got a fantastic response. We also found our battery partner and designed the advanced architecture needed to get it to an expected life of 10 years. 
Voila! Strips was born! 








The different layers of Strips:


How it works:
Check out the video to see how the latest prototype works, how you connect Strips to a Z-Wave gateway from WeBeHome.


The Story of Sensative

Fredrik Westman, a young student and Anders Hedberg, an experienced tech wizard, met during an innovation competition and submitted an idea for an ultra-thin magnetic, window and door sensor.
They didn’t win.
But Fredrik and Anders truly believed in their idea and became committed to proving their concept. They soon validated that they would be able to make a sensor so thin that it could fit invisibly on most doors and windows. And, a short time later, Sensative AB was born.
This idea later turned out to become the revolutionary, ultra-thin sensor, Strips.
During the early development of Strips, Mats Pettersson, a Sony Mobile veteran with hands-on experience from concept designs, technology & product development as well as product planning and executive management joined the team as CEO and project manager. 
With Mats on-board we attracted a few more members with mobile phone experience and soon had a complete and skilled team ready to take Strips all the way to market.

Team Sensative
Meet the team working on Strips! For the rest of team Sensative, click here.



Our journey from idea to market





Support us and become a hero

story:
My name is Angel Rosales. Im 25 years old. In January of 2012 my life changed forever when I was diagnosed with Testicular Cancer.  Ive been desperatly searching for options to raise the money I need since I am unable to qualify for an insurance that will cover my pre-existing condition.  The cancer has already spread to my abdominal lymph nodes and I am now at the point where I MUST start chemotherapy in order to prevent the cancer from spreading to my vital organs causing this to become a losing battle.  

Thankfully I can have hope that this is a treatable form of cancer with the help of you, because I do not have the means to do it on my own. 

Thank you.

Im 25 years old. In January of 2012 my life changed forever when I was diagnosed with Testicular Cancer.  Ive been desperatly searching for options to raise the money I need since I am unable to qualify for an insurance that will cover my pre-existing condition.  The cancer has already spread to my abdominal lymph nodes and I am now at the point where I MUST start chemotherapy in order to prevent the cancer from spreading to my vital organs causing this to become a losing battle.   
Thankfully I can have hope that this is a treatable form of cancer with the help of you, because I do not have the means to do it on my own.  
Thank you.

story:
Short Summary

We want you to help us in the fight against OBESITY.  The impact of the disease in our lives is tragic and it can all be avoided.  Our mission at Anna-Rita Sloss Enterprises, LLC is to make a positive difference in a person's life every day by providing fun and effective group and home fitness workouts that ignite and support an individual's passion for dance, wellness and family.  We believe that everyone deserves a fun, healthy and balanced life.  

The HOT HULA fitness® Warrior project is our effort to create a fun unisex workout for the entire family.  Based on our program HOT HULA fitness®, Warrior blends traditionally female and male Polynesian moves plus chanting to our workout to have unisex appeal and increase the intensity.  It is our goal to create a workout that entire families can do together.  It will still be a “total body workout” in 6o minutes  working larger muscle groups, increasing strength and definition to the core.  

Your funding will help the development, filming and distribution of the HOT HULA fitness® Warrior video.  We plan on providing free access to the workout online and through community health programs.  Every little step toward getting people moving is a win against obesity.  Please help us and fund HOT HULA fitness® Warrior.

What We Need & What You Get

To make the video, it will cost approximately $15,000.  We need help to pay for the location, casting and film production.  We have great gifts for your contribution.

  • For $25, you get a copy of the HOT HULA fitness Warrior Video and a limited print Getting Fit is HOT shirt.
  • For $50, you get a copy of the HOT HULA fitness Warrior Video, a limited print Getting Fit is HOT shirt and a HOT HULA fitness hoody.
  • For $100, you get 2 copies of the HOT HULA fitness Warrior Video to share, a limited print Getting Fit is HOT shirt and a HOT HULA fitness hoody.
  • For $1000, train with to be a warrior (10 sessions live or online depending on where you live) and decide if you want to be in the video.  You also get 10 copies of the video, a Getting Fit is HOT shirt and a $200 certificate for HOT HULA fitness instructor training or merchandise.

If for some reason we are not able to make the video as planned, we will provide you with gift certificates in the amount of your contribution for HOT HULA fitness® instructor training or merchandise.

The Impact

A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step....Lao-tzu

If we can help just one person fight obesity, it is worth the effort.  We cannot fall victim to circumstance, ignorance or indifference.  Make the effort to help, be that change.

Other Ways You Can Help

Every little contribution helps.  If you cannot help at this time, please help us by getting the word out via social media (Facebook, Twitter, Blogs, etc...) and share our campaign with everyone you meet.

story:
Help Us Help My Parents

My Dad unexpectedly went in to the hospital with a heart problem. We were all beside ourselves. He is at home recovering from procedures that worked to regulate his heart beat. It was at this point that we realized that they are too far away from us kids, and we desperately need to get them moved closer. 

They are on a fixed income.

We Need Help With the Cost of the Moving my Parents:

$1,500 for fuel expesnes. We will need to make several trips with trucks and trailers, unless we could afford a moving company. The trip is 3 hours one way.

$150 additional security depost so they can keep their beloved dog. 

$380 security deposit

Any and all contributions will be used to make this move happen. Excess funds will be donated to a good cause.

Help us Help them

I have never asked for anything, until now. 

If one of my parents were to pass away tomorrow, I would be devastated. We would then be moving one of them and planning a funeral. It is extremely important to get them moved so I can help them and make sure they have what they need. 

Please spread the word. 

I understand that there are other people in serious need. We are not asking for much - just a little. Please help us so we can help them.
story_txt:
Help Us Help My Parents
My Dad unexpectedly went in to the hospital with a heart problem. We were all beside ourselves. He is at home recovering from procedures that worked to regulate his heart beat. It was at this point that we realized that they are too far away from us kids, and we desperately need to get them moved closer. 
They are on a fixed income.


We Need Help With the Cost of the Moving my Parents:
$1,500 for fuel expesnes. We will need to make several trips with trucks and trailers, unless we could afford a moving company. The trip is 3 hours one way.
$150 additional security depost so they can keep their beloved dog. 
$380 security deposit
Any and all contributions will be used to make this move happen. Excess funds will be donated to a good cause.


Help us Help them
I have never asked for anything, until now. 
If one of my parents were to pass away tomorrow, I would be devastated. We would then be moving one of them and planning a funeral. It is extremely important to get them moved so I can help them and make sure they have what they need. 


Please spread the word. 
I understand that there are other people in serious need. We are not asking for much - just a little. Please help us so we can help them.

story:
The Problem

The United States produces approximately 6 million tons of medical waste each year.  Much of this is equipment and supplies that are still in usable condition.

At the same time, Cameroon suffers some of the worst supported health care on earth.  Cameroon was ranked number 164 out of 190 countries considered by the World Health Organization.  The Cameroonian government spends only 0.9% of its GDP on health, contrary to the World Health Organization’s recommended minimum of 4%.  With 48% of the population living below the poverty line, this leaves a burden for health payments the Cameroonian people cannot afford to bear: 80% of the population cannot afford even basic health care. 

Our Mission

SHARE is dedicated to promoting sustainable healthcare through the recycling of used medical equipment from the US for use in Cameroon.  SHARE aims to bridge the disconnect between the excess of recycled equipment in the United States and the need for equipment in Cameroonian hospitals.

The basis of SHARE can be summarized by 4 Cs: Contact, Collect, Consign, and Coach. Contact hospitals in the developing nations that are in dire need of supplies and equipment, collect the medical supplies, consign the needed supplies to developing nations (starting in Cameroon), and coach the physicians on proper care and use of equipment. Our focus is not only to provide support in the initial stages with medical supplies and extensive internal training, but also to foster the hospitals abroad to become self-sufficient without us in the long-run.

The Impact

Your contribution will make a real and lasting impact.  Our pilot partner hospital is one of only two mental health hospitals serving the entire Cameroonian population of 20 million people. The hospital also has pulmonary and HIV/AIDS divisions, and the staff is dedicated and passionate about their patients.  However, there is a severe lack of equipment, particularly beds.  Your contribution will help us ship beds and other equipment to this hospital, transforming the lives of the patients there.

Our Vision

SHARE is unique in that we are training and providing long-term support to develop hospital autonomy. In addition, our final goal is to differentiate SHARE from other organizations by creating enduring connections between hospitals in the United States and Cameroon.  To do so, we plan to implement a “Sister Hospital” program, as well as to create an online database to improve the connection between suppliers of equipment in the United States and seekers of equipment abroad.

Within one year's time following the first shipment, SHARE will collaborate with the partner hospital to create a statistical analysis of the impact of the equipment, which will involve both qualitative and quantitative studies.  

 

Our vision is for a world in which Cameroonian hospitals can function to their full potential, and provide their patients with the care they deserve. 

Please join us in our efforts! Every little bit counts.

story:
Renzoe Box is perfect for 

Travelers

Busy Moms

Working Professionals

College Students

Women On-the-Go

 

See a demonstration of the features of the Renzoe Box from our Founder!

In this layer, build your own customized palette with the brands & products you love and use most.

- Mix & match Renzoe Pods™ 

- Pods come filled with makeup

- Purchase pods individually, so only buy the exact shades & brands you love

- Pods pop in & out easily

- Change out anytime

- Build your own custom palette!

 

Get any brand you choose in a Renzoe Pod! See FAQ for more details on how this works.

 

In this layer, store other makeup items or daily essentials that you carry on-the-go.

- Open storage 

- 5.5" wide

- Fits many standard beauty products (full size mascara, lipstick, etc)

- Store brushes separately for cleanliness

- Premium Brush Set included with purchase! Details on brush set below.

Store your...

Lipstick   |  Mascara  |  Small Liquid Foundation  | Eyeliner  | Bobby Pins 

We've sized the Renzoe Box to fit these standard items & more.

(even a Tampon is Renzoe Box Compatible!)

Our founder is an architect from Texas.  Watch her incredible story, and support a female founder!

 

"THIS IS GENIUS."

- Jennifer S., Texas

"I LOVE THIS IDEA!"

- Tara B., New York

"I LITERALLY CANNOT WAIT."

- Kristin C., Washington

About the Brush Set (included)

About Kismet Cosmetics (included FREE)

Frequently Asked Questions

What about the makeup I already own? Do I have to start all over?//

  • Not at all! Many products you already own will fit in the bottom layer of the Renzoe Box.

  • Of all those palettes and products you own, you probably have your go-to favorites that you use often and re-buy every few months. Order just your favorites in Renzoe Pods to start.  

  • Anything too large that doesn't fit? Keep it! Use it at home! All those really fun colors are great to have in your collection, but you probably rarely use and doesn't make sense to take a whole palette with you. Whereas your Renzoe Box will be your perfect daily essentials on-the-go case.

Why buy now?  I could just wait until later...//
  • Yes, you can certainly wait until Renzoe Box is available through our website, but by backing today you'll own a Renzoe Box at an exclusive price that won't be offered again commercially.  Why not save $50 now?
  • Also please keep in mind we sold out of our first production round. We highly recommend reserving a Renzoe Box from our second production round by ordering today.
What brands can I get in my Renzoe Box? //

  • Any brand! No matter the product, you will be able to purchase it in a Renzoe Pod from our online store.

  • The Starter Kit comes with FREE makeup by Kismet Cosmetics. Use these or save them for later. After you receive your Starter Kit, you can fill the rest of your Renzoe Box with any brand and product you choose by placing an order for Renzoe Pods.

What's the difference between this and prefab palettes I can find at Ulta or Sephora? //

  • Rather than a preset palette with preset colors, with the Renzoe Box you can mix & match brands, products and shades into a single palette. Say, for example, you use foundation by Lancôme, blush by NARS, and eyeshadow by MAC. Now you can have them all in one palette! With the prefab kits you cannot customize with different brands.

  • Aren't you tired of buying a big palette with shades you know you'll never use? Now you can have one easy-to-carry kit with JUST the colors you ACTUALLY use.

Can I really get ANY brand? How does this work? //

  • Yes, you can really get any brand. We are working with brands to provide their best selling products & shades in Renzoe Pods. These we will keep in inventory available for purchase at our online store. If we don't have stock available of the particular product you want, we will source it and make a custom Renzoe Pod for you in our cosmetic laboratory based in Texas. Additional processing time and fee may apply for non-stock items, but no matter the product, you will be able to get it in a Renzoe Pod.

How far along are you in production? //

  • We are currently producing our first round of Starter Kits. Our first production round is just starting to roll out and we delivered the first Renzoe Box to a happy customer on 08/03/18! We anticipate delivery of all the first round of Starter Kits by mid September 2018, after which we will begin production on the second round. By purchasing today you are reserving a unit from our second round of production.

I still don’t understand. Can you explain step-by-step? //

  • Yes! No worries

  • Step 1: Buy your Renzoe Box Starter Kit. It comes with free makeup (in Renzoe Pods) to try out, and a set of really nice brushes that are perfectly sized to fit in the Renzoe Box.

  • Step 2: Once Indiegogo ends, we will send you an email to order any additional Renzoe Pods filled with makeup of your choice. If it is a brand or product we do not have in stock yet, we will source the product from the brand and custom make a Renzoe Pod for you. Our cosmetic laboratory in Texas handles all Pod filling. Our lab techs are awesome!

  • Step 3: Receive your Renzoe Box Starter Kit & any additional Renzoe Pods you have ordered

  • Step 4: Put all your Renzoe Pods on the top layer of your Renzoe Box

  • Step 5: Put any other makeup you want in the bottom layer of your Renzoe Box

  • Step 6: Put the premium brush set into the secret brush storage compartment of your Renzoe Box

  • Step 7: Viola! Enjoy! Your brand new super lux makeup kit customized just to you!

  • Step 8: Go to our online store, log into your account, and keep track of all your Renzoe Box purchases. We will only sell products that are certified Renzoe Box Compatible, so you’ll always know it fits perfectly in your Renzoe Box. 

How much will a custom Renzoe Pod™ cost? //

  • The retail cost of the item + $4.50 per Pod. Or fill 7 custom Pods for $25.00

Example:

Alima Pure Pressed Foundation Rosehip Antioxidant Complex

Retail Price: $22.00

Renzoe Pod Price: $26.50

How long will it take for my Pods to arrive? //

  • Inventory items will arrive in 2-5 business days depending on shipping destination.

  • Custom Pods, allow ~2 weeks processing & shipping time.

How big is the Renzoe Box? //

  • Overall dimensions:

146mm x 110mm x 41mm

Or

5.5" x 4.3" x 1.6"

  • The interior dimensions of the bottom compartment are:

136mm x 66mm x 22mm

Or

5.3" x 2.5" x 0.85"

How much does the Renzoe Box weigh? //

  • Weight empty: 88 grams (.19 lbs)

  • Our founder weighed hers full (with all Pods, bushes, lip gloss, eyeliners, etc) and it weighs 169 grams (.37 lbs)

 Gold Temporary tattoo

 

Limited edition black & gold tank top​ 

Treat yourself! You deserve a little luxury.

But...

with Renzoe Box you can have all of the luxury with none of the guilt because its something you'll use every day!

Practical AND Gorgeous! Because we're...

WHERE BEAUTY MEETS BRAINS.
